name: SRAM S-900 Direct Mount rim brake – workshop packaging
description: Gear up for a smoother ride with the SRAM S-900 Direct Mount cantilever brake designed specifically for road cycling. Crafted from high-quality aluminum, this brake ensures durability and lightweight performance, making it a great choice for your cycling adventures. Its direct mount design allows for easy installation, so you can get back on the road in no time. The brake operates with a cable system, offering you precise control and reliable stopping power whenever you need it. Whether you're navigating through busy city streets or pushing your limits on open roads, this brake provides the safety and performance you need. Its mechanical operation means maintenance is straightforward, keeping you pedaling with confidence. Upgrade your road bike with this cantilever brake and experience enhanced control and stability on all your rides.

name: Magura HS 22 Easy Mount Rim Brake Set
description: Legends live longer: the HS 22 Rim Brake by Magura Brake performance is the core competence of every HS brake. The revised 14 mm master piston and the 100% reliable Magura Royal Blood mineral oil guarantee the strong braking power and best dosing in any operating conditions, for which Magura hydraulic rim brakes rightly receive top marks in series production. Thanks to the TPA (Turbo Pad Adjuster), brake pad wear can also be compensated for easily and without tools. But don't worry, ergonomics has not been neglected either. In the current MT disc brake series, the 3-finger brake lever scores in terms of ergonomics. In addition, the latest findings from the test winner were also incorporated. This includes the tool-free Reach Adjust in 3 steps. Finally, everything comes together with a little bit of high-tech: the brake levers and handlebar clamp are completely made of Carbotecture® and save 10 g per brake compared to the entry-level HS 11. Thanks to Easy-Bleed and the option to shorten the cable at the brake lever, the HS 22 is particularly easy to install. The Easy-Mount design guarantees even easier installation. Easy Mount: Anyone who has ever mounted or adjusted a Magura brake from the HS series knows how time-consuming it can be to get the piston between the clamp system in the correct position to the wheel. This is now made much easier by a slanted groove in the clamp. Simply loosen the upper screw and align it closer or further to the rim by turning the wing below the piston. Done! Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. worry-free brake+5 % higher braking power15 g less weightmodern radial designmade in Germanyfully hydraulic rim brakeclosed system without expansion tankeasy mountingtool-free lever width adjustmentPad wear compensation via TPA (Turbo Pad Adjuster) 2700846 + 2700846 1 x pair Magura HS 22 rim brakes (front & rear)incl. brake pads

description: The Shimano Dura-Ace BR-R9210 Direct Mount Rim Brake with Brake Pads for Carbon The BR-R9210 from Shimano's top road bike groupset Dura-Ace is also available with special brake pads for carbon rims. This is a double-joint rim brake for direct mount use, i.e. it must be mounted directly on the fork or on the seat stays. name: Campagnolo Centaur Skeleton Rim Brake Set
description: Dual Pivot Dual Pivot is Campagnolo's exclusive system that uses the double lever pivot to activate the brake arms. In other words, a certain force generated by the cyclist on the brake operating lever is translated into an increased braking effect caused precisely by this double lever pivot. And the advantages of the Dual Pivot System? The double pivot point on the arms increases the efficiency of the brake and allows braking to be adjusted according to current need, so that braking manoeuvres are always safe and controlled. The special brake rubber compound also increases braking performance on wet and dry roads without increased wear on the brake pads. The braking process is also much easier to modulate and is overall safer. 1 pair of Campagnolo Centaur Skeleton rim brakes (front & rear)2 x pairs Campagnolo brake pads

name: Shimano D03S-RX Brake Pads for XT, SLX, Deore, Saint, ZEE
description: Shimano D03S-RX Brake Pads for XT, SLX, Saint, ZEE and other 4-piston brakes The Shimano D03S-RX are resin brake pads on a steel backing plate without cooling fins. They are designed for 4-piston disc brakes such as Saint BR-M820, XT BR-M8120 or SLX BR-M7120. The pads are 40% more wear-resistant than the predecessor model D01S, but still impress with low noise development, as usual for organic pads. In terms of braking power and dosage, they are in the upper range. The D03S-RX brake pads perform excellently in both dry and wet conditions. name: SRAM DB8 front and rear disc brake set - workshop packaging
description: Unleash your All Mountain, Downhill, Enduro, and MTB adventures with the DB8 front and rear disc brake set by SRAM, designed for the ultimate control and performance. This cutting-edge brake system features a 4-piston design, ensuring powerful and responsive braking when you need it most. The calipers, crafted from durable aluminum, and organic brake pads work together to provide a smooth, reliable stopping power. With a 2-piece construction and straight hose connections, the setup is streamlined and efficient, boasting hose lengths of 1800mm for the rear and 900mm for the front, accommodating most bike frames and sizes. The braking medium of choice is mineral oil, known for its consistent performance and low maintenance. The levers, also made from aluminum, offer reach adjustment with tools, allowing you to customize the fit to your hand size and riding style. Plus, the pistons are made from lightweight plastic, reducing the overall weight without sacrificing strength. Whether you're tackling steep descents or technical trails, the DB8 brake set is your ally for a confident and exhilarating ride.

name: Hope Tech 4 E4 Front+Rear Disc Brake Set w/ Composite Hose
description: The Tech 4 E4 disc brake with composite hose in a front+rear set - Pure braking power on the trails The Tech 4 E4 from Hope is a hydraulic disc brake for particularly demanding all-mountain and enduro use. It comes with significantly improved braking power compared to its predecessor, the Tech 3, as well as more user-friendly ergonomics. Lower suspension stiffness and cartridge bearings paired with high hydraulic pressure provide efficient braking that is delivered powerfully by the 4-piston calipers. The Hope disc brake does not include a brake rotor or a disc brake adapter . name: SRAM Maven Ultimate Stealth F+R Disc Brake Set
description: The SRAM Maven Ultimate Stealth disc brake with enormous braking power and high-quality Ultimate Stealth design Thanks to its four pistons, the SRAM Maven disc brake in the set offers maximum braking power for enduro and downhill MTBs, up to 50% more than the Code series. In the Ultimate Stealth version, the brake callipers with milled edges and titanium bolts together with high-gloss polished lever housings ensure an elegant and modern look to match your AXS cockpit. The reach and bite point can be individually adjusted to your needs. SwingLink technology gives you a particularly smooth and controlled braking feel. powerful four-piston brake for Enduro and Gravity mountain bikes18 and 19.5 mm long pistons for up to 50% better braking performance than SRAM CodeUltimate equipment: polished lever housing and titanium bolts on the brake caliperStealth design to match AXS componentsoptimised lever designtool-free reach adjustmentContact Point Adjustmenteasy bleeding thanks to Bleeding Edgeperfect modulation with SwingLink technologyforged aluminium caliper and brake lever housingeasy maintenance thanks to the use of Maxima mineral oilrecommended brake rotor:1-piece HS2 SwingLink™ If you pull the SRAM brake lever, you will notice the difference immediately. A shorter idle travel and optimized brake pad actuation. Due to the cam design, a shorter lever travel is necessary to push the brake pads towards the brake rotor. It's nice, but for perfect braking performance, it takes more than just power. Because you need control. Many braking systems offer a shorter stroke - but at the expense of modulation. SwingLink solves this problem with its special cam shape. When the brake pads touch the brake rotor, the force is modulated, thus avoiding the " on-off" brake feeling. This creates the perfect balance between power and precision. Contact Point Adjustment Some people like the immediate power transmission of a short lever travel. Others, however, prefer the feeling of a longer lever travel. With the contact point adjustment you can determine the position where your fingers should be when the brakes are actuated. This way, you can quickly and easily adjust the feel of your brakes without having to move the pads. In addition, both brake levers can be adjusted so that they feel exactly the same. Reach Adjust The fit and ergonomics of the brake lever is a very personal matter. Riders have individual position preferences as well as unique hand sizes and finger lengths. With the reach adjustment, the lever can be easily adjusted - for maximum control with just one finger. Bleeding Edge™ Bleeding Edge technology allows for quick and easy brake bleeding. Thanks to the special fluid channel and a specially designed bleed opening, the fluid can be pumped more easily through the brake caliper. A special adapter can be fitted to the bleed port and seals the system to prevent air ingress and fluid loss. 00.5018.237.001 (front) + 00.5018.237.002 (rear) 2 x SRAM Maven Ultimate disc brake (frontandrear wheel)2 x SRAM brake lever2 x SRAM Matchmaker X clamps2 x SRAM brake hose, 950 mm (front)and2000 mm (rear)2 x pairs SRAM organic brake pads2 x SRAM pad spacers1 x SRAM disc brake adapter2 x SRAM bleed block

name: SRAM Rival E1 AXS HRD disc brake with shift/brake lever
description: Unleash the future of road cycling with our SRAM Rival E1 HRD shift-/ brake system, designed for the 2025 Road season. Engineered with precision, this system features aluminum calipers that ensure lightweight durability and organic brake pads for smooth, reliable stopping power. The hoses are optimally sized, with a 950 mm front and an 1800 mm rear length, accommodating various bike sizes and setups. Compatibility is a breeze, thanks to the versatile brake caliper mounting options, including both Flat Mount, ensuring a perfect fit for your ride. Adjustability is at the forefront, with reach adjustment options allowing for a customized lever position, enhancing comfort and control during intense rides. The design is modern and efficient, boasting a 2-piece construction and a closed clamp mounting, which simplifies installation and maintenance. This brake system revolutionizes shifting with a wireless shift system, eliminating the need for cables and ensuring a clean, aerodynamic profile. The brake levers are crafted from carbon, offering an unbeatable combination of strength and lightness, while the plastic grip body provides a comfortable and secure hold. Designed specifically for road cycling, this 2-piston brake system uses DOT 5.1 as the braking medium, delivering superior performance in all conditions. Experience the pinnacle of innovation and design with our latest brake system, and elevate your cycling to new heights.

name: Trickstuff Maxima front+rear set disc brake with steel braided hose, PU-coated
description: The Trickstuff Maxima Disc Brake is the ultimate heavy duty brake With the Trickstuff Maxima disc brake, any talk about the strongest bike brake should be over. It is the most powerful brake Trickstuff has ever built, making it the most powerful bicycle brake in the world. Building a strong brake was actually quite easy, but what wasn't was to build a brake that has the usual superior dosing of all Trickstuff brakes despite it's immense power. Because without control, power is worth nothing. Starting with the Trickstuff Direttissima, the Maxima features higher mechanical and hydraulic ratios, increased heat capacity, larger pad surface, longer finger levers with more progressive ratios, and more mass on the caliper for increased stiffness. The use of the Carbotecture®technology in the brake lever housing gives the MT5 a lighter weight in addition to top braking performance. name: Shimano Saint BR-M820 Disc Brake Set J-Kit
description: Shimano Saint disc brake set BR-M820 - top performance for DH The Shimano Saint BR-M820 disc brake set with its powerful 4-ceramic piston brake calipers is the ultimate Downhill and Gravity brake. Thanks to Ice Technologies, the system does not overheat and the braking performance remains constant even on the most difficult descents. One way bleeding also allows the calipers to be quickly and easily bled. On the brake lever side, the BL-M820-B scores with Servo Wave, a design for better modulation of the braking force, as well as with the I-Spec integration option of shift and brake levers. Mounting Position: front brake caliper: brake lever leftrear brake caliper: brake lever right Brake Caliper: powerful 4-piston brake caliper with opposite ceramic pistonsIce Tech heat dissipationsimple, clean bleedingIce Tech pads with cooling finspaintedstainless steel bolts (5 mm) Brake Lever: ergonomic, anti-slip leverfunnel venting with M5 funnelanodised lever, painted bodystainless steel clamp bolts Servo Wave Shimano Servo Wave technology optimises the travel of your brake levers. During the braking process, the brake pads are guided quickly to the brake rotor with very short lever travel. The greater part of the lever travel is reserved for the actual braking force. In this way, you can apply your braking power in a more targeted manner and use it more effectively. I-Spec I-Spec enables the connection between the brake lever and shift lever on MTB derailleurs from Shimano. The main advantages are a cleaner look at the cockpit, more space on the handlebars and, of course, weight savings. One-Way Bleeding One Way Bleeding is a technique used on Shimano calipers that facilitates brake bleeding. The hose routing has been optimised so that no air bubbles remain in the brake calliper. In combination with the funnel, the brake can be bled cleanly and easily. J-Kit J-Kit is a simple line connection system for hydraulic brakes from Shimano, so that you can install your brakes quickly and easily. The brake hose does not come connected to the brake to facilitate routing of the hose in the frame. The brake hose is already filled with oil in the J-Kit and sealed with a thin membrane. There is a small pin in the J-Kit brake lever that pierces this diaphragm during assembly to allow oil to flow. I-Spec brake levers have a new mount as of 2014 (Version B). As of now, there is no compatibility to shifters with old I-Spec mounts. However, these can be made compatible with the I-Spec brake levers using the I-Spec adapters (SM-SL98-B for XTR, SM-SL78-B for XT and SLX, SM-SL82-B for Saint). name: Trickstuff Piccola HD Titanium f+r Set Disc Brake
description: Upgrade your ride with the Trickstuff Piccola HD Titan Disc Brake Set , designed for the All Mountain, MTB, and Enduro enthusiast. This high-performance brake system features a robust 4-piston design, ensuring powerful and consistent braking in even the most demanding conditions. Crafted from durable materials, the calipers are made of aluminum, while the pistons boast stainless steel construction for unparalleled strength and reliability. The brake levers are crafted from lightweight titanium, providing a comfortable and responsive feel under your fingers. The system uses organic brake pads for smooth and quiet stopping power, coupled with mineral oil as the braking medium for reliable performance. Hose lengths are tailored for both front (900mm) and rear (1700mm) setups, ensuring a perfect fit for your bike. The hoses feature a banjo connection for a secure and leak-free installation. Adjustments are a breeze with tool-required reach adjustment options, allowing you to customize the brake lever's position to your preference. The brakes mount easily onto your bike with a split clamp and postmount caliper mounting, designed for a straightforward setup. The 2-piece design not only simplifies maintenance but also enhances the overall aesthetics of your bike. This brake system is a must-have upgrade for riders seeking the ultimate in control and performance on the trails.

It is also characterised by a clearly defined pressure point and sensitive dosing, making it the first choice for anyone who wants to hit the gas when riding enduro or downhill. With an ergonomic HC brake lever, which lets you to adjust the grip width without tools, you can adjust your brake force with one finger even on demanding terrain. The use of Carbotecture SL® makes the brake lever both robust and light. The one-piece 4-piston brake calliper made of forged aluminium is particularly rigid and delivers powerful braking power. Do you want to adjust the pressure point as well? name: TRP Disc brake EVO Pro
description: Unleash the full potential of your ride with our TRP EVO Pro 4-piston brake system, designed specifically for All Mountain, Downhill, and Enduro enthusiasts. Crafted from durable aluminum, both the caliper and the brake lever promise longevity and lightweight performance. The system's 2-piece design, featuring a postmount brake caliper mounting and a banjo hose connection, ensures a seamless and reliable integration with your bike. With a generous hose length of 1900mm for both front and rear, you're equipped for any setup without additional adjustments. This braking system uses mineral oil as its braking medium, offering a smooth and consistent braking experience, reducing the need for frequent maintenance. The 4-piston caliper design not only enhances braking power but also improves heat dissipation, ensuring your brakes perform optimally, even under the most demanding conditions. Customization is key, and with adjustable bite point and reach (without the need for tools), you can fine-tune your braking to match your riding style perfectly. The split clamp mounting further simplifies the installation process, making upgrades or maintenance hassle-free. Whether you're navigating steep descents or tackling challenging trails, this brake system provides the control and confidence you need to push your limits. Upgrade your bike with our advanced braking solution and experience unparalleled performance and reliability on every ride.

name: Shimano XT BR-M8100 Disc Brake w/ Sintered Pads J-Kit
description: The Shimano XT BR-M8100 disc brake - so you can concentrate fully on the trail The Shimano XT BR-M8100 is a two-piston disc brake with sintered brake pads specially designed for Cross Country use. The brake caliper features excellent brake control and a simple connection system. The I-Spec EV compatible BL-M8100 brake lever is mounted at an angle to provide an additional contact point. This increases stiffness and provides more direct feedback. In addition, Shimano Servo Wave increases braking power: more performance is available with shorter empty travel. Mounting Position: front brake caliper: brake lever leftrear brake caliper: brake lever right Brake Caliper: excellent brake control helps you to focus on the traillightweight 2-piston system (ceramic)easy and quick installationpaintedsteel bolts (5 mm) Brake Lever: optimised lever axis position with additional contact point and revised ergonomicsflexible, action-optimised cockpit layout thanks to I-Spec EVrotation adjustment angle for compatible shift lever: 20°10% stiffer than M8000 even in heatfaster braking with less empty pullfunnel venting with M5 funnelanodised lever, painted bodystainless steel clamp bolts Servo Wave Shimano Servo Wave technology optimises the travel of your brake levers. During the braking process, the brake pads are guided quickly to the brake rotor with very short lever travel. The greater part of the lever travel is reserved for the actual braking force. In this way, you can apply your braking power in a more targeted manner and use it more effectively. I-Spec EV I-Spec EV describes a variant of the connection between brake lever and shift lever on Shimano MTB derailleurs. This type of mounting allows the shifter to be adjusted both horizontally and vertically in relation to the brake lever, and ensures a tidy cockpit by reducing the number of clamps required. Compared to I-Spec and I-Spec II, I-Spec EV offers a much wider adjustment range. 14 mm adjustment range the longitudinal direction and up to 60° rotation allow an optimal ergonomic adjustment to your riding style, your sitting position and your anatomy. One-Way Bleeding One Way Bleeding is a technique used on Shimano calipers that facilitates brake bleeding. The hose routing has been optimised so that no air bubbles remain in the brake calliper. In combination with the funnel, the brake can be bled cleanly and easily. J-Kit J-Kit is a simple line connection system for hydraulic brakes from Shimano, so that you can install your brakes quickly and easily. The brake hose does not come connected to the brake to facilitate routing of the hose in the frame. The brake hose is already filled with oil in the J-Kit and sealed with a thin membrane. There is a small pin in the J-Kit brake lever that pierces this diaphragm during assembly to allow oil to flow. 1 x Shimano XT BR-M8100 + BL-M8100 disc brake, frontorrear1 x Shimano SM-BH90-SBM brake hose, 1000 mm (front)or1700 mm (rear)1 x pair Shimano brake pads1 x inserts2 x calliper bolts1 x snap ring1 x olives (assembled)ready for installation, filled,bleedingis recommended after installation Disc Brake AdapterTL-BH61 toolfor insert installation

name: SRAM Maven Base disc brake
description: Discover the SRAM Maven Base Disc Brake, designed for the thrill-seekers and mountain conquerors. This high-performance brake system, tailored for MTB, All Mountain, Downhill, and Enduro applications, combines robust aluminum calipers with lightweight plastic pistons to deliver unparalleled stopping power. The system features a 4-piston design, ensuring responsive and reliable braking in the most demanding conditions. With organic brake pads, you can expect a smooth and quiet operation, reducing noise and enhancing your ride quality. The brake comes equipped with a closed clamp mounting and a straightforward hose connection, simplifying installation. The hoses are generously sized, with 950mm at the front and 2000mm at the rear, accommodating a wide range of bike sizes and setups. Reach adjustment is hassle-free, requiring no tools, allowing you to fine-tune your braking experience on the fly. The brake levers, crafted from durable aluminum, promise longevity and a solid feel under your fingers. This system eschews complexity for reliability, omitting a shift system for a focused, high-performance braking solution. Dive into your next adventure with confidence, knowing your brakes are built to handle the rigors of the mountain.

The brake callipers have two pistons and feature a fast, simple connection system. The BL-M7100 brake levers have a new design that increases stiffness and provides more direct feedback and braking performance. Of course they are equipped with Shimano Servo Wave technology. With a shorter empty travel, more power is available without a long reaction time. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. I-Spec EV I-Spec EV describes a variant of the connection between brake lever and shift lever on Shimano MTB derailleurs. This type of mounting allows the shifter to be adjusted both horizontally and vertically in relation to the brake lever, and ensures a tidy cockpit by reducing the number of clamps required. Compared to I-Spec and I-Spec II, I-Spec EV offers a much wider adjustment range. 14 mm adjustment range the longitudinal direction and up to 60° rotation allow an optimal ergonomic adjustment to your riding style, your sitting position and your anatomy. name: Shimano XTR BL-M9220 + BR-M9220 front and rear disc brake set
description: Upgrade your mountain biking experience with this Shimano XTR BL-M9220+BR-M9220 f+r brake set, designed specifically for All Mountain, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. This system features a powerful 4-piston brake caliper made from durable aluminum, ensuring reliable stopping power on even the most challenging terrains. The brake lever, crafted from the same high-quality aluminum, is designed for 1.5-finger operation, offering precise control and comfort during intense rides. With a postmount caliper mounting and a straightforward hose connection, installation is a breeze, allowing you to get back on the trail in no time. The system utilizes mineral oil as the braking medium, known for its consistent performance and low maintenance. The hose lengths are optimized for both front (1000 mm) and rear (1700 mm) setups, ensuring a tailored fit for your bike. The organic brake pads included provide excellent stopping power without compromising on noise or durability. Additionally, the reach of the brake lever can be adjusted without tools, allowing for quick and easy customization to fit your hand size and riding style. Designed as a one-piece unit for simplicity and strength, and featuring an I-Spec EV mounting system, this brake system integrates seamlessly with your bike's aesthetics and functionality. Whether you're tackling steep descents or navigating technical trails, this brake system offers the confidence and control you need to push your limits.

name: Shimano Ultegra BR-R8170 Brake Caliper w/ Resin Pads
description: The Ultegra BR-R8170 Brake Caliper by Shimano - More space for brake pads With the Shimano BR-R8170 flat-mount brake caliper from the Ultegra road bike groupset, the brake pads have more free space than with the predecessor model, which prevents grinding of the brake rotor and reduces noise. The braking power of the two plastic pistons is tuned for competition use, but is just as suitable for leisure and training rides. In addition, BR-R8170 features a simple bleeding process thanks to One-Way Bleeding technology. The two-piece caliper design is made of lightweight aluminium and comes with Ice-Tech resin pads, which ensure particularly good heat dissipation thanks to their cooling fins. However, you can also ride it with conventional pads. 10% larger brake pad spacing minimises grinding of the brake rotor, less noise developmentbraking performance optimally tuned for racing and training usecoherent appearance and easy tool access thanks to flat mountoptimised heat dissipation with Ice-Techsimple bleeding process2 pistons made of synthetic resinpaintedsteel bolts (4 mm) One Way Bleeding One Way Bleeding is a technique used on Shimano calipers that facilitates brake bleeding. name: Magura MT7 Pro HC Carbotecture Disc Brake
description: The MT7 Pro HC Carbotecture Disc Brake by Magura - First choice for Gravity enthusiasts The Magura MT7 Pro HC Carbotecture disc brake with four pistons delivers high braking power, a clearly defined pressure point and sensitive control. making it the first choice for anyone who wants to hit the gas when riding enduro or downhill. With an ergonomic HC brake lever, which lets you to adjust the grip width without tools, you can adjust your brake force with one finger even on demanding terrain. The use of Carbotecture SL® makes the brake lever both robust and light. The one-piece 4-piston brake calliper made of forged aluminium is particularly rigid and delivers powerful braking power. Do you want to adjust the pressure point as well? Then you will need the BAT-Kit. can be used left and rightparticularly light thanks to Carbotecture brake leverergonomic 1-finger brake leverLever width adjustable without toolsforged 4-piston brake calliper with banjomagnetiXchange brake piston for easy pad changeautomatic pad adjustmentEasy-Bleed technology for easy bleedingDisc Tube brake line can be shortened without any problemsrotatable brake line connectionrecommended brake rotor Storm HC,MDR-CorMDR-P Carbotecture SL®: Material developed by Magura consisting of a high proportion of carbon fibres embedded in a thermoplastic matrix. More powerful, more tensile, more flexible and more break-resistant than conventional, fibre-reinforced plastics or laminated carbon fibre mats. Ideally suited for manufacturing using the Carboflow® process. An artificial word composed of carbon and architecture. Carboflow®: A process developed by Magura that allows carbon fibres to be optimally aligned with the direction of force. Produces homogeneous, calculable surfaces. Significant weight savings are possible as oversizing is not necessary. There are hardly any limits to the design. HCT (Hard Core Tech): Under the HCT program, which at Magura stands for Hard Core Tech and has its origin in Magura Powersport, Magura combines all developments and special detail improvements that are developed for racing or the highest demands. The HC brake lever for MT disc brakes was developed especially to optimise the ergonomic performance. The ergonomics of the shorter HC aluminium lever allows full braking power - safely with one finger. Danny MacAskill's feedback and experience also went into the design and ergonomics. 2702431 1 x Magura MT7 Pro HC disc brakes, mount ready, filled & bled1 pair of Magura 8.P Performance brake pads2 x Magura olives2 x Magura insert pins2 x Magura bolts4 x Magura washers2 x Magura brake pad spacernot incl. brake rotornot incl. disc brake adapter

name: OneUp Components EDC Top Cap
description: OneUp Components EDC Top Cap - Store the EDC Tool in your steerer tube The EDC Top Cap from OneUp Components is required if you want to store the EDC Tool or EDC V2 Tool in the steerer tube. It is screwed into the steerer tube using the EDC Top Cap tool, which is located on the EDC Multi-Tool. There it pretensions the headset and thus takes over the function of the star nut. Before this, however, a thread must be cut into the tapered fork steerer tube. Afterwards you can store the EDC Tool. Also included are several spacers and a Steerer Plug, which keeps grime away from your steerer tube. Headset Top Cap: 1 1/8" steer tubes Steerer Plug: 1 1/8" - 1.5" tapered steerer tubes Storing the EDC tool in the steerer tube without threading: Important note in advance: Since the Top Cap is screwed into the steerer tube, the steerer tube must be threaded before installation. Only aluminium steerer tubes (not carbon or steel) are suited for storing the EDC V2 Tool.All compatibility information and installation instructions are exclusively from OneUp Components. Using the EDC Tool System (V2) on your bike may void the original manufacturer warranty. Steerer tube: Please make sure that your fork meets the above criteria before purchasing, as it is possible that the EDC Steerer Plug will not fit your fork. Its installation is not absolutely necessary. name: OneUp Components 35 mm 35 Aluminum Riser Handlebars
description: The Aluminum 35 mm Riser Handlebars from OneUp Components - oval shape for more flexibility and vibration damping With the Aluminum Riser Handlebars from OneUp Components, here in the version with 35 mm rise for a very upright riding position, you get the performance of the OneUp carbon handlebars for the price of aluminium handlebars. OneUp developed the Aluminum Riser Handlebars for Downhill World Cup races, which is why they also impress with their durability and light weight. name: Chromag Fubars FU50 31.8 50 mm Riser Handlebar
description: Get ready to elevate your ride with the Fubars FU50 31.8 50 mm Riser Handlebar from Chromag, perfect for All Mountain, Dirtjump, Slopestyle, Downhill, Enduro, and MTB adventures. Crafted from durable aluminum, this handlebar is designed to withstand the toughest trails and enhance your control and comfort on the bike. With a 31.8 mm handlebar clamp, it offers a secure fit on most mountain bikes. The 50 mm rise ensures an upright riding position, reducing strain on your back and shoulders for those long, challenging rides. The 8-degree backsweep and 5-degree upsweep are meticulously engineered to optimize your hand position, providing a natural grip and reducing fatigue. The external cable routing keeps your setup neat and tidy, allowing for easy maintenance and a sleek look. Whether you're shredding downhill trails or mastering new tricks in the dirt park, this handlebar is built to boost your performance and confidence. Its robust construction and thoughtful design make it a must-have upgrade for any serious cyclist looking to push their limits. So, why wait? Transform your ride with the Fubars FU50 and experience the difference on your next adventure.

name: OneUp Components 35 mm 35 Carbon Riser Handlebars
description: OneUp Components 35 mm Riser handlebars - oversized clamp done right The OneUp Components Riser handlebars are designed to give you the best possible feel so you can ride longer and more aggressively. Their oval shape combines the advantages of 31.8 mm bars with those of 35 mm bars. They are strong, light, dampen vibrations, reduce arm pump, respond well and are super comfortable. OneUp Components has taken advantage of the properties of carbon to create a more complex design, which increases the performance of the product. The 35 mm clamp area has been reduced and changes into a flattened, rather oval zone before the typical 22.2 mm clamp diameter is reached further out. Thus, this Riser flexes only in the damping direction and the stiffness in the steering remains. There's a reason that freerider Thomas Vanderham says: " The OneUp bar gives me all of the confidence inspiring attributes of a 35 mm bar with a bit of forgiveness engineered in for those big descents. I've been so impressed after putting it through the paces for the last year." an ingenious shape to achieve the right ratio of flex and stiffness21% more vertical compliance (more comfort) than conventional 35 mm handlebars28 % steering stiffness (responsiveness) than conventional 35 mm handlebarsblack decor, decal kitsold separatelyin six additional colours 1C0585 1 x OneUp Components 35 mm Riser handlebars

name: OneUp Components 35 mm Carbon E-Bar 35 Riser Handlebars
description: OneUp Components Carbon E-Bar 35 mm Rise Handlebars - More comfort on long e-bike tours The OneUp Components E-Bar handlebars are made of carbon and feature a 35 mm rise, 8° backsweep and a 35 mm stem clamp. They help you achieve more comfort on the E-MTB due to the oval profile between the clamp area and the handlebar ends that measures only 20 mm at the narrowest point. This makes ithe Carbon E-Bar much more vertically compliant and vibration-damping than conventional carbon handlebars. This relieves strain on your arms and prevents premature fatigue. Arm pump is thus avoided, which is especially important on long tours such as with e-bikes. At the same time, you can always rely on the lateral stiffness and responsiveness of the handlebars. The Carbon E-bar also has openings and grooves for internal cable routing for Shimano STEPS e-bike computers or remote switches, which helps to tidy up the cockpit. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: DEDA Superleggera RS Carbon Handlebar - workshop packaging
description: Get ready to elevate your cycling experience with the Supperleggera RS Carbon handlebar from DEDA. With a stem clamp diameter of 31.7 mm, it promises a snug and secure fit to your bike, ensuring you ride with confidence. The handlebar's reach of 75 mm and drop of 130 mm are designed to offer you an optimal riding position, whether you're attacking a steep climb or sprinting to the finish line. Crafted from high-quality carbon, this handlebar is not only lightweight but also incredibly durable, ready to withstand the rigors of intense cycling sessions. Its sleek design and performance-focused features make it a must-have upgrade for your bike. Say goodbye to compromise and hello to unmatched control and comfort on your rides.

name: Specialized Hover Alloy 15 mm Rise + Flare 31.8 Handlebars
description: Be more relaxed when riding your bike with the Specialized Hover Alloy 15 mm Rise + Flare handlebars The Hover Alloy 15 mm Rise plus Flare gravel handlebars have been designed by Specialized for long distance comfort. It is bend upwards by 15 mm, which relaxes the upper body and shoulders of the rider. A flare, i.e. an angle of the lower link of 12°, provides more control and stability. In addition, the handlebars overall have a more compact design with a short reach and flatter drop to prevent cramping. With the Hover Expert you stay fresh for longer and arrive being more relaxed. made of butted 6061 aluminium for a high stability and stiffnessa 15 mm upward bend provides a more relaxed seating positionShallow Bend Design for more comfort 1 x Specialized Hover Alloy 15 mm Rise + Flare handlebars

name: Hope ZS44/28.6 2 Headset Top Assembly
description: You can rely on it: the ZS44/28.6 2 headset top assembly by Hope The Hope ZS44/28.6 headset top assembly is characterised by its reliability and durability. The reason for this is the corrosion-resistant stainless steel bearings and the double seal. In addition, the headset cup is made of high-quality aluminium. The compression ring is slotted to facilitate assembly. replaceablecorrosion-resistant stainless steel bearingsslotted compression ring race for easier assemblydouble seal In order to clarify and bring uniformity to a sea of headset standards, manufacturers Acros, Cane Creek, Hope, Race Face, Reset Racing and Ritchey have agreed upon using a shared nomenclature, which will likely include more participating companies in the future. This system takes into account a combination of frame and fork dimensions. Both the top and bottom parts of the headset are marked by two alphanumeric identifiers. The first identifier indicates the type of headset (External Cup, Zero Stack, Integrated) and head tube diameter. The second identifier - separated from the first by a backslash - indicates the diameter of the steerer tube. When referring to a complete headset, the specifications of both top and bottom parts must be combined. 1 x Hope upper headset cup incl. stainless steel bearings1 x top caps1 x compression ring1 x O-ring3 x spacersnot incl. star nutnot incl. Ahead cap

name: Specialized Roval Rapide Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Specialised Roval Rapide carbon handlebar stem unit - lightweight, uncompromising aero cockpit The Rapide handlebar stem unit, which Specialized and Roval developed together, is a road bike cockpit with unrivalled aerodynamics. Thanks to its razor-sharp, aerofoil-like design, it cuts through the air and provides an aero advantage of 4 watts compared to the combination of a Tarmac SL7 stem and Rapide handlebars. This can decide who wins in a tight sprint to the finish. The Roval Rapide handlebar-stem unit also achieves top values in terms of light weight and stiffness. It weighs 50 grams less than the two-piece option mentioned above and impresses with extremely precise steering behaviour, made possible by its perfect carbon fibre layup and direct connection to the steerer tube. No wonder that top professional sprinters are impressed by this cockpit. It has also been developed on the basis of careful ergonomics studies, is available in numerous length-width combinations and has an angle of minus 6 degrees to fit your posture perfectly. lightweight, stiff handlebar stem unit for an aerodynamic road bike cockpitstreamlined, aerofoil-like design for minimised air resistancepower advantage of 4 watts compared to combination of SL7 stem and Rapide handlebarsfirst-class, high-stiffness carbon fibres and titanium boltsdirect connection to the steerer tube for extremely precise riding behaviour50 g weight saving compared to combination of SL7 stem and Rapide handlebarstested on the UCI World Tour by top sprintersergonomic fit with optimum wrist clearance, bend and flare like Rapide handlebarsfor electronic and mechanical shifting from Shimano, SRAM and Campagnolomounting option for Roval computer mount 1 x Specialized Roval Rapide handlebar stem unit1 x computer mount with inserts1 x GoPro mount

name: Specialized Roval Alpinist II Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Dive into the world of road cycling with the Roval Alpinist II Handlebar-Stem Unit from Specialized, a top-tier choice for enthusiasts and competitive riders alike. Crafted from high-quality carbon, this handlebar-stem unit is designed to elevate your riding experience on the road. Its sleek design features an Ahead style, ensuring compatibility with modern bike setups and a 1 1/8" stem clamp that guarantees a secure fit. With a reach of 75mm and a drop of 125mm, it provides an optimal balance between comfort and performance, allowing you to maintain an efficient riding position for longer periods. The subtle 4mm flare adds a touch of control and stability, especially when descending or navigating through tight corners. Moreover, the internal cable routing system not only contributes to the unit's aerodynamics but also keeps your cockpit clean and clutter-free. Whether you're pushing the pace on a solo ride or sprinting towards the finish line in a race, the Roval Alpinist II Handlebar-Stem Unit is engineered to deliver unparalleled performance and reliability on the road.

name: Blackheart Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Unleash your full potential on both gravel and road with this cutting-edge Carbon handlebar-stem combo by Blackheart, designed to elevate your riding experience to new heights. Crafted from premium carbon material, it promises not just exceptional durability but also an incredibly lightweight feel that makes every ride seem effortless. The handlebar features a reach of 77mm and a drop of 127mm, offering an optimal balance between comfort and aerodynamics for long rides and spirited sprints alike. With its sleek Ahead design, this handlebar integrates seamlessly with modern bike aesthetics, ensuring your ride not only performs well but looks great too. The internal cable routing system enhances the clean lines of your bike, reducing drag and protecting your cables from the elements. Elevate your cycling experience with this carbon handlebar, where every detail is designed to push your limits further.

name: Syncros Creston iC SL Aero Sprint Handlebar-Stem Unit
description: Get ready to elevate your road cycling experience with the Creston iC SL Aero Sprint Handlebar-Stem Unit by Syncros, designed specifically for the road. This one-piece carbon beauty integrates the handlebar and stem into a sleek, aerodynamic form that not only looks sharp but cuts through the air with ease. With a reach of 75mm and a drop of 125mm, it offers an aggressive positioning perfect for sprinting or pushing hard on the flats. The subtle 6-degree flare adds a touch of comfort for your wrists on longer rides. The stem clamp diameter of 1" ensures a secure fit on most road bikes. What sets this handlebar-stem unit apart is its internal cable routing, which not only enhances the aerodynamics but also gives your bike a clean, uncluttered look. Made from high-quality carbon, it promises not only to reduce the overall weight of your bike but also to absorb road vibrations, making your ride smoother and more enjoyable. Whether you're sprinting towards the finish line or enjoying a long day in the saddle, the Creston iC SL Aero Sprint Handlebar-Stem Unit is your ticket to a more efficient and comfortable ride.

name: Specialized Roval Control SL Carbon MTB Handlebar Stem Unit
description: The Specialized Roval Control SL carbon handlebar stem unit for a highly efficient MTB cockpit The Control SL handlebar stem unit, developed by Specialized and Roval, makes your mountain bike cockpit stiffer, lighter and more efficient. Whether in the Cross-Country World Cup or at your home race, the high-strength carbon fibres and competition-optimised geometry support bike control and push you forward. A handlebar width of 780 mm, which can be individually shortened, a choice of different stem lengths, a backsweep of 8° and a stem angle of minus 12 degrees ensure that you find the perfect riding position. super-light handlebar stem unit for cross-country usehigh-stiffness carbon fibres and race-proven geometry for more controlwidth, rise, stem length and sweep designed for the perfect riding positionmore efficient use of power and more confidence on technical descentsdeveloped in collaboration with the S-Racing Factory XC Teamwith markings for shortening to your individual handlebar widthtitanium bolts for weight savingmounting option for Roval computer mount 1 x Specialized Roval Control SL handlebar stem unit1 x computer mount1 x star nut set

name: Black Inc Aero Carbon Integrated Handlebar Stem Unit with Aerobars
description: The Aero Carbon handlebar stem unit from Black Inc with aerobars for even more efficiency on long rides The lightweight, ergonomic and very streamlined Aero Carbon handlebar stem unit from Black Inc is also available with pre-installed aerobars. It equips your Factor OSTRO V.A.M. with a cockpit that excels in speed, versatility and comfort in equal measure, be it for gravel racing, bikepacking or triathlon. The aerobars are the same than the ones mounted on the quick-as-lightning Hanzo TT Bike and can be easily removed if you want to switch to a standard set-up. The comfortable arm shells and aerodynamically optimised extensions help you achieve the most effective riding position over long distances. The extensions can be shortened at both ends and the inclination of the armrests is adjustable to meet your individual requirements. The handlebar stem unit itself has a flattened top bar that cuts through the airstream and also offers you a wide palm rest. Even if you use it without aerobars, you have the option of adopting many different hand and sitting positions or a crouched aero position to be as efficient as possible on the road. The mounting position for the shift/brake levers brings you about 5 mm closer to your bike than is the case with conventional handlebars. The drops with 7° flare offer you a lot of safety and control, not only on gravel sections. The internal cable routing, which is optimal for aerodynamics, also allows for a tidy cockpit. Below the handlebar stem unit is a mounting option for attaching bike computers or other accessories such as lights or GoPros. name: Black Inc Aero Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: The Aero Carbon handlebar stem unit by Black Inc - An integrated cockpit for road bike and gravel bike With the lightweight Aero Carbon handlebar stem unit by Black Inc, your Factor OSTRO V.A.M. - whether road or gravel - gets an integrated cockpit that is not only extremely aerodynamic, but also extremely ergonomic. The flattened upper handlebar cuts through the airstream and also offers you a wide palm rest. You have the option of many different hand positions and sitting postures. Attention was paid to a natural wrist angle to increase comfort while riding. The mounting position for the shift/brake levers brings you about 5 mm closer to your bike than is the case with conventional handlebars. You also have the option of adopting a semi-aerodynamic riding posture by positioning your hands on the hoods and resting your forearms on the upper handlebars. You are particularly aerodynamic while in the drops. With a 7° flare, they offer you a lot of safety when steering. Even on gravel sections you keep control of your bike. Internal cable routing, which also contributes to the high aerodynamics, ensures a tidy cockpit. Below the handlebar stem unit is a mounting option for attaching bike computers or other accessories such as lights or GoPros. Elegantly integrated, this is hardly noticeable and maintains the aerodynamic characteristics of your cockpit. name: DEDA Alanera RS DCR Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Dive into the world of premium biking with the Alanera RS DCR Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit from DEDA, this unit offers a blend of comfort and control, ensuring you're always in command, whether sprinting or cruising. The stem clamp diameter is a standard 1 1/8", guaranteeing a secure fit with most road bike stems, while the steerer clamp height stands at 43.5mm for a sleek, aerodynamic profile. Crafted from high-quality carbon, this handlebar is not only lightweight but also incredibly durable, ready to tackle the toughest of rides. The drop of 120mm allows for an aggressive riding position, perfect for those who like to push their limits. Thanks to the ahead design, installation is a breeze, letting you get back on the road in no time. One of the standout features is the internal cable routing, which not only enhances the clean look of your bike but also minimizes air resistance, giving you that extra edge over the competition. Whether you're upgrading your bike or setting up a new ride, this carbon handlebar stem unit is the perfect choice for road cyclists seeking performance, comfort, and style. Get ready to turn heads and push boundaries with every ride!

name: Syncros IC-R100-SL Handlebar-Stem Unit
description: Discover the IC-R100-SL Handlebar-Stem Unit by Syncros, designed specifically for road cycling enthusiasts who crave both performance and aesthetics. Crafted from high-quality carbon, this sleek handlebar-stem unit integrates seamlessly into your road bike, offering a streamlined look and feel. With a reach of 75mm and a drop of 125mm, it provides an optimal balance between comfort and aerodynamics, allowing you to tackle long distances and sprints with equal ease. The 6-degree flare ensures better control and wrist comfort during your ride, enhancing your overall cycling experience. The stem clamp diameter of 1 1/16" guarantees a secure fit with most road bike setups, ensuring stability and reliability. Moreover, the internal cable routing feature not only contributes to the clean aesthetics but also minimizes air resistance, giving you that extra edge over the competition. The ahead design of this unit speaks volumes about its modernity and focus on performance. Whether you're upgrading your bike or setting up a new build, the IC-R100-SL Handlebar-Stem Unit is a choice that promises to elevate your road cycling journey to new heights.

name: GEMINI PRÖPUS XC Lightweight -12 mm Handlebar-Stem Unit
description: Discover the PRÖPUS XC Lightweight carbon handlebar-stem unit for your next cross-country adventure. This high-quality handlebar is not only extremely light but also offers exceptional durability and stiffness. With a minimum width of 630 mm, you can adapt it perfectly to your needs for precise handling and control on the trails. The handlebar features a 7-degree backsweep and a 5-degree upsweep, providing an ergonomic hand position that helps prevent fatigue. Thanks to the neutral 0-degree rise, you maintain optimal control in every riding situation. The handlebar offset of -12 mm also enables a low, sporty riding position. Whether navigating technical trails or simply enjoying nature, this handlebar offers the ideal combination of performance and comfort. Get ready to take your cross-country rides to the next level.

name: Black Inc Carbon Integrated Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Black Inc Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit - For a streamlined cockpit The carbon handlebar stem unit by Black Inc gives your road bike more aerodynamics than a classic setup. With fully internal cable routing through both handlebars and stem, this integrated handlebar-stem design lets you streamline your bike. The rest of the equipment was also designed with aerodynamic advantages in mind. For example, there are grooves on the handlebars in which the shift and brake cables disappear. The stem angle of -6° favours a sporty riding style. With the 125 mm drop and 80 mm reach you have optimal control of your bike in all riding positions. name: Black Inc HB04 Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: The HB04 carbon handlebar-stem unit from Black Inc is specifically designed for road racing and brings you straight into pole position with its high-quality carbon construction. With a reach of 75 mm and a drop of 116 mm, it is perfectly tailored to give you an optimal position on your road bike. The internal cable routing ensures a clean look and reduces aerodynamic drag. A 7-degree flare provides additional stability in corners, while a 3-degree backsweep supports an ergonomic hand position. The steerer clamp fits 1 1/8" steerer tubes, ensuring wide compatibility with most road bike forks. The carbon material not only offers a premium appearance but also delivers impressive stiffness at a low weight. With this handlebar-stem unit, you will experience a new level of control and comfort on your road rides. Get the performance you need to shine on the road.

name: Black Inc HB05 Carbon Handlebar Stem Unit
description: Dive into the gravel scene with the HB05 carbon handlebar-stem unit from Black Inc, designed specifically for gravel adventures. Crafted from high-quality carbon, this handlebar-stem unit promises not just superior durability but also a significant reduction in weight, making your ride smoother and faster. With a reach of 75mm and a flare of 17 degrees, it offers an optimized riding position for both comfort and control on rough terrains. The 116mm drop and 3 degrees backsweep ensure that you maintain a natural hand position, reducing fatigue on long rides. Its 1 1/8" stem clamp size is compatible with most modern gravel bikes, ensuring a seamless fit. The ahead design is sleek and functional, enhancing the aerodynamics of your setup. Plus, with internal cable routing, you can keep your cables neatly tucked away, reducing drag and maintaining a clean aesthetic. Whether you're tackling a challenging gravel path or enjoying a scenic backroad, this handlebar-stem unit will elevate your riding experience. Get ready to push your limits and explore new terrains with confidence and style.

name: RockShox TwistLoc Ultimate Remote 3 Position Twist Grip
description: The TwistLoc Ultimate Remote twist grip from RockShox with 3 positions for remote control of suspension fork and shock With the RockShox TwistLoc Ultimate Remote 3-position twist grip you precisely control your remote-controlled suspension parts - fork or shock or both together. The grippy textured surface lets you stay in control in any situation. Alternatively, a grip with a smooth, soft profile is included for the remote side. With a turn backwards by 7 mm you change to platform mode, after another 7 mm to lock mode. To open the damper again, turn in the other direction. This allows you to react quickly on the trail, keep your hands safely on the handlebars at all times and save space on the cockpit. Thanks to the indicator on the rotating part, you can always see which mode you are in. The swivel part can also be detached from the handle and attached without it. It is installed on the left side. For the right side of the handlebars, you also get a textured handlebar grip that matches the look.

name: RockShox Fender for ZEB Suspension Fork
description: The fender for ZEB by RockShox forms a unit with your suspension fork The short RockShox fender for ZEB is a fender that eliminates the need for cable ties and fuses with your ZEB suspension fork to form a single optical unit. There are screw holders on the connecting bridge of the fork to which you can attach the fender. ZEB A1 suspension fork as of 2021 simple 3-bolt mounting without cable tiesclean transition to the suspension fork 00.4318.047.000 1 x RockShox fender for ZEB3 x bolts

name: RockShox Vivid Ultimate RC2T Trunnion Shock
description: The RockShox Vivid Ultimate rear shock with trunnion mount and RC2T damping for mountain bikes on a gravity mission The Vivid Ultimate air shock from RockShox with RC2T damping is designed for enduro and downhill bikes with trunnion mount. It offers steel coil-like behaviour, but combines it with versatile adjustability. The RC2T damping allows you to tune the high- and low-speed compression and rebound. For quick adjustment while you're riding, use the 2-position lever to switch between Open and Firm. Thanks to the TouchDown technology, you get exactly the support you need in every travel section. The shock is also equipped with adjustable hydraulic bottom out as standard. Compared to the Super Deluxe Air, the Vivid has a larger air chamber and a stronger chassis, which results in more oil volume, i.e. better heat management, and more bushing overlap, i.e. lower friction. The Vivid is also suitable for e-bikes. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. air shock for enduro and downhill bikes with trunnion mountRC2T damping with high- and low-speed compression adjustment allows precise tuningwith 2-position compression lever (Open / Firm)high bandwidth external rebound adjustment in 20 clickssmooth ride feel at the beginning of the travel and consistent, stable damping in the middle of the travel thanks to TouchDown technologyadjustable, hydraulic bottom out with five compression settings for the last 20 % of travelhidden 3 mm hexagon socket in the rebound adjuster, can be used to adjust high-speed compression and hydraulic bottom outVivid Air with DebonAir technology, behaves like steel coil shocklong-lasting Maxima Plush damping oil for less friction and good responseeasy to maintain: no special tools needed for servicingimproved dust seal, thus service interval increased to 100 hoursalso suitable for e-bikesone volume spacer installedLockout Force X2Check Tune 0 - Light TouchDown The TouchDown damping system features three compression zones. The first 10 % of suspension travel is characterised by fine response and little damping, which absorbs vibrations. Between 10 and 80 % of travel, you benefit from controlled, stable compression. For the last 20 % of travel, you can adjust the hydraulic bottom out to the track ahead. 1 x RockShox Vivid Ultimate RC2T Trunnion rear shock

name: ÖHLINS TTX 22 M Rear shock with spring 548 lbs - Workshop packaging
description: Unleash your Downhill, Enduro, and MTB adventures with the TTX 22 M rear shock with a 548 lbs spring by ÖHLINS, designed to elevate your ride to the next level. Crafted with a robust stainless steel shaft and a durable aluminum housing, this shock absorber stands up to the toughest trails and conditions. Its Twin Tube (TTX) damping system ensures unparalleled stability and control, allowing you to push your limits with confidence. The coil spring suspension delivers smooth, responsive performance, making every descent more exhilarating. With a Trunnion shock mount, installation and compatibility are a breeze, ensuring a perfect fit for your ride. Whether you're shredding down steep hills or navigating technical trails, the TTX 22 M shock absorber provides the performance and reliability you need. Its precision engineering and high-quality materials guarantee lasting durability and performance. Get ready to experience unmatched ride quality and control, without the need for a remote. Upgrade your bike with Öhlins' cutting-edge technology and take your riding experience to new heights. This shock absorber is your ticket to dominating every trail with ease and style.

name: Cane Creek Air IL G2 Double Barrel Air Shock
description: The Cane Creek Air IL G2 Double Barrel air shock with wide adjustability The Air IL G2 Double Barrel air shock from Cane Creek impresses above all with its proven Twin Tube design and the resulting wide range of adjustment options. In contrast to the previous model, it is significantly slimmer and stronger with an improved driving feel. Thanks to the Twin Tube, you can make independent modifications to the high and low-speed compression stages as well as to the high and low-speed rebound stages. Use the tool hidden in the Climb Switch for this. The Climb Switch lever also allows you to quickly adjust the position for uphill passages in order to suppress the typical bobbing of the rear triangle. This influences not only the low-speed compression stage, but also the low-speed rebound stage to give you the best experience. trunnion air shock with externally and independently adjustable high- and low-speed compression and rebound stageswide setting rangeoptimised thermal management and maximum controlbetter fit: 17 mm slimmer valve body (50.5 mm) and 6 mm smaller outer diameter than the predecessor modeloptimised air spring for better ride and more compact designhigher maximum air pressure than the predecessor modelreinforced inner damper tubemore precise preload tuning thanks to additional locks on the preload collarClimb Switch lever for reduced bobbing in uphill off-road passagesintegrated tool in the Climb Switch lever for adjustmentsDouble Barrel Twin Tube technology for optimised oil flowoil circuit through four valveshand-built and tested in North Carolina, USA 1 x Cane Creek Air IL G2 Double Barrel air shock

name: RockShox Vivid Coil Ultimate RC2T Damper
description: Dive into the world of All Mountain, Enduro, and MTB with the Vivid Coil Ultimate RC2T Damper by RockShox, a suspension that's designed to elevate your ride. This damper is built with a robust steel bushing and an aluminum housing, ensuring durability and lightweight performance on the most challenging trails. The coil spring suspension paired with the RC2T damping system gives you unparalleled control over both high-speed and low-speed compression, allowing you to fine-tune your ride to perfection. With rebound damping capabilities, every descent will feel smoother, and every jump will be met with confidence. This damper isn't just about rugged performance; it's also E-Bike ready, supporting E-Bikes & Pedelecs up to 25 km/h, making it a versatile choice for all your cycling adventures. The standard shock mount system ensures compatibility with a wide range of bikes, simplifying the installation process. Whether you're pushing the limits on an Enduro track or enjoying a day out on the mountain, the Vivid Coil Ultimate RC2T Damper is your ticket to a more responsive, enjoyable ride. Note that this high-performance damper does not come with a remote, emphasizing its focus on direct, hands-on control for the rider seeking a pure and unfiltered biking experience.

name: RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 3P Solo Air Shock
description: The RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 3P Solo Air rear shock with 3-position adjustment for enjoying fast rides on cross-country trails This Ultimate-level RockShox SIDLuxe air shock offers 3-position compression adjustment via a lever at the rear shock and is recommended for cross-country race bikes. Above all, it is made for speed. The Solo Air air spring provides more linear spring characteristics. In addition to the tried and tested " Open" position for high-speed descents and " Lock" for sprints, where you need an efficient power transmission, the third " Pedal" position offers you the sweet spot in between for technical climbs where you need propulsion but also comfort. Thanks to the increased oil flow, the high-speed compression (in the open and pedal positions) in particular reacts quickly to unexpected hits. As a result, the bottom-out bumper is also larger and has a conical shape so that you retain control near the full suspension travel. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. air shock with 3-position lever for full-suspension cross-country race bikes3 compression settings (Open / Pedal / Lock), which can be selected via a leverPedal position for technical climbs, Open position for descents, Lock position for sprintsexternal rebound adjustment with 11 clicksincreased oil flow for lightning-fast response to sudden impactslarger, tapered bottom-out bumper for better control near full travellight and efficientwith Solo Air air spring for more linear spring characteristicsharmonises perfectly with SID or SID SL 3P suspension forksalso suitable for e-bikes1 volume spacer installedPedal Tune M8Lockout Force X8Check Tune STD 1 x RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 3P Solo Air rear shock

name: Fox Racing Shox Float X2 2POS Performance Elite Shock
description: Get ready to elevate your downhill, enduro, and MTB rides with the Float X2 2POS Performance Elite Shock from Fox Racing Shox. This air suspension shock is engineered for the most demanding trails and features a cutting-edge X2 damping system that ensures a smooth and controlled ride. With its high-speed and low-speed rebound damping, you can fine-tune your ride to match your style and the terrain. The 2-position compression damping adjustment allows for quick changes between settings, optimizing performance on the fly. Crafted with a durable aluminum housing and plastic bushing material, this shock is built to withstand the rigors of aggressive riding. The shock mount is standard, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of bikes. Despite its robust capabilities, it requires no remote and supports a maximum air pressure of 300 psi, with a shaft diameter of 12.7mm, making it a versatile choice for serious riders. Whether you're tackling steep descents or technical trails, the Float X2 2POS Performance Elite Shock is your ticket to a superior suspension experience.

name: Fox Racing Shox Float X2 2POS Factory Shock
description: Experience the ultimate ride with the Float X2 2POS Factory Shock from Fox Racing Shox, designed specifically for downhill, enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. This high-performance shock combines a robust aluminum housing with a plastic bushing material to deliver unmatched durability and responsiveness on the most challenging terrains. Its air suspension system ensures a plush, comfortable ride, while the X2 damping system with high-speed and low-speed rebound damping allows you to fine-tune your ride to perfection. With a 2-position adjust compression damping, you can easily switch between modes to adapt to varying trail conditions. The shock's maximum air pressure of 300 psi and a shaft diameter of 12.70 mm provide the stability and control you need for aggressive riding. Plus, its standard shock mount system makes installation a breeze. Whether you're shredding down steep descents or navigating technical enduro trails, the Float X2 2POS Factory Shock is your go-to for a superior suspension experience that will elevate your mountain biking adventures.

name: RockShox Super Deluxe Ultimate Coil RTR shock for Commencal Meta V4.2
description: Performance without compromise: the Super Deluxe Ultimate Coil RTR Shock by RockShox The Super Deluxe Ultimate Coil rear shock was developed for the latest generation of enduro and trail bikes. Thanks to the Maxima Plush Fluid for even more riding performance, an adjustable platform for high drive efficiency and adjustable compression damping, the shock can be precisely adjusted to every trail, yet still offers that unmistakable steel coil feeling. This combination, unique to steel coil shocks, is now a reality - all the advantages of the steel coil, but with a significantly wider range of applications. name: RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 3P Solo Air Remote Shock
description: The RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 3P Solo Air Remote rear shock with 3-position adjustment for XC races This Ultimate-level RockShox SIDLuxe air shock offers 3-position compression adjustment via remote and is recommended for cross-country race bikes. Above all, it is made for speed. The Solo Air air spring provides more linear spring characteristics. In addition to the tried and tested " Open" position for high-speed descents and " Lock" for sprints, where you need an efficient power transmission, the third " Pedal" position offers you the sweet spot in between for technical climbs where you need propulsion but also comfort. Thanks to the increased oil flow, the high-speed compression (in the open and pedal positions) in particular reacts quickly to unexpected hits. As a result, the bottom-out bumper is also larger and has a conical shape so that you retain control near the full suspension travel. A matching TwistLoc remote twist grip is not included, so it is best to directly order it together with the shock. Please note that if you combine the shock with a remote suspension fork, this must also have 3-position adjustment for the remote control of both elements to work. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Marzocchi Bomber CR A Performance Shock
description: Unleash the full potential of your ride with the Performance Line shock, designed to elevate your All Mountain, MTB, Downhill, and Enduro adventures. Crafted with a robust aluminum housing and a durable steel shaft, this shock is built to withstand the rigors of the trail. The coil spring suspension ensures a smooth, responsive ride, allowing you to tackle rough terrain with confidence. With the 3CR damping system, you have the control needed to fine-tune your ride, featuring low-speed compression damping to absorb impacts and rebound damping to keep your wheels planted on the ground. The plastic bushing material offers a reliable connection without adding unnecessary weight, ensuring your setup remains lightweight and efficient. This shock is a testament to durability and performance, without the need for a remote or electronic adjustments, keeping your focus on the trail ahead. Whether you're climbing steep hills or descending technical trails, the Performance Line shock is your key to unlocking new levels of performance and enjoyment on your bike.

name: RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 2P Solo Air Remote Shock
description: The RockShox SIDLuxe Ultimate 2P Solo Air Remote rear shock with 2-position adjustment for cross-country riders enjoying speed This Ultimate-level RockShox SIDLuxe air shock offers 2-position compression adjustment via remote and is recommended for cross-country race bikes. Above all, it is made for speed. The Solo Air air spring provides more linear spring characteristics. Choose between the two proven positions: " Open" for full damping on high-speed descents and " Lock" for sprints, where you need an efficient power transmission without suspension bobbing. Thanks to the increased oil flow, the high-speed compression (in the open and pedal positions) in particular reacts quickly to unexpected hits. As a result, the bottom-out bumper is also larger and has a conical shape so that you retain control near the full suspension travel. A matching TwistLoc remote twist grip is not included, so it is best to directly order it together with the shock. Please note that if you combine the shock with a remote suspension fork, this must also have 2-position adjustment for the remote control of both elements to work. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: RockShox Rear Shock Vivid Coil Ultimate DH RC2
description: Experience the ultimate in downhill and MTB performance with the Rear Shock Vivid Coil Ultimate DH RC2 by RockShox, designed specifically for your adrenaline-pumping rides. This rear shock combines the robustness of a steel bushing material with the lightweight and durable aluminum housing, ensuring your ride is both smooth and reliable. The coil spring suspension system provides unmatched responsiveness and control, allowing you to tackle the most challenging terrains with ease. With the RC2 damping system, you get the best of both worlds in compression damping - high-speed and low-speed adjustments are at your fingertips, offering unparalleled customization of your ride's feel and response. Plus, the added rebound damping feature enhances your control over the bike, ensuring you can quickly recover and maintain speed after every bump or jump. This rear shock doesn't come with a remote, emphasizing a straightforward, hands-on approach to adjustments, making it perfect for riders who prefer to fine-tune their setup directly on the shock. Whether you're shredding down mountains or navigating technical downhill trails, the Rear Shock Vivid Coil Ultimate DH RC2 is your go-to for a top-tier suspension upgrade, promising to elevate your mountain biking experience to new heights.

name: RockShox Shock absorber
description: Eager downhill: the RockShox Vivid Ultimate rear shock with RC2T damping for the Specialized Enduro mountain bike from 2020 onwards This Vivid Ultimate air shock from RockShox with RC2T damping is suitable for use with your full-suspension Enduro from Specialized. It offers steel coil-like behaviour, but combines it with versatile adjustability. The RC2T damping allows you to tune the high- and low-speed compression and rebound. For quick adjustment while you're riding, use the 2-position lever to switch between Open and Firm. Thanks to the TouchDown technology, you get exactly the support you need in every travel section. The shock is also equipped with adjustable hydraulic bottom out as standard. Compared to the Super Deluxe Air, the Vivid has a larger air chamber and a stronger chassis, which results in more oil volume, i.e. better heat management, and more bushing overlap, i.e. lower friction. Suitable mounting hardware is included. Specialized Enduro from 2020 model air shock for the Enduro mountain bike from SpecializedRC2T damping with high- and low-speed compression adjustment allows precise tuningwith 2-position compression lever (Open / Firm)high bandwidth external rebound adjustment in 20 clickssmooth ride feel at the beginning of the travel and consistent, stable damping in the middle of the travel thanks to TouchDown technologyadjustable, hydraulic bottom out with five compression settings for the last 20% of travelhidden 3 mm hexagon socket in the rebound adjuster, can be used to adjust high-speed compression and hydraulic bottom outVivid Air with DebonAir technology, behaves like steel coil shocklong-lasting Maxima Plush damping oil for less friction and good responseeasy to maintain: no special tools needed for servicingimproved dust seal, thus service interval increased to 100 hourstwo volume spacers installedLockout Force X2Check Tune 0 - Light TouchDown The TouchDown damping system features three compression zones. The first 10 % of suspension travel is characterised by fine response and little damping, which absorbs vibrations. Between 10 and 80 % of travel, you benefit from controlled, stable compression. For the last 20 % of travel, you can adjust the hydraulic bottom out to the track ahead. 00.4118.421,040 1 x RockShox Vivid Ultimate RC2T rear shock3 x RockShox Bottomless Token volume spacer3 x RockShox decals

name: H&R Bike Performance Spring Steel Spring up to 65 mm Stroke
description: The H&R Bike Performance Spring steel spring for rear shocks up to 65 mm stroke The Performance Spring steel spring from H&R Bike is suitable for steel coil shocks with a stroke of 50 to 65 mm. It's an essential upgrade for riders looking to push their limits and improve their mountain biking skills. Installation is straightforward, allowing you to get back on the trail in no time. Experience the difference in your ride quality and overall performance with this essential MTB component. name: Shimano GRX RX400 2x10 30-46 Groupset
description: The Shimano GRX RX400 2x10 groupset was invented for explorers With the GRX RX400 2x10 groupset, Shimano equips you with affordable top-level components developed specifically for the Gravel scene and in collaboration with Gravel specialists. RX400 is aimed at the followers of the good old 10-speed circuit. Included in the groupset is a 2x10-speed crankset with 30-46 teeth, a front derailleur, rear derailleur, disc brake with STI shift levers 10-speed right and 2x left as well as a cassette (MTB) and a chain. A package to ride off, discover, have fun. Are you interested in the GRX series? Then have a look at our Shimano gravel site . You will find many more products there. The bottom bracket is not included. name: Shimano GRX RX820 1x12 42 Groupset
description: The Shimano GRX RX820 1x12-speed groupset with 42-tooth chainring - unbeatable and unstoppable The Shimano RX820 is a gravel-specific 1x12-speed groupset with a 42-tooth chainring and mountain bike cassette. The single chainring set-up is suitable for those who like things to be uncomplicated and are looking for an all-purpose crank for exploring, racing, high-speed sections and mountain crossings. In keeping with the slogan " unbeatable" , combine it with a 10-45 tooth cassette if you enjoy competing and appreciate weight savings. Or you can choose an " unstoppable" 10-51 tooth cassette if you love adventures with steep climbs and comfort is important to you. In both cases, you will benefit from the reliability, durability and simplicity of the GRX RX820. With this groupset, Shimano has once again expanded the range of its gravel components to reflect the spirit, individuality, sense of freedom and community of gravel enthusiasts. The groupset also includes a shift lever for the right, a brake lever for the left, the matching rear derailleur, a Quick-Link chain and flat-mount disc brakes. name: Shimano GRX RX820 1x12 40 Groupset
description: The Shimano GRX RX820 1x12-speed groupset with 40-tooth chainring - unbeatable and unstoppable The Shimano RX820 is a gravel-specific 1x12-speed groupset with a 40-tooth chainring and mountain bike cassette. The single chainring set-up is suitable for those who like things to be uncomplicated and are looking for an all-purpose crank for exploring, racing, high-speed sections and mountain crossings. In keeping with the slogan " unbeatable" , combine it with a 10-45 tooth cassette if you enjoy competing and appreciate weight savings. Or you can choose an " unstoppable" 10-51 tooth cassette if you love adventures with steep climbs and comfort is important to you. In both cases, you will benefit from the reliability, durability and simplicity of the GRX RX820. With this groupset, Shimano has once again expanded the range of its gravel components to reflect the spirit, individuality, sense of freedom and community of gravel enthusiasts. The groupset also includes a shift lever for the right, a brake lever for the left, the matching rear derailleur, a Quick-Link chain and flat-mount disc brakes.
