name: Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 R9250 Powermeter Group 2x12 36-52 with Disc Brake
description: The Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 R9250 2x12-speed Groupset with 36-52 Power Meter Crank and Disc Brake makes no compromises The Dura-Ace Di2 R9250 Road groupset by Shimano consists of a 2x12-speed power meter crank with 36-52 tooth gradation, a flat-mount disc brake set and an electronic rear derailleur and front derailleur for semi-wireless shifting. Of course, a rechargeable battery, a Quick-Link chain and a cassette with 11-30 or 11-34 teeth are also included. Shimano has uncompromisingly designed the Dura-Ace R9250 for speed and performance. User-friendliness, efficiency and safety also played a major role in development. That's why the groupset works without cables at the crucial point, namely the interaction between STIs and rear derailleur. Cables are only used between the battery and the rear derailleur or front derailleur. The wireless protocol is extremely fast and reliable, which raises the shifting speed to a new level - with consistently high precision. A twelfth sprocket on the cassette in combination with a very clever gradation means that you have a wider gear selection at your disposal, and are optimally prepared for any terrain. In addition, Hyperglide+ technology familiar in MTB sport ensures smooth gliding of the chain even under loads. Conveniently, the Dura-Ace 12-speed cassettes are also compatible with older Shimano road freehubs. Last but not least, the disc brakes have been thoroughly revised and equipped with servo-wave technology. This way, the full braking power is not only available more quickly, but can also be modulated better. A simplified bleeding process and more free space for the brake pads are further advantages. The crank comes with integrated power measurement on both sides, which boasts an even higher accuracy than before, with a deviation of only 1.5%. The power meter functions with a built-in battery that is charged via the same cable as the derailleur battery. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . performance measurement cranks (power meter)battery mounting internally in the seatpost (adapter required), running time approx. 1000 kmCR1632 battery in STI for wireless shiftingfront derailleur with more compact design than previous model, connected to battery via cablerear derailleur with wireless chip, LED display, charging socket and function button, connected to battery via cable10% more clearance for the brake pads The following components are still required for the Dura-Ace Di2 R9250/70 groupset's semi-wireless start-up: Bottom Bracket: Shimano recommendsBB-R9100orSM-BB92-41B PressfitHollowtech II.2 xRT-MT900brake rotors (140 or 160 mm)2 xEW-SD300-Ipower cables: 1 x from battery to front derailleur (max. 1500 mm) and 1 x from battery to rear derailleur (max. 1700 mm)*recommended: rubber grommets for internal cable routingif required, FM-to-FM brake adapterSM-MA-R160 D/Dfor 160 mm brake rotors on 140 mm FM frameif necessary, brake caliper bolts for 20 and 30 mm frame diameter (Type CandType C2) * To determine the correct cable lengths, the bike must be measured as follows: Distance between battery and front derailleurDistance between battery and rear derailleur = distance between battery and bottom bracket + distance between bottom bracket and rear derailleur Completely wired installation via the EW-JC304 junction box is also possible. You can find more information in the Shimano manual or contact our service staff. Shimano Dura-Ace R9250 Di2 2x12 Power Meter 36-52 groupset, consisting of: 1 x Shimano Dura-Ace Power Meter crankset (FC-R9200-P)1 x Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 rear derailleur (RD-R9250)1 x Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 front derailleur (FD-R9250)1 x Shimano Di2 battery (BT-DN300)2 x Shimano Di2 charging cables (EW-EC300)1 x Shimano Dura-Ace cassette (CS-R9200)1 x Shimano XTR Quick-Link chain (CN-M9100)1 x pair Shimano Dura-Ace Disc Brakes (BR-R9270 + Di2 ST-R9270), front and rear1 x Shimano SM-BH90-JK-SSR brake hose, 1000 mm (front)1 x Shimano SM-BH90-JK-SSR brake hose, 1700 mm (rear)2 x pairs Shimano brake pads1 x disc brake adapter for front 140/160 mm2 x hose connection set with olive (mounted) and insert pin2 x type A caliper bolts for front wheel2 x caliper bolts for 25 mm frame diameters, rear wheel1 x Shimano aluminium cassette lockring1 x Shimano master link1 x Shimano TL-EW300 cable tool1 x Shimano crank bolt1 x Shimano TL-FC40 crank tool2 x CR1632 for STIs batterybrake set ready for assembly, filled,bleedingis recommended after assembly

name: SRAM GX Eagle Transmission Upgrade Kit
description: Elevate your mountain biking experience with the SRAM GX Eagle Transmission Upgrade Kit for the Eagle 70 and 90 series, designed for the passionate all-mountain, cross country, enduro, and MTB riders. This cutting-edge 12-speed shifting system is not just electronic but also wireless, promising a seamless and efficient gear change like never before. Powered by a robust lithium battery, it ensures long-lasting performance on even the most challenging terrains. The Eagle series is all about pushing the limits of what's possible on two wheels, offering precision, reliability, and the ultimate freedom of movement. With its electronic shift system, riders can expect instant response times and a smoother ride, no matter the trail conditions. It's tailored for those who demand the best in technology and performance, making every ride more enjoyable and thrilling. This system is not just about speed; it's about enhancing the overall cycling experience, providing riders with the confidence to tackle more adventurous trails. Whether you're scaling steep inclines or navigating technical descents, the Eagle series ensures you're always in control. Embrace the future of mountain biking with this innovative and powerful shifting system, designed to take your riding to new heights.

name: Shimano Shifting upgrade kit
description: Elevate your mountain biking experience with the Shimano Deore XT Di2 M8250, RD-M 8250-SGS set, a cutting-edge, wireless 12-speed shifting system designed for All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. This system is powered by a robust lithium battery, ensuring long-lasting performance on even the most challenging terrains. With its sleek trigger / I-Spec EV shift lever, shifting gears is not only seamless but also incredibly intuitive, allowing you to focus on the trail ahead. The wireless shift system offers unparalleled convenience and reliability, eliminating the need for cables and ensuring a clean, streamlined setup. Whether you're tackling steep climbs or technical descents, this system provides smooth, precise shifting every time. Perfect for riders who demand the best in technology and performance, this system is a game-changer for those looking to push their limits and enhance their riding experience. Its compatibility with a wide range of MTB disciplines makes it a versatile choice for adventurers who crave versatility and efficiency. Get ready to experience the future of cycling technology, where every shift is a step towards mastering your mountain biking skills.

name: SRAM X0 Eagle T-Type V2 DUB Wide AXS 1x12-speed Upgrade Kit
description: Experience the thrill of the X0 Eagle T-Type V2 DUB Wide AXS 1x12-speed Upgrade Kit by SRAM, designed specifically for the all mountain, cross country, enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. This cutting-edge upgrade kit transforms your ride with its 12-speed (electronic, wireless) shifting, ensuring seamless gear changes on any terrain. Its wireless shift system offers a clutter-free setup, allowing you to focus on the trail ahead. The shift lever features a controller/clamp (closed) design, providing an ergonomic interface for effortless shifting. Tailored for the X0 series, this kit embodies high-quality craftsmanship and innovation. Whether you're climbing steep hills or navigating technical descents, the X0 Eagle T-Type V2 DUB Wide AXS ensures precision and reliability. Upgrade your bike with this kit and experience the freedom to explore more challenging trails with confidence. It's time to elevate your mountain biking experience with the seamless integration and performance of the X0 Eagle T-Type V2 DUB Wide AXS 1x12-speed Upgrade Kit.

name: Shimano XTR Di2 M9250 GS shifting upgrade set
description: Elevate Your Ride with Shimano XTR Di2 M9250 GS shifting upgrade set Experience the Shimano XTR Di2 M9250 GS shifting upgrade set, designed for the All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiast seeking unparalleled performance. Shimano's commitment to innovation shines through in this cutting-edge 12-speed electronic and wireless shifting system, ensuring seamless gear changes for a smoother, more efficient ride. The XTR series is synonymous with reliability and durability, making this upgrade set a perfect choice for riders who demand the best in their quest for off-road excellence. The set includes a trigger-style shift lever with a closed clamp for a secure, intuitive control right at your fingertips. Wireless shifting technology not only reduces the clutter on your bike but also offers quick, precise shifts with minimal effort. This upgrade is all about enhancing your riding experience, allowing you to focus on the trail ahead rather than worrying about gear adjustments. Whether you're tackling steep climbs, technical descents, or long stretches of fast singletrack, the Shimano XTR Di2 M9250 GS shifting upgrade set provides the performance and reliability you need to push your limits. It's designed to work seamlessly with your bike, offering easy installation and compatibility with a wide range of setups. Upgrade your ride with Shimano and experience the difference that professional-grade components can make.

name: Shimano Deore Di2 Shifting Upgrade Set M6250, RD-M6250-SGS + SW-M6250-IR
description: Discover freedom on the trails with the Shimano Deore Di2 shifting upgrade set M6250, RD-M6250-SGS + SW-M6250-IR, featuring a wireless shift lever and rear derailleur designed specifically for all-mountain, cross-country, enduro, and general mountain biking. The integration of I-Spec EV for the switch enhances compatibility with various handlebar setups and ensures seamless cockpit integration. Wireless technology simplifies installation and reduces your bike's weight, helping you ride faster and more efficiently on demanding trails. Whether you're conquering steep climbs or taking on fast descents, this set gives you the control and confidence you need.

name: Shimano Shifting Upgrade Set XTR Di2 M9250, RD-M9250-SGS, SW-M9250-IR
description: The XTR Di2 M9250 shifting upgrade set from Shimano revolutionizes the riding experience for All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. With its innovative wireless 12-speed drivetrain, it delivers exceptional performance on any trail and sets new standards for precision and reliability. Whether you're riding All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, or tackling technical MTB terrain – the XTR drivetrain, with its trigger shifter and I-Spec EV integration, ensures seamless and intuitive shifting. Powered by a high-quality lithium battery, the system offers fast and accurate gear changes – completely cable-free. This technical masterpiece is ideal not only for ambitious riders pushing their limits, but also for those who appreciate clean aesthetics and a tidy cockpit. The XTR Di2 upgrade set is the perfect choice for anyone who refuses to compromise and demands the best wireless shifting technology on the market.

An optional information display is also included. This setup is just right for you if you are an ambitious rider and maybe even take part in occasional races. Upgrade your ride with this state-of-the-art shifting system and experience the future of cycling technology today.

name: Suntour NCX SP12 Suspension Seatpost w/ Finger Guard
description: The SP12-NCX suspension seatpost brings extra comfort to your bike with its 50 mm of travel. This evolution of the popular Suntour SP8 can be moved up and down as well as back and forth. Thanks to a revised bearing of the parallelogram system and the use of high-quality stainless steel bushings, side play is minimised. Every 6 months or after 500 km the following points should be carried out: 1. Remove the seat post from your bike. 2. Loosen the adjusting bolt and pull out the spring. 3. Clean the seatpost inside and outside. 4. Lubricate the seat post inside and outside (use the suspension fork lubricant from SR SUNTOUR) Lubricate the pressure roller. You should also oil the joints. SR SUNTOUR recommends the use of Brunox Deo suspension fork spray. It helps to flush away impurities and lubricates the seat post joints. 27.2 mm: Diameter: 27.2 mmlength: 350 mmSuspension Travel: 48 mm 30.9 mm: Diameter: 30.9 mmlength: 350 mmSuspension Travel: 48 mm 31.6 mm: Diameter: 31.6 mmlength: 350 mmSuspension Travel: 48 mm 1 x SR SUNTOUR NCX SP12 suspension seatpost1 xfinger guard

description: The Ergon CF Allroad Pro Carbon Leaf Spring Seatpost - Comfortably lightweight for high-performance The CF Allroad Pro seatpost by Ergon consists of two carbon leaf springs and is perfectly suited for performance-oriented gravel and road use. name: REVERSE Components Seatswitch Type 1 Saddle Angle Adjuster
description: The Seatswitch saddle angle adjuster from REVERSE Components allows you to effortlessly change your saddle tilt by up to 6 degrees during your next All Mountain, Cross Country or Enduro ride – easily on the go. With a quick movement of the lever, you can instantly adapt the angle and stay agile no matter what the trail throws at you. Especially on climbs, the lowered saddle nose improves your riding position. Your pelvis tilts further forward, resulting in a more stable posture and a more even weight distribution between handlebar and saddle. This increases pressure on the rear wheel, enhancing traction on steep sections. By adjusting the saddle angle correctly, you increase comfort on long rides and reduce pressure on sensitive areas. The Seatswitch is the perfect addition to your dropper post, promoting a healthier riding position in the long run while also relieving pressure.

name: OneUp Components V3 210 mm Dropper Post
description: OneUp Components V3 210 mm dropper post - compact, light and very flexible The V3 210 mm dropper post from OneUp Components is a super-light and extremely compact adjustable seatpost for your mountain bike. It offers a continuously adjustable 210 mm stroke, which can easily be reduced by 10 or 20 mm using the metal pins supplied. With its remarkably low, further reduced stack height and total length, it continues the success story of its multiple award-winning predecessors V1 and V2. OneUp Components has reduced the weight by a further 60 to 70 grams and further improved the function. The SKF seals with very low friction and the updated IGUS bushings ensure a lower breakaway torque and smoother operation than ever before. In addition, the bushing overlap has been increased to extend the service life. The uncomplicated maintenance without special tools also speaks for itself. An easy-to-operate remote lever with a non-slip, replaceable thumb pad and practical cable connection is available separately. name: crankbrothers Highline XC/Gravel 125 mm Seatpost
description: The crankbrothers Highline XC/Gravel dropper post with 125 mm of travel and 27.2 mm diameter is a dropper with infinite adjustment. name: crankbrothers Highline 11 125 mm adjustable seat post
description: Get ready to elevate your ride with the Highline 11 125 mm adjustable seat post, a game-changer for All Mountain, Cross Country, and MTB enthusiasts. This marvel from crankbrothers is crafted from robust aluminum, ensuring durability and a sleek finish that stands out on any trail. Its 125 mm of travel gives you the flexibility to tackle varied terrains with ease, adjusting your saddle height on-the-fly for optimal performance and comfort. The mechanical control system is a nod to reliability and precision, allowing for smooth adjustments without the fuss. Plus, with internal cable routing, your bike maintains a clean, streamlined look, minimizing the risk of snagging cables on rough rides. Compatible with saddle rails of 7 x 7 mm (Standard) and 7 x 9 mm (High Oval), it offers versatility to fit your preferred saddle. Whether you're pushing limits on rugged mountain trails or enjoying a serene cross-country ride, the Highline 11 125 mm adjustable seat post is your ticket to a more enjoyable and controlled cycling experience.

name: OneUp Components V3 120 mm Dropper Post
description: OneUp Components V3 120 mm dropper post - compact, light and very flexible The V3 120 mm dropper post from OneUp Components is a super-light and extremely compact adjustable seatpost for your mountain or gravel bike. It offers a continuously adjustable 120 mm stroke, which can easily be reduced by 10 or 20 mm using the metal pins supplied. With its remarkably low, further reduced stack height and total length, it continues the success story of its multiple award-winning predecessors V1 and V2. OneUp Components has reduced the weight by a further 60 to 70 grams and further improved the function. The SKF seals with very low friction and the updated IGUS bushings ensure a lower breakaway torque and smoother operation than ever before. The uncomplicated maintenance without special tools also speaks for itself. An easy-to-operate remote lever with a non-slip, replaceable thumb pad and practical cable connection is available separately. If you want to vary the saddle height quickly, flexibly and without a lot of extra weight and a range of 100 to 120 mm appeals to you, the V3 dropper post with 120 mm stroke is just right for you. very light, compactly designed dropper post with up to 120 mm strokeonly 150 mm height (= unreduced stroke + 30 mm (25 mm for 34.9 mm))only 335 mm effective length (with unreduced stroke, without actuator = 15 mm), total length 350 mminfinitely adjustablestroke can be reduced by 10 or 20 mm via metal pins inserted in guide track (5 for 10 mm, 2 x 5 for 20 mm)60 to 70 g weight saving compared to predecessor modelheight and overall length reduced by 3 and 10 mm respectively compared to the previous modellow breakaway force (minus 75 % compared to V2) and smooth, easy-running functionSKF main seal and IGUS bushings with very low frictionretreaded OneUp Sealed Cartridge: no need to adjust the air pressureeasy to maintain, no special tools required (only 14 mm open-end spanner, 5 mm / 2 mm hexagon)extended maintenance interval: 120 hours for cleaning / lubrication, 350 hours for complete service250 mm maximum exposed length (with unreduced stroke)cartridge is 100 % recyclableOneUp V3 handlebar remote recommended (sold separately), also directly compatible with all other remotes with cable clamp screw 27.2 mm / 335 mm / SB 0 mm / not incl. Whether you're tackling rugged mountain trails, cruising city streets, or embarking on long touring adventures, this seatpost is engineered to elevate your cycling experience to new heights.

name: BikeYoke Squeezy seat clamp
description: Not just any seat clamp: the Squeezy seat clamp by BikeYoke With its extremely elaborate and fine CNC finish, the beautiful titanium Torx screw and a weight of 7.9 g (34.9/35 mm) Squeezy is not only extremely light. Unlike other seatpost clamps, Squeezy does not have a continuous collar on the top. This collar, as found on common seatpost clamps, serves only as a mounting aid, but stiffens the clamps unnecessarily at the upper edge and thus prevents the most even deformation and clamping. Without a continuous collar, the clamp can nestle better and apply the clamping effect more gently and evenly around the seat tube (and not just selectively). In combination with the compact design with the titanium screw located as close as possible to the seat tube, the same clamping forces with less tightening torque or higher clamping forces with the same tightening torque can be achieved. Particularly in connection with telescopic seatposts, a clamping force that is evenly distributed over the circumference can positively influence the function of the post. To prevent the clamp from sliding down over the seat tube during installation, Squeezy has three small slip stops. weight: 7 g (31.8 mm) to 9 g (39 mm)bundle-less design for even distribution of clamping forceTi-6Al-4V Titanium Clamping Screw with Torx drivetrainSlip-Stopps as mounting aid 1 x BikeYoke Squeezy seatpost clamp

name: Shimano SL-MT800-IL Remote Lever
description: The SL-MT800-IL Remote Lever by Shimano - Cockpit extension The Shimano SL-MT800-IL remote lever is a handlebar remote for dropper posts with mechanical control (e.g. PRO Koryak). It convinces with its pleasant haptics and good operability as well as with the practical I-Spec EV mounting. This allows a space-saving integration into the cockpit of a mountain bike equipped with 1x shifting. Instead of a shift lever, the dropper post release lever is simply installed on the left brake lever, whereby position and rotation can be flexibly adjusted. A cable with friction-reducing Optislick coating and a housing are included in the delivery. cable adjustposition adjustshift lever rotation adjust all common mechanically adjustable seatposts (clamp on lever) with 7 mm travelI-Spec EV brake levers quick access from the grip position on the handlebars with minimal hand movementmounted for easy operationwith I-Spec EV can be mounting to brake lever where shift lever would be (left)Optislick inner cable with a minimal galvanic coating for more efficient cable routing and corrosion resistanceShimano logo I-SLMT800ILALP 1 x Shimano SL-MT800-IL remote lever1 x Shimano cable, 1800 mm1 x Shimano 1500 mm cable housing

name: RockShox 1x Remote Upgrade Kit for Reverb as of 2013
description: The Reverb and Reverb Stealth seatposts from RockShox can now also be equipped with the ergonomic 1x remote lever. Instead of the usual push-button-like knob for operating the Reverb, the 1x Remote fits perfectly into your cockpit. Like the thumb lever of your shifter on the right side, the 1x remote, which is mounted below the handlebars on the left side, is always easy to reach and the perfect seat height is only a thumb press away. Gone are the days when you had to lift your thumb off the handlebars and give up some control over your bike for a brief moment. Like a gear lever, the 1x Remote literally nestles against your thumb and is just waiting to be activated. Reverb dropper post models as of 2013Reverb Stealth dropper post models as of 2013 features RockShox exclusive adjustable rebound speedlow actuating force requiredeasy maintenance Bleeding Edge™: Bleeding Edge™ technology allows for quick and easy bleeding. Thanks to a special fluid channel and the specially designed bleed port, the fluid can be pumped through the levers more easily. A special adapter can be fitted to the bleed port and seals the system to prevent air ingress and fluid loss. black / left: Colour: black with silver letteringMount Location: left, below the handlebarsManufacturer Number: 00.6818.029.000 1 x RockShox 1x Handlebar Remote1 x RockShox Bleeding Edge tool1 x RockShox Normal Handlebar Clamp1 x RockShox MMX Handlebar Clamp

name: Shimano SL-MT500-IL Remote Lever with I-Spec EV
description: Shimano SL-MT500-IL remote lever for I-Spec-EV mounting - for dropper posts The SL-MT500-IL remote lever by Shimano is mounted on the left side of a compatible brake lever via the I-Spec EV mount. There it takes the position of the shifter, which is not present in 1x drivetrains. The remote lever is suitable for mechanically controllable dropper posts that have their cable clamp on the lever. A cable and an OT-SP41 housing are supplied. cable adjustposition adjustshift lever rotation adjust mechanically actuated seatposts with max. 9 mm cable travel and cable clamp on leverI-Spec EV brake levers remote lever for seatpostsquick access from the grip position on the handlebars with minimal hand movementwith I-Spec EV can be mounting to brake lever where shift lever would be (left)14 mm adjustment range in longitudinal directionOptislick inner cable with a minimal galvanic coating for more efficient cable routing and corrosion resistancepainted I-Spec EV I-Spec EV describes a variant of the connection between brake lever and shift lever on Shimano MTB derailleurs. This type of mounting allows the shifter to be adjusted both horizontally and vertically in relation to the brake lever, and ensures a tidy cockpit by reducing the number of clamps required. Compared to I-Spec and I-Spec II, I-Spec EV offers a much wider adjustment range. 14 mm adjustment range the longitudinal direction and up to 60° rotation allow an optimal ergonomic adjustment to your riding style, your sitting position and your anatomy. description: ReMote Light Action Dropper Remote Lever by Wolf Tooth Components - long and smooth-running Wolf Tooth Components ReMote Light Action remote lever has a longer length than the standard model , which is ideal for supports with sluggish control or for riders who prefer really smooth control. With the ReMote remote lever, Wolf Tooth eliminates some of the weak points that remote levers for dropper posts still have and meets the requirements of riders and mechanics. name: Shimano OT-SP41/OT-RS900 Polymer Shift Cable Set Dura-Ace R9100/Ultegra R8000
description: The Shimano shifter cable set OT-SP41/OT-RS900 for Dura-Ace - special cable housing and coated cables The Shimano shift cable set OT-SP41/OT-RS900 Polymer is suitable for Dura-Ace R9100 and Ultegra R8000, among others, because here the rear derailleurs have to be mounted on the bike with the special OT-RS900 cable housing. The standard OT-SP41 cable housing cannot be used as it is too stiff for the small radius required. Also included in the set are shift cables with a polymer coating that looks like tubes wrapped around the cable under a microscope. This reduces the surface area that rubs against the liner and improves grease retention. This results in lower shifting forces and faster gear changes. RD-R9100RD-R8000RD-R7100RD-R7000RD-RX820RD-RX822RD-RX810RD-RX812RD-RX400 polymer-coated cables reduce friction and ensure smooth and fast operationcables have a round cross-section which reduces frictionstainless steel cable is corrosion resistant (anticorrosive (SUS))SIS-SP41 housing is pre-lubricated with special silicone grease to ensure smooth shiftingdirt-repellent: sealed housing end caps minimise the penetration of dirtset especially recommended for Dura-Ace and Ultegra due to the polymer cables, but also compatible with the other rear derailleurs listed aboveperformance indicator: Ultimate (level 3 out of 3) The length of the OT-RS900 should be adjusted accordingly depending on the bicycle frame size. This is necessary for optimal performance. The OT-RS900 should be cut from the correct side when adjusting the length. One of the two ends is flare-processed. This flare-processed end is inserted into the barrel adjuster of the rear derailleur and should therefore remain there. OT-RS900 For Dura-Ace, Ultegra, 105, GRX and other 11-speed or 12-speed road and gravel rear derailleurs, Shimano has developed the special OT-RS900 cable housing. It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. OT-RS900 is not intended for use on the shift/brake lever side. 1 x Shimano OT-RS900 shifter cable housing1 x Shimano OT-SP41 shifter cable housing1 x Shimano 1800 mm shift cable1 x Shimano 2100 mm shift cable2 x Shimano short pointed end caps for ST-R9100/R91203 x Shimano long pointed end caps1 x end caps, sealed, for rear derailleur2 x cable ferrules1 x rear derailleur cap1 x front derailleur cable housing end cap for full length cable housing

name: Nokon Konkavex Extension Set, 1 m
description: Ingenious look and excellent function: the Konkavex Extension Set by Nokon The Nokon Konkavex cables offer the best performance for mechanical brakes and gears. The system is suitable for both braking and switching applications and, thanks to its length stability, brings more safety and precision even with line bends and in extreme situations. The pressure-resistant outer shell made of aluminium avoids elongation of the cable with the resulting switching problems. Due to the design of the Nokon system, the cable is extremely resistant to kinking with high flexibility of the articulated parts lined up next to each other. Due to the Nokon construction, one saves up to 40 % weight compared to conventional Bowden cables - with complete freedom from tension and without any side pressure. Tightest bowing is no problem with the Nokon system. Nokon's Konkavex system guarantees easy handling when shifting and braking with a clearly-defined pressure point. Konkavex links, incl. beads (total length 1 m)1 x Nokon liner, 1.7 mm

name: Shimano EW-SD300-I Power Cable for Di2
description: The EW-SD300-I Power Cable for Shimano Di2 Derailleurs - Thin, light, powerful EW-SD300-I is a power cable from Shimano for internal routing in the frame, which was developed with regard to the Dura-Ace and Ultegra Di2 12-speed road bike derailleurs and the MU-UR510 hub gear motor unit respectively. It is 0.4 mm thinner than the previous EW-SD50 cable, which saves weight and has optical advantages. There is a connector on both sides, which, with a diameter of 3.45 mm, is also significantly slimmer than before. Electrical signals are thus exchanged at lightning speed between the rear derailleur, battery, front derailleur and, if applicable, the STIs. Di2 shifters for time trial and triathlon that require the old cable can be connected to the EW-SD300-I via conversion adapter . Included are two cable guides with which you can prevent the cable from shifting in the frame after installation. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: Shimano EW-SD50 Power Cable for Di2
description: The Shimano EW-SD50 power cable for second generation Di2 derailleurs The Shimano Di2 EW-SD50 power cable is used with all second generation electronic road groupsets, i.e. from Ultegra 6770 onwards, as well as with electronic city and MTB groupsets. It is available in numerous lengths and is suitable for both external and internal installation. The cable cannot be used for the first Dura-Ace Di2 (7970) because it is two-core and no longer four-core. Third-generation road shifters are also not compatible; the thinner EW-SD300-I cable is required here. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: Shimano Di2 BT-DN110 Battery for Internal Mount
description: The BT-DN110 battery by Shimano - wireless function for your Di2 drivetrain The Shimano BT-DN110 Di2 battery is designed for internal mounting in the seatpost (external mounting optional) and has another central function besides the power supply of the Di2 drivetrain as a battery: it also functions as a Master Unit and is Bluetooth-enabled and thus establishes a wireless connection between a wireless unit (e.g. SC-MT800, EW-WU101, not included) and a smartphone or tablet. name: Shimano Di2 BT-DN300 Battery for Internal Mount
description: The BT-DN300 Battery by Shimano - The power source for your Di2 shifting system The BT-DN300 is a lithium-ion battery developed by Shimano for the Dura-Ace and Ultegra Di2 2x12-speed road groupsets. Like its predecessor, it is installed internally in the frame, typically in the seatpost. It has three connections and supplies power to all electronic components via the thin EW-SD300 power cable (not included): the rear derailleur, the front derailleur and, in a fully wired set-up, the two shift/brake levers. Unlike previous models, BT-DN300 does not have its own charging socket, but is charged via the rear derailleur. It is also not Bluetooth-enabled. The nominal voltage of the battery is 7.4 volts, the nominal capacity 500 mAh. A full charge takes up to 1.5 hours if the charging cable is connected to a power supply unit with a USB port, or up to 3 hours if it is connected to the USB port on a computer. Once charged, you can ride your shifters for approx. 1000 km. Blind plugs and small parts required for installation are included. name: Shimano Power Cable EW-SD300 for Alfine Di2 & STEPS
description: The EW-SD300 Power Cable for Shimano Di2 Internally Geared Hubs and E-bike Systems EW-SD300 is a power cable for external routing developed by Shimano with regard to the MU-UR510 internally geared hub motor unit. It can also be used with the e-bike wiring from the EP8, EP6, STEPS E6100 and E5000 series. The cable is 0.4 mm thinner than the previous EW-SD50 model, which saves weight and has optical advantages. There is a connector on both sides, which, with a diameter of 3.45 mm, is also significantly slimmer than before. Components that require the old cable, such as the Junction B SM-JC40, can be connected to the EW-SD300-I via conversion adapter . Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Shimano Adjustment Gauge for RD-R9250 / RD-R8150
description: Shimano adjustment gauge for RD-R9250 and RD-R8150 rear derailleurs - adjusting the end adjusting bolt The adjustment gauge is suitable for the 12-speed Shimano Di2 Dura-Ace RD-R9250 and Ultegra RD-R8150 rear derailleurs. It facilitates the adjustment of the end adjusting bolt, which is used to establish the correct distance between the largest sprocket and the guide pulley, depending on the size of the cassette. Place the adjustment gauge on the rear derailleur cage and, using the end adjusting bolt, align the tip of the largest sprocket with the corresponding line on the gauge. name: Shimano EW-WU111 Di2 Wireless Unit
description: The Di2 Wireless Unit EW-WU111 by Shimano - Modern E-tube networking The Shimano Di2 wireless unit EW-WU111 wirelessly transmits data such as the current gear, shift mode (manual or Synchro Shift) or battery level - the D-Fly technology makes it possible. This information can then be displayed on an ANT+ or Bluetooth compatible bicycle computer or Shimano Di2 display. The wireless unit receives its information from the battery or the battery mount. Thus, settings can also be easily changed with a smartphone using the E-Tube platform. EW-WU101 has two E-Tube connections and is mounted to the frame with clips. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . * The functions displayed depend on the bike computer you are using. specially designed for Dura-Ace Di2 R9150can also be used for all other Di2 derailleurs from Ultegra 6770 and before Dura-Ace R9250 / Ultegra R8150 wireless communicationsE-Tube settings with smartphone/tabletE-Tube project ensures firmware updates D-Fly Shimano D-Fly is a Near Field Communication (NFC) network that allows Shimano E-Tube electronic components (Di2, STEPS) and smartphones or compatible bike computers to communicate with each other. For example, it is possible to view information about the components on the display or to track power meter data. Shimano provides the E-Tube Ride app just for this purpose. D-Fly is compatible with ANT+, ANT as well as Bluetooth. Network partners include Garmin, Wahoo, Sigma and Cateye for Di2 components and Garmin and Sigma for STEPS components. I-EWWU111B 1 x Shimano EW-WU111 wireless unit2 x clips

name: SRAM Charger for eTap ® / AXS
description: It is time to shift up a gear - SRAM knows that technological progress must prove itself in practice. Especially on a bicycle, which should be easy to use. Elegance means doing without everything superfluous. This is progress, and SRAM's specification for the first electronic circuit, the SRAM Red eTap®. The eTap® batteries can be removed literally with one click. Open the closure system without any tools, slide the battery up and out of the rear or front derailleur and plug it into the USB charger. You can connect the charger to any USB-enabled power source or connect it to the mains with an A/C USB adapter. The charging time is only 45 minutes. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: Shimano Switch SW-RS801 12-speed
description: The SW-RS801 Di2 Shifter by Shimano - For sprinting or mountain riding The SW-RS801 are additional shifters, also called satellite shifters, for the Dura-Ace R9250 and the Ultegra R8150 Di2 road bike groupsets from Shimano. They come in two versions. SW-RS801-S is aimed at all those who want to shift while in the drops, e.g. during a sprint. The 1-button switch unit and clamp are mounted in the drops using adhesive tape, additionally fixed by the handlebar tape. SW-RS801-T is ideal for those who would like to shift gears while in the tops, for example on a strenuous uphill ride. The 1-button switch unit and clamp are mounted to the right and left of the stem using cable ties. Both models are supplied in pairs; SW-RS801-S comes with two 100 mm long EW-SD300 power cables, SW-RS801-T with two 260 mm long power cables. This connects the shifters to the regular STIs. The buttons are designed for shifting the 12-speed cassette up and down, i.e. for operating the rear derailleur. However, via the E-Tube platform, it is possible to reprogram them so that they can shift in front. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . sprinter or top shifter1-button modeladditional, better control thanks to individual shift positionlightning-fast gear changesprogrammable gearing 100 mm: 260 mm: 1 x pair Shimano Di2 SW-RS801 Shifters 100 mm: 2 x Shimano EW-SD300 power cables, 100 mm2 x double-sided adhesive tape rolls 260 mm: 2 x Shimano EW-SD300 power cables, 260 mm2 x rubber pad2 x zip ties

name: Shimano SL-M315 Shifter w/ clamp 2-/3-/7-/8-Speed
description: The SL-M315 shifter from Shimano - always know which gear you are in The Shimano SL-M315 is a shifter for city, touring and mountain bikes with 7-speed or 8-speed shifters and derailleurs and two or three chainrings. It has an integrated, easy-to-read gear indicator, which helps you to be aware of the gearing at all times. As a Rapidfire-Plus model, the SL-M315 helps to achieve fast, indexed shifting; you can downshift by up to 3 gears at once per lever operation. The mounting on the handlebars is done with the use of a classic clamp. A steel derailleur cable with Optislick coating is included in the delivery.

name: SRAM AXS POD Ultimate Controller
description: Experience Next-Level Control with the AXS POD Ultimate Controller D1 by SRAM for All Mountain and More Elevate your ride across all mountain terrains, cross country trails, and enduro challenges with the AXS POD Ultimate Controller D1 from SRAM. Designed specifically for the passionate MTB rider, this wireless controller is ready to revolutionize how you engage with your bike. With its sleek design tailored for flat bar setups and a secure closed clamp mounting system, it promises a seamless integration onto your handlebars. The controller's plastic lever and housing material ensure a lightweight yet durable addition to your setup, enhancing your ride without weighing you down. The concave switch design of the AXS POD Ultimate Controller D1 is a game-changer, offering intuitive and precise control over your 12-speed gearing system. This feature allows for quick, effortless shifts even on the most challenging terrains, ensuring you're always in the right gear. Compatible with E-Bikes and Pedelecs up to 25 km/h, it brings the future of cycling to your fingertips, making every ride more enjoyable and efficient. The 22.2 mm clamp diameter ensures a universal fit for most handlebars, making installation a breeze. Whether you're tackling steep climbs, technical descents, or simply enjoying a scenic cross-country route, the AXS POD Ultimate Controller D1 by SRAM provides the reliability and performance you need to push your limits further. Get ready to experience the ultimate control at your fingertips, and transform your mountain biking adventures with this innovative wireless controller.

name: SRAM GX Eagle AXS Controller 12-speed Shifter
description: The SRAM GX Eagle AXS Controller Shifter controls electronic rear derailleurs The SRAM Controller Shifter of the GX Eagle series triggers the shifting process electronically thanks to AXS™ . Your cockpit is thus kept particularly tidy, and shifting becomes effortless uphill or under heavy loads. You have two trigger buttons at your disposal, whose respective function you can define and personalise with the AXS app. The two ergonomic touch points are immediately accessible, so you don't have to push the lever through to change gears, and you can maintain the same grip on the handlebars. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: SRAM Trigger shifter X01 Eagle 12-speed - workshop packaging
description: Experience the Trigger Shifter X01 Eagle 12-speed by SRAM, designed for the All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiast in you. This mechanical shift system is built with a robust aluminum lever and housing, ensuring durability and a lightweight feel for those challenging rides. Its design caters to flat bar setups, with a closed clamp and matchmaker mounting for a clean and secure attachment to your bike. You'll appreciate the precision and smoothness of shifting through all 12 gears, thanks to the high-quality stainless steel inner cable. Adjustability is key, and with options to tweak the thumb lever position and tension, you can customize the shifter to your exact preferences. Although it doesn't come with an optical gear display, the intuitive design and responsive feel make it easy to stay in control without taking your eyes off the trail. Whether you're climbing steep hills or racing down technical descents, this trigger shifter is built to keep up with your adventurous spirit. Say goodbye to compatibility worries and hello to seamless performance on every ride.

name: Shimano Deore SL-M6000 2-/3-/10-speed Shifter w/ Clamp
description: The Deore shifter SL-M6000 by Shimano - for clamp mounting, without gear indicator The Shimano Deore SL-M6000 shifter in the clamp version is designed for 2x10-speed or 3x10-speed mountain bike shifting. It does not have an optical gear indicator. As with all Rapidfire Plus shifters, the SL-M6000 can shift down up to three gears at a time. In addition, the trigger lever can be operated both with the index finger (pulling) and with the thumb (pushing) known as the 2-Way Release function. In general, the Deore shifter convinces with its smooth, powerful index shifting performance. Its housing is made of aluminium, the two levers are made of plastic or steel. An Optislick inner cable with friction-reducing coating is included in the scope of delivery. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. cable adjust MTB 2x10-speed: MTB 3x10-speed: max. number of gears per shift: 3 (main lever, rear)smooth function with powerful indexingprecise, consistent shiftsergonomic lever design with easy accessone shifter for 2x and 3xOptislick inner cable with a minimal galvanic coating for more efficient cable routing and corrosion resistancepainted housingstainless steel clamp bolts Rapidfire Plus Rapidfire Plus is a type of Shimano shift lever construction that has been common in the mountain bike sector since 1985. Two levers, the main lever and the release lever, are used instead of a twist shifter. Rapidfire Plus shift levers, as the name suggests, ensure fast shifting. In addition, depending on the model, it is possible to downshift up to three gears with one shift stroke. 2-Way-Release With 2-Way-Release, the shifter can be pressed and pulled to shift to the smaller sprocket or chainring. This allows you to adjust the shifting process to your personal preferences. Most Rapidfire Plus shifters are equipped with 2-Way Release. 2/3x: 10-speed: 1 x Shimano Deore SL-M6000 shifter1 x Shimano cable, 1800 mmor2050 mm

name: Shimano XT SL-M8100-I 12-speed Shifter w/ I-Spec EV
description: XT SL-M8100-I Shifter by Shimano - Leaves nothing to be desired when it comes to adjustment The Shimano SLX SL-M8100-I 12-speed shifter offers you the highest level of individual ergonomics - the I-Spec EV system makes it possible. You can adjust it laterally (14 mm) and in the direction of rotation. Like the clamp version, SL-M8100-I is also characterised by low operating forces and good accessibility. The Shimano 2-Way Release technology ensures delay-free push and pull movements. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. cable adjustposition adjustshift lever rotation adjust MTB 12-speed : fast and easy shifting promotes focus and controlmax. number of gears per shift: 4 (main lever, rear)faster lever access (20% faster than SL-M8000) and lower operating forces (35% less than SL-M8000)delay-free function thanks to 2-Way ReleaseI-Spec EV position adjustable for every riding style and preference, tidy cockpitOptislick inner cable with a minimal galvanic coating for more efficient cable routing and corrosion resistancerubber contact surfacedouble bearingspainted housingstainless steel clamp bolts Rapidfire Plus Rapidfire Plus is a type of Shimano shift lever construction that has been common in the mountain bike sector since 1985. Two levers, the main lever and the release lever, are used instead of a twist shifter. Rapidfire Plus shift levers, as the name suggests, ensure fast shifting. In addition, depending on the model, it is possible to downshift up to three gears with one shift stroke. 2-Way-Release With 2-Way-Release, the shifter can be pressed and pulled to shift to the smaller sprocket or chainring. This allows you to adjust the shifting process to your personal preferences. Most Rapidfire Plus shifters are equipped with 2-Way Release. Instant Release With Instant Release, the spring and thus the cable are released immediately when the lever is actuated, which ensures an enormously fast shifting process. The delay caused by a two-step shifting process with click and release is eliminated, so that the gear change is considerably accelerated and improved. Multi Release With the Multi Release, which only affects the right-hand shift lever, two gears can be shifted with one actuation of the release lever without loss of shifting speed. This is independent of whether you use a Top-Normal or a Low-Normal rear derailleur. I-Spec EV I-Spec EV describes a variant of the connection between brake lever and shift lever on Shimano MTB derailleurs. This type of mounting allows the shifter to be adjusted both horizontally and vertically in relation to the brake lever, and ensures a tidy cockpit by reducing the number of clamps required. Compared to I-Spec and I-Spec II, I-Spec EV offers a much wider adjustment range. 14 mm adjustment range the longitudinal direction and up to 60° rotation allow an optimal ergonomic adjustment to your riding style, your sitting position and your anatomy. 12-speed: 1 x Shimano XT SL-M8100-I shifter1 x Shimano cable (2050 mm)1 x Shimano cable housing3 x 6 mm sealed end caps1 x long nose end cap

name: SRAM SX Eagle 1x12-speed Trigger
description: Upgrade your ride with this SRAM SX Eagle 1x12 speed trigger shifter, designed for the ultimate cycling enthusiast who demands precision and durability. With its robust aluminum lever and housing, this shifter is built to withstand the rigors of Cross Country, Enduro, All Mountain, and general MTB riding. The closed clamp mounting ensures a secure fit on handlebars with a 22.2 mm diameter, providing a sleek integration into your setup. This 12-speed shifter is compatible with 12-speed cassettes, offering seamless gear changes and a wide range of gearing options for tackling any terrain. The mechanical shift system delivers reliable performance, while the tension adjustment allows for fine-tuning to your personal preference. Whether you're upgrading your current bike or building a new one, this trigger shifter combines functionality and style for a superior riding experience.

name: Shimano XTR SL-M9000 2-/3-/11-speed Shifter w/ Clamp
description: The XTR SL-M9000 shifter by Shimano - for optimum, smooth gear selection The Shimano XTR SL-M9000 shifter (clamp version) features improved ergonomics, anti-slip surfaces and a powerful index shifting function. You will always find the right gear with ease, and a cable with polymer coating reduces the effort required. The housing is made of lightweight aluminium, the levers are made of carbon, so that in Cross Country or Enduro racing, unnecessary grams are left out of it. The left SL-M9000 shifter is suitable for 2x11-speed as well as 3x11-speed drivetrains without a mode converter. Of course, the XTR shifter is a Rapidfire Plus model, which can shift down several gears at once and has 2-Way Release. The release lever can be operated in two directions by pulling with the index finger or pushing with the thumb. Instant Release provides immediate release and Multi Release (on the 11-speed lever) provides fast gear changes in both directions, with pulling to change one gear and pushing to change two. cable adjust MTB 2x11-speed: MTB 3x11-speed: max. number of gears per shift: 4 (main lever, rear)improved Vivid Index mechanism20 % less effort when shifting compared to M985crisp indexing for consistent shifting feel4x ball bearing construction for easier shiftingimproved ergonomicsanti-slip textureanodised body, painted main leverstainless steel clamp bolts Rapidfire Plus Rapidfire Plus is a type of Shimano shift lever construction that has been common in the mountain bike sector since 1985. Two levers, the main lever and the release lever, are used instead of a twist shifter. Rapidfire Plus shift levers, as the name suggests, ensure fast shifting. In addition, depending on the model, it is possible to downshift up to three gears with one shift stroke. 2-Way-Release With 2-Way-Release, the shifter can be pressed and pulled to shift to the smaller sprocket or chainring. This allows you to adjust the shifting process to your personal preferences. Most Rapidfire Plus shifters are equipped with 2-Way Release. Instant Release With Instant Release, the spring and thus the cable are released immediately when the lever is actuated, which ensures an enormously fast shifting process. The delay caused by a two-step shifting process with click and release is eliminated, so that the gear change is considerably accelerated and improved. Multi Release With the Multi Release, which only affects the right-hand shift lever, two gears can be shifted with one actuation of the release lever without loss of shifting speed. This is independent of whether you use a Top-Normal or a Low-Normal rear derailleur. 2/3x: 11-speed: 1 x Shimano XTR SL-M9000 shifter1 x Shimano cable (1800 mmor2050 mm)1 x Shimano cable housing (1200 mmor1800 mm)

name: Shimano SLX Shadow Plus RD-M7100 12-speed Rear Derailleur
description: Get ready to elevate your ride with the SLX Shadow Plus RD-M7100 12-speed rear derailleur, a top-notch choice for all mountain, cross country, enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. Crafted by the renowned brand Shimano, this derailleur is designed for those who demand precision and reliability on every trail. With its mechanical shift system and compatibility with 12-speed cassettes, you're guaranteed smooth and efficient gear changes no matter the terrain. The entire structure, from the outer cage to the inner workings, is made of durable aluminum, ensuring lightweight performance and longevity. The standard mounting system makes installation a breeze, letting you spend more time riding and less time tinkering. The inclusion of damping technology further enhances your cycling experience by reducing chain slap and maintaining tension for a quieter, more stable ride. Whether you're tackling steep climbs, rapid descents, or technical trails, this derailleur is up to the challenge. Upgrade your bike with the SLX Shadow Plus and experience the difference in your next adventure.

name: Shimano Ultegra Shadow RD-R8000 11-speed Rear Derailleur
description: The Ultegra RD-R8000 rear derailleur by Shimano - Shadow profile protects against damage The Shimano Ultegra RD-R8000 11-speed rear derailleur now also uses the Shadow design, as was previously the case with Dura-Ace. This is an extremely flat profile which, combined with the more direct positioning, reduces the risk of damage and ensures clean, quiet shifting in all conditions. In addition, the direct mount compatibility results in a new mounting option. The Ultegra rear derailleur, which is mainly made of aluminium, is available in two versions: one with a short cage (SS type) for cassettes up to 11-30 and the second with a longer cage (GS type) for cassettes up to a gradation of 11-34. This means that you can cope well even on the steepest climbs. low profile Shimano Shadow RD design increases stability and reduces susceptibility to defects, provides compact appearancetwo cage lengths for a wide range of gearspainted cage platesderailleur pulley bearings4 pivot bushings, fluorine-coated Shadow RD Shadow rear derailleurs from Shimano have a very flat profile, allowing for a more aggressive riding style by minimising the risk of getting stuck on obstacles. In addition, the single preload ensures that the rear derailleur does not hit the chain stay even on very uneven ground. All of this contributes to a quiet, clean-operating gearshift. OT-RS900 For Dura-Ace, Ultegra, 105, GRX and other 11-speed or 12-speed road and gravel rear derailleurs, Shimano has developed the special OT-RS900 cable housing. It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. OT-RS900 is not intended for use on the shift/brake lever side. short: long: 1 x Shimano Ultegra RD-R8000 rear derailleur1 x Shimano OT-RS900 240 mm cable housing1 x long nose end cap

name: Shimano GRX Shadow Plus RD-RX822 12-speed Rear Derailleur
description: Shimano GRX RD-RX822 12-speed rear derailleur - two options for MTB cassettes The Shimano GRX RD-RX822 12-speed rear derailleur was developed for gravel use with 1x drivetrains and mountain bike cassette. It scores with quiet, reliable shifting and excellent chain security. In the version with a long SGS cage, it has a capacity of 41 teeth and is compatible with the 10-51 T gradation. The version with the shorter GS cage has a capacity of 35 teeth and shifts cassettes with 10-45 T. In fact, the cage can be replaced, so you don't need a completely new rear derailleur when you change the cassette. Both versions feature Shadow Plus technology, a built-in chain stabiliser that prevents the chain from slapping on rough surfaces and thus counteracts chain drop. The function can also be switched off when you are riding on smoother roads or when you want to remove the wheel. RD-RX822 is largely made of aluminium and therefore does not weigh a gram too much. The bearings of the guide and tension pulley wheels contribute to the smooth performance. In addition, a stabilizer with on/off switch is used to reduce chain slap and thus counteract chain drop. At the same time, this results in a quieter drive. Weight is also saved compared to other chain restraint devices. OT-RS900 For Dura-Ace, Ultegra, 105, GRX and other 11-speed or 12-speed road and gravel rear derailleurs, Shimano has developed the special OT-RS900 cable housing. It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. name: Shimano 105 Di2 Rear Derailleur Shadow RD-R7150 12-speed
description: Shimano 105 Di2 RD-R9150 Rear Derailleur - High-tech centre with shadow design The RD-R7150 Di2 is the first electronic rear derailleur from the Shimano 105 series. Due to its generous total capacity of 41 teeth, you can shift 12-speed cassettes with a largest sprocket of 34 to 36 teeth, which is also a novelty in road cycling. The compact unit, which only weighs about 40 grams more than the Ultegra model due to its high aluminium content, contains a lot of high-tech features: the wireless unit for wireless communication with the STIs, the charging port, which you can use to easily recharge your shifters and derailleurs with the help of the matching charging cable, and a function button. You can use it to adjust the rear derailleur, check the battery status, change the shift mode from manual to Synchro and Semi-Synchro Shift or establish a Bluetooth connection to a bike computer or smartphone. An LED display helps you to do this. The rear derailleur is connected to the battery via a cable, from which a cable also runs to the front derailleur. It impresses with its fast, precise shifting processes as well as with its Flat Shadow design, which optimises the shifting behaviour and prevents damage. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . function button, charging port and wireless system in one compact unitDi2 wireless chip with low interference probability, high processing speed and low power consumptionLED status display (battery, pairing, settings mode, Synchro Shift)takes over the function of previous wireless units in establishing a wireless connection with compatible cycling computersflat designconnected to battery via cablefirmware updates via E-Tube Project4 fluorine-coated joint bushespainted cage Shadow RD Shadow rear derailleurs from Shimano have a very flat profile, allowing for a more aggressive riding style by minimising the risk of getting stuck on obstacles. In addition, the single preload ensures that the rear derailleur does not hit the chain stay even on very uneven ground. All of this contributes to a quiet, clean-operating gearshift. Digital Integrated Intelligence (Di2) Di2 systems are the electronic shifting systems from Shimano. They are based on the SEIS, the Shimano Electronic Intelligent System, which takes over the index shifting function from the mechanical components, only via power cables or radio signals and not via a Bowden cable. Shifting is done by simply pressing a button. This has the advantage that no great effort is required, your concentration on the ride is not disturbed and operation is easy even with cold hands. In addition, the electronic gear changes are very fast and highly precise. There is also no risk of a defective circuit due to dirty cables or other problems. You can adjust individual settings via the E-Tube Project, such as adjusting the shifting speed, the number of shifting operations per button press or the Synchro or Semi-Synchro shifting function. Shimano offers an app for this purpose. Gear maintenance and firmware updates are also done via E-Tube, with the bike connected to a PC running the appropriate E-Tube software for more extensive workshop work. D-Fly Shimano D-Fly is a Near Field Communication (NFC) network that allows Shimano E-Tube electronic components (Di2, STEPS) and smartphones or compatible bike computers to communicate with each other. For example, it is possible to view information about the components on the display or to track power meter data. Shimano provides the E-Tube Ride app just for this purpose. D-Fly is compatible with ANT+, ANT as well as Bluetooth. Network partners include Garmin, Wahoo, Sigma and Cateye for Di2 components and Garmin and Sigma for STEPS components. Shimano Synchronized Shift Shimano's synchronised shifting function is a shifting mode that automatically matches the Di2 rear derailleur and Di2 front derailleur. It is activated either via the E-Tube platform or via the rear derailleurs with a function button. Synchro Shift means that the front derailleur automatically selects a suitable gear depending on the position of the rear derailleur, while Semi-Synchro Shift means that a suitable rear derailleur position is automatically set when you operate the front derailleur. This gives you the advantage that you only have to concentrate on one side of the shifting process and are not thrown off-rhythm by sudden unfavourable changes to the gear ratio. long: 1 x Shimano 105 Di2 RD-R7150 rear derailleur1 x Shimano TL-EW300 cable tool1 x adjustment tool

name: Shimano XT RD-M8000 11-speed Shadow Plus Rear Derailleur
description: The XT rear derailleur RD-M8000 by Shimano - easier to use The Shimano XT RD-M8000 rear derailleur features a Shadow Plus mechanism that allows you to switch between maximum chain stability and minimum operating forces. The extremely low profile and the flat angle of attack also benefit safety on difficult, narrow trails. In addition, compared to its predecessors, the RD-M8000 knows how to handle a slanted chain better and has larger derailleur pulley teeth for even smoother shifting performance. In the Dyna-Sys11 system, it thus performs its service efficiently and permanently. Both cages of the rear derailleur are made of lightweight aluminium. The shorter version (GS) is compatible with 1x11 and 2x11-speed gears and cassettes up to 46 or 42 teeth. In the long version (SGS) it can also be used for 3x11-speed drivetrains with an 11-40 cassette. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Cassette: short / GS: 1x11-speed: CS-M9001 (11-40 t), CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (11-40 t, 11-42 t, 11-46 t), CS-M5100-11 (11-42 t only)long / SGS: 1x11-speed: CS-M9001 (11-40 t), CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (11-40 t, 11-42 t, 11-46 t), CS-M5100-11 (11-42 t only)short / GS: 2x11-speed: CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11, CS-M5100-11 (only 11-42 t)long / SGS: 2x11-speed: CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11, CS-M5100-11 (only 11-42 t)long / SGS: 3x11-speed: CS-M9001, CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (only 11-40 t) " Rider tuned" for precise, smooth shiftingeasy shifting with 20% less effortShadow design with optimised angle of attackimproved chain stabilityefficient shifting and frictionless drivetrainefficient construction of the derailleur pulley teethpainted cage plates4 pivot bushings, fluorine-coatedderailleur pulley bearings sealed Dyna-Sys11 Dyna-Sys11 is the name of the 11-speed shifting system for MTBs from Shimano. The focus lies on maintaining the pedalling rhythm both on flat ground and on uphill segments. The gear ratios are selected so that you make efficient progress in the most frequently used gear range and do not have to shift gears as much (" Rhythm Step" ). Shadow RD+ Shadow Plus rear derailleurs are just as low-profile as Shimano's Shadow rear derailleurs. In addition, a stabilizer with on/off switch is used to reduce chain slap and thus counteract chain drop. At the same time, this results in a quieter drive. Weight is also saved compared to other chain restraint devices. short: long: 1 x Shimano XT RD-M8000 Shadow+ rear derailleur

name: SRAM GX Eagle Transmission AXS T-Type Rear Derailleur 12-speed
description: The GX Eagle Transmission AXS T-Type rear derailleur from SRAM for your 1x12-speed mountain bike offers the best price-performance ratio The electronically controlled T-Type AXS 12-speed rear derailleur from SRAM forms the heart of the reliable entry-level GX Eagle Transmission mountain bike series. With its steel cage, it is extremely robust. The rear derailleur stands out especially thanks to Full Mount: it is mounted directly on the rear wheel axle instead of the UDH universal derailleur hanger. Use is therefore only possible on frames with this derailleur hanger. This assembly results in an exact, tolerance-free alignment of the rear derailleur and an unprecedented harmony in combination with a matching cassette. This also makes adjustment and limit bolts superfluous. With AXS you can control the rear derailleur without cables and make fine adjustments in the app. It is best to order the battery and charger for the rear derailleur directly. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: SRAM GX Eagle AXS 12-Speed Rear Derailleur
description: The GX Eagle AXS Rear Derailleur by SRAM - Top price-to-performance ratio for 12-speed electronic shifting The SRAM GX Eagle AXS™ electronic rear derailleur for mountain bike use has a robust steel cage and shifts cleanly and directly on Eagle 12-speed cassettes. The electronic control gives your bike a clean look and the AXS app lets you optimise the shifting behaviour to your needs. Thanks to the Overload Clutch, the rear derailleur protects itself from hard impacts, so you don't have to worry when the going gets a little rough. No matter if you need the last gear on the climb or if you want to speed up before the finish line, in combination with an Eagle cassette you are equipped for every situation with the GX Eagle AXS rear derailleur. Colour-wise, it blends seamlessly into the GX Eagle colour scheme. The included cover, which is best ordered at the same time, protects the battery from kicked-up stones. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Eagle cassette derailleur pulley bearings made of steelcolour-coordinated with Eagle componentsOverload Clutch protectionwith battery cover as optical highlight and for protection against stone chips AXS™: AXS is SRAM's electronic integration platform that combines electronic bicycle components and software. The SRAM AXS app allows you to view battery status, change component behaviour, adjust controls, receive maintenance reminders and update firmware. Overload Clutch: In case of an impact against the rear derailleur, the motor decouples to give the rear derailleur a maximum of movement and returns to its original position after the impact. Roller Bearing Clutch™: Rear derailleurs with Roller Bearing Clutch are equipped for rough and demanding terrain. Unimpressed by a ground full of roots, stones or rocks, the technology ensures a stable rear derailleur and prevents beating chains. The rear derailleur thus offers maximum drive stability without compromising on precision or performance. Cage Lock™: Thanks to the rear derailleur's Cage-Lock technology, the chain and the rear wheel can be fitted and removed really easily. Simply release the chain tension by pushing the shift cage forward and locking it. 00.7518.151.000 1 x SRAM GX Eagle AXS rear derailleur1 x SRAM chain gap adjustment gauge1 x SRAM battery cover SRAM battery for eTap / AXS

name: Shimano 105 Shadow RD-R7000 11-speed Rear Derailleur
description: The 105 RD-R7000 Rear Derailleur by Shimano - Higher safety thanks to Shadow profile With the Shimano 105 RD-R7000 11-speed rear derailleur, fans of Shimano mid-range road bike components can now also benefit from the advantages of the Shadow design. This is an extra-low construction that reduces the likelihood of damage, stabilises shifting operations even on non-asphalt surfaces and, last but not least, benefits from a compact appearance. The rear derailleur, which is largely made of aluminium, also impresses with its broad compatibility. In the SS version with short cage you can shift 11-25 to 11-30 cassettes, in the GS version with longer cage it is even suitable for 11-34. A direct mount option is also available. low Shadow RD profile increases shifting stability and reduces susceptibility to defects in the event of a crashharmonious, integrated appearancetwo cage lengths for large gear selectionpainted cage plates2 pivot bushings, fluorine-coated Shadow RD Shadow rear derailleurs from Shimano have a very flat profile, allowing for a more aggressive riding style by minimising the risk of getting stuck on obstacles. In addition, the single preload ensures that the rear derailleur does not hit the chain stay even on very uneven ground. All of this contributes to a quiet, clean-operating gearshift. OT-RS900 For Dura-Ace, Ultegra, 105, GRX and other 11-speed or 12-speed road and gravel rear derailleurs, Shimano has developed the special OT-RS900 cable housing. It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. OT-RS900 is not intended for use on the shift/brake lever side. short: long: 1 x Shimano 105 RD-R7000 rear derailleur1 x Shimano OT-RS900 240 mm cable housing1 x long nose end cap

name: Shimano XTR RD-M9000 11-speed Shadow Plus Rear Derailleur
description: The XTR RD-M9000 Rear Derailleur by Shimano - Refined technology The XTR RD-M9000 rear derailleur has been equipped by Shimano with a shifting mechanism that refines and complements the proven Shadow Plus technology. It is now possible to choose between maximum chain stability and lowest possible operating forces. In addition, compared to previous models, the profile has been flattened again and the angle of attack optimised to prevent damage on the trail. Together with the other components that make up the Dyna-Sys11 system, the RD-M9000 performs reliably and smoothly. The inner cage of the rear derailleur is made of aluminium, the outer one of weight-saving carbon, as is some of the hardware. In the shorter version (GS) it is compatible with 2x11-speed and 1x11-speed gears and cassettes up to 11-42 or 11-46. The long version (SGS) can also be used for 3x11-speed drivetrains with 11-40 cassettes. Cassette: short / GS: 1x11-speed: CS-M9001 (11-40 T), CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (11-40 T, 11-42 T, 11-46 T), CS-M5100-11 (11-42 T only)long / SGS: 1x11-speed: CS-M9001 (11-40 T), CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (11-40 T, 11-42 T, 11-46 T), CS-M5100-11 (11-42 T only)short / GS: 2x11-speed: CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11, CS-M5100-11 (only 11-42 T)long / SGS: 2x11-speed: CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11, CS-M5100-11 (only 11-42 T)long / SGS: 3x11-speed: CS-M9001, CS-M8000, CS-M7000-11 (only 11-40 T) Shadow design with optimised angle of attacklow profilelow shifting resistanceeasily adjustable chain stabiliser: maximum stability or less shifting effortimproved derailleur pulley designcage plates painted/anodised4 pivot bushings, fluorine-coatedderailleur pulley bearings sealed Dyna-Sys11 Dyna-Sys11 is the name of the 11-speed shifting system for MTBs from Shimano. The focus lies on maintaining the pedalling rhythm both on flat ground and on uphill segments. The gear ratios are selected so that you make efficient progress in the most frequently used gear range and do not have to shift gears as much (" Rhythm Step" ). Shadow RD+ Shadow Plus rear derailleurs are just as low-profile as Shimano's Shadow rear derailleurs. In addition, a stabilizer with on/off switch is used to reduce chain slap and thus counteract chain drop. At the same time, this results in a quieter drive. Weight is also saved compared to other chain restraint devices. short: long: 1 x Shimano XTR RD-M9000 Shadow+ rear derailleur

name: Shimano Tourney 6-/7-speed Rear Derailleur
description: Get ready to upgrade your city and touring rides with the Tourney 6-/7-speed derailleur from Shimano, designed specifically for your urban adventures. This mechanical shift system is all about enhancing your cycling experience, making gear changes smoother and more reliable as you navigate through the streets or embark on a leisurely tour. Crafted from durable plastic with a steel inner cage, it promises longevity and resilience against the daily grind. The derailleur is compatible with 6- and 7-speed cassettes, ensuring a wide range of gears to tackle any urban landscape. Its standard mounting system makes installation a breeze, so you can get back on the road in no time. With no damping to worry about, you'll enjoy a direct and responsive feel every time you shift. Whether you're commuting to work or exploring new cityscapes, this derailleur is your go-to for a seamless ride. Say goodbye to clunky gear changes and hello to smooth cycling with Shimano's Tourney derailleur.

name: SRAM Force E1 AXS Derailleur 12-speed
description: Elevate your road, triathlon, and time trial performance with the SRAM Force E1 AXS 12 gear rear derailleur. This cutting-edge 12-speed compatible rear derailleur is designed specifically for SRAM Road setups, ensuring seamless compatibility and peak performance. Its wireless shift system revolutionizes your ride, offering quick, precise shifts with the mere touch of a button, freeing you from the constraints of cables. The heart of this derailleur is its carbon inner cage, which not only reduces weight but also enhances durability, allowing for swift, smooth gear changes. With a standard mounting system, it's straightforward to install, making it an ideal upgrade for cyclists who demand the best in technology and performance. This derailleur is not just about speed; it's about transforming how you interact with your bike on every level, from sprinting on flats to conquering steep climbs. It's not battery-operated, ensuring that the focus remains on mechanical efficiency and reliability. Whether you're aiming to shave seconds off your personal best or seeking a more enjoyable and responsive riding experience, this wireless, 12-speed derailleur is your key to unlocking new potentials. Embrace the future of cycling today and experience the difference in every pedal stroke.

name: SRAM Force D2 AXS 12-Speed Rear Derailleur - Workshop Packaging
description: Elevate your cycling experience with the SRAM Force D2 AXS 12-speed rear derailleur, designed specifically for the modern road, cyclocross, and gravel rider. This top-of-the-line gear boasts a durable steel construction paired with an outer cage made from high-quality aluminum, ensuring both strength and lightweight performance. The inner cage also features aluminum material, enhancing the system's overall durability and reliability. With compatibility for SRAM Road 12-speed setups, this shift system seamlessly integrates into your existing gear, offering a smooth transition to wireless shifting. The system supports a 12-speed cassette, providing a wide range of gears to tackle any terrain, from steep climbs to fast flats. Damping technology is included, offering a smoother ride by reducing vibrations and enhancing control. Its standard mounting design ensures easy installation, making it a breeze to upgrade your bike. Whether you're racing on the road, battling through a cyclocross course, or exploring gravel paths, this wireless shifting system is engineered to push your performance to new heights.

name: SRAM X01 Eagle AXS 12-Speed Rear Derailleur
description: The X01 Eagle AXS 12-speed rear derailleur by SRAM - direct electronic shifting on the Enduro bike The electronic SRAM X01 Eagle AXS™ rear derailleur very precisely shifts Eagle 12-speed cassette with 10-50 or 10-52 teeth, even in Enduro use. Save youself the hassle of wiring of your rear derailleur and take advantage of the electronic AXS platform. The adjustment is done in no time and with the AXS, you have the option to personalise the shifting behaviour. The cage is 10 mm shorter, sits further forward and further on the inside than the mechanical rearderailleur, giving you more ground clearance and making the rear derailleur nestle even closer to the cassette. It can take a lot: With Overload Clutch, it protects itself against hard blows. It is also completely water and dust proof, so you don't have to worry about its functionality when you're crossing rivers, muddy trails or even when using high-pressure cleaners. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: SRAM Apex XPLR AXS 12-speed Rear Derailleur
description: The SRAM Apex AXS 12-speed rear derailleur from the XPLR gravel series The Apex XPLR AXS 12-speed rear derailleur from SRAM is your choice for an electronic single-ring gravel drivetrain. A spring clutch keeps the chain at the required tension, and you also benefit from quiet, reliable shifting. The proven and intuitive eTap shifting logic is also used here. Thanks to AXS connectivity, you don't have to install cables because the rear derailleur communicates wirelessly with the shifter. Via the AXS app you can access settings and personalise and evaluate the rear derailleur behaviour. We recommend ordering the battery required for operation and a suitable charger together with the rear derailleur. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here .
