name: SRAM X01 Eagle 12-Speed Rear Derailleur
description: The X01 Eagle 12-speed rear derailleur by SRAM - for an outstanding shifting experience This SRAM rear derailleur of the X01 Eagle series is of high quality workmanship, has an optmised weight and is suitable for 12 gears and Eagle cassettes with up to 52 teeth. It also remains very stable in Enduro use. Compared to the previous model, the cage design has been revised and now allows for more precise chain guidance and even sharper shifting. The rear derailleur is optimised for Eagle cassettes with 10-52 teeth, but delivers the same superior shifting performance in combination 10-50-tooth cassettes. Eagle cassettes with 10-50 teethEagle cassettes with 10-52 teeth revised cage architecture for optimum chain guidancelightweight hardwareswift, direct shifting operationseasy mounting of chain and rear wheel thanks to Cage Lock™colour-coordinated with Eagle components X-Actuation™: Developed specifically for 1x drivetrains, X-Actuation keeps shifting sharp and consistent across the entire cassette. Roller Bearing Clutch™: Rear derailleurs with Roller Bearing Clutch are equipped for rough and demanding terrain. Unimpressed by a ground full of roots, stones or rocks, the technology ensures a stable rear derailleur and prevents beating chains. The rear derailleur thus offers maximum drive stability without compromising on precision or performance. Cage Lock™: Thanks to the rear derailleur's Cage-Lock technology, the chain and the rear wheel can be fitted and removed really easily. Simply release the chain tension by pushing the shift cage forward and locking it. X-Horizon™: The parallelogram design of X-Horizon derailleurs limits movement along the horizontal axis, eliminating ghost shifting and reducing needed shifting force. The large offset of the upper shifting roller ensures a constant chain distance in every gear for faster and more precise shifting. X-Sync™: The X-Sync tooth design is characterised by long, rounded and slanted tooth edges with a narrow profile. Derailleur pulleys with X-Sync technology support the chain guide and remain unaffected by dust and mud. 1 x SRAM X01 Eagle 12-speed rear derailleur1 x SRAM chain gap adjustment gauge

It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. OT-RS900 is not intended for use on the shift/brake lever side. long: 1 x Shimano GRX RD-RX812 rear derailleur1 x Shimano OT-RS900 240 mm cable housing1 x long nose end cap

name: Shimano Acera RD-M3020 8-speed Rear Derailleur
description: Shimano Acera Rear Derailleur RD-M3020 - Wide compatibility for 8-speed derailleurs The RD-M3020 rear derailleur from Shimano's Acera series is used on mountain and urban bikes with 8-speed or certain 7-speed gears. Compared to the RD-M360 model, the wide compatibility is worth highlighting: The total capacity is 45 teeth, whereby the largest sprocket of the cassette can have a maximum of 40 teeth. A maximum of 12 teeth is possible on the smallest sprocket. The rear derailleur impresses with precise, fluid gear changes that are reliable even in rough terrain. It is mainly made of steel and has a cable adjuster. The derailleur pulleys have 11 teeth. name: Shimano CUES Shadow Plus RD-U8020 11-speed Derailleur
description: The CUES Shadow Plus RD-U8020 11-speed rear derailleur from Shimano is the perfect companion for your city, touring and trekking adventures. Its fully aluminium body offers long-lasting durability while keeping the weight low. Thanks to the mechanical shifting system, you can rely on precise and consistent gear changes. The innovative damping function effectively absorbs shocks and vibrations, which is especially beneficial on long rides or rough terrain. With 11 gears, you're well equipped to tackle any climb or terrain. In short, the CUES Shadow Plus RD-U8020 11-speed derailleur is an excellent choice for riders who value quality, performance and comfort.

name: Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 FD-R9250 2-/12-speed Front Derailleur
description: The FD-R9250 Dura-Ace Di2 Front Derailleur by Shimano - Slimmer, flatter, lighter The FD-R9250 electronic front derailleur for the Dura-Ace Di2 2x12-speed road bike groupset from Shimano has a more compact design than its predecessor, and is therefore even more aerodynamic. Thanks to baffles made of lightweight aluminium, there is a weight advantage of approx. 15 grams compared to the Ultegra model. With a total capacity of 16 teeth, this allows large chainrings with a maximum of 50 to 54 teeth to be shifted, whereby the shifting speed has been increased enormously compared to the past. The front derailleur is compatible with a chainline of 44.5 mm and is designed for braze-on mounting. With the help of a suitable adapter, however, it is also possible to mount a clamp on the frame. It is connected to the battery via a cable, which in turn is also connected to the rear derailleur and, if applicable, the STIs. Of course, FD-R9250 has the proven Synchro and Semi-Synchro Shift function, which enables an automated interaction with the rear derailleur and thus makes shifting easier. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . high shifting speed: 45 % faster than FD-R9150slimmer, flatter and lighter than predecessorfront area reduced by 33 %, thereby less wind resistanceconnected to battery via cablefully- and semi-synchronous shift mode adjustable (via E-Tube or rear derailleur)firmware updates via E-Tube Project4 joint bushingsouter parallelogram anodisedinner parallelogram and baffles plated Digital Integrated Intelligence (Di2) Di2 systems are the electronic shifting systems from Shimano. They are based on the SEIS, the Shimano Electronic Intelligent System, which takes over the index shifting function from the mechanical components, only via power cables or radio signals and not via a Bowden cable. Shifting is done by simply pressing a button. This has the advantage that no great effort is required, your concentration on the ride is not disturbed and operation is easy even with cold hands. In addition, the electronic gear changes are very fast and highly precise. There is also no risk of a defective circuit due to dirty cables or other problems. You can adjust individual settings via the E-Tube Project, such as adjusting the shifting speed, the number of shifting operations per button press or the Synchro or Semi-Synchro shifting function. Shimano offers an app for this purpose. Gear maintenance and firmware updates are also done via E-Tube, with the bike connected to a PC running the appropriate E-Tube software for more extensive workshop work. Shimano Synchronized Shift Shimano's synchronised shifting function is a shifting mode that automatically matches the Di2 rear derailleur and Di2 front derailleur. It is activated either via the E-Tube platform or via the rear derailleurs with a function button. Synchro Shift means that the front derailleur automatically selects a suitable gear depending on the position of the rear derailleur, while Semi-Synchro Shift means that a suitable rear derailleur position is automatically set when you operate the front derailleur. This gives you the advantage that you only have to concentrate on one side of the shifting process and are not thrown off-rhythm by sudden unfavourable changes to the gear ratio. I-FDR9250F 1 x Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 FD-R9250 front derailleur

name: Shimano 105 Di2 Front Derailleur FD-R7150 2/12-speed
description: Shimano 105 Di2 FD-R7150 Front Derailleur - Shifting has never been easier The FD-R7150 Di2 is the first electronic 2x front derailleur released by Shimano for the 105 road bike series. It weighs only about 30 grams more than the comparable Ultegra model. You benefit from ground-breaking innovations such as the Synchro Shift mode, in which the front derailleur automatically selects the appropriate chainring depending on the position of the rear derailleur. This makes the shifting process much easier and you can devote your full attention to the riding experience. Or you can go for Semi-Synchro Shift and still operate the front derailleur, but rely on the automatic adjustment of the rear derailleur. This avoids large gear changes and keeps your rhythm consistent. The FD-R7150 has a total capacity of 16 teeth and is compatible with large chainrings up to a maximum of 52 teeth and a chainline of 44.5 mm. It is designed for braze-on mounting, but with the help of a suitable adapter it can also be installed on the frame using a clamp. You connect it to the battery via a cable, which in turn is also connected to the rear derailleur. The inner parallelogram and the deflectors of the front derailleur are made of steel, the outer parallelogram is made of durable composite material to save weight. Shimano offers an app for this purpose. Gear maintenance and firmware updates are also done via E-Tube, with the bike connected to a PC running the appropriate E-Tube software for more extensive workshop work. name: Shimano GRX FD-RX820 2-/12-speed Front Derailleur
description: Shimano GRX FD-RX820 front derailleur - easy shifting on gravel bikes with 2x12-speed set-up The Shimano GRX FD-RX820 2x front derailleur for gravel use with 12-speed shifting impresses with its smooth function and simple set-up. Even on rough surfaces you can enjoy natural and smooth gear changes. The innovative toggle link construction gives you more cable routing options and the integrated tensioner makes adjustment easy. In keeping with the intended application, FD-RX820 has generous tyre clearance and is compatible with a chainline of 47 mm, a difference of about +3 mm compared to conventional road bike front derailleurs. The capacity of the front derailleur is 17 teeth, so it is compatible with chainring sizes up to 48 T. The model is designed for braze-on mounting, but can also be retrofitted with a clamp for frames without a socket. It is partly made of steel and partly of plastic, which provides more durability and keeps the weight low. mechanical front derailleur for use on gravel bikes with 2x12-speed gearssmooth shifting and easy set-up for riding on mixed terrainnatural and smooth gear changestoggle link design opens up more cable routing options (e.g. simple shift cable or with integrated cable stop)precise and simplified adjustability with integrated tensionerlarge tyre clearance and chainline 2.5 mm more to the outsidegenerous 17-tooth capacity7 joint bushingsparallelogram painted outside, plated insidechrome-plated cage plates IFDRX820F 1 x Shimano GRX FD-RX820 front derailleur Optional accessories: clamp adapter SM-AD91

name: SRAM Force eTap AXS D1 2-/12-speed Front Derailleur - Workshop packaging
description: Dive into the world of modern cycling with the SRAM Force eTap AXS D1 2-/12-speed front derailleur for road bikes – a wireless shifting system that will impress you with its precision and ease. Designed for 2x cranksets and 12-speed cassettes. Thanks to its innovative wireless design, installation is a breeze and gives your bike a clean, streamlined look. Optimal performance is ensured by a chainstay angle of 61° to 66°, guaranteeing efficient power transfer and smooth shifting. This shifting system is a must-have for every ambitious road cyclist who values technology, efficiency, and aesthetics. Get ready for a whole new riding experience where you stay in control and enjoy the freedom that only cycling can offer.

name: SRAM Force D2 AXS 2x Front Derailleur
description: The Force D2 AXS front derailleur by SRAM shifts cleanly electronically on the 2x road bike drivetrain This electronically controlled SRAM Force D2 AXS front derailleur shifts accurately and smoothly on your road bike with 2x drivetrain. It does not need a cable at all - it is best to order a rechargeable battery directly. The eTap shifting logic delivers uncomplicated, intuitive shifting. With the Yaw™ technology, no adjustment is necessary and the shifting operations are carried out directly and reliably. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . 2x front derailleur for 2x12-speed drivetrains on road bikes and moreclassic SRAM Yaw cage technology with optimised architecture for a new chainring combinationeasy personalisation with SRAM AXS eTap™ SRAM's eTap is a simple, unambiguous and intuitive shifting logic. With the shift lever on the left-hand side you move the rear derailleur inwards to a larger sprocket, with the shift lever on the right-hand side you move the derailleur outwards to a smaller sprocket. With the shift lever pressed down, you can directly shift several gears. Pressing both shift levers at the same time causes a front derailleur movement in 2x shifting systems. AXS™ AXS is SRAM's electronic integration platform that combines electronic bicycle components and software. The SRAM AXS app allows you to view battery status, change component behaviour, adjust controls, receive maintenance reminders and update firmware. Yaw™ The Yaw technology allows trim-free shifting, as the front derailleur cage describes an arc and is therefore at a constant angle to the chain. Shifting transitions are thus more direct and precise, providing unprecedented performance when shifting up front. 00.7618.176.000 1 x SRAM Force D2 AXS 2x front derailleur1 x SRAM bolt1 x SRAM washers3 x SRAM adapter wedges1 x SRAM screw1 x SRAM battery cover SRAM battery for eTap / AXS

name: Shimano Deore Derailleur FD-M6020 / FD-M6025 2x/10-speed
description: The Shimano Deore front derailleurs FD-M6020 and FD-M6025 offer a wide range of choices The Shimano Deore front derailleurs FD-M6020 and FD-M6025 ensure smooth chainring changes in 2x10-speed MTB drivetrains. The FD-M6025 is available with conventional down swing and top swing construction as well as cable routing from below or from both directions. In contrast, the FD-M6020 is a side-swing model with a novel design for even more tyre clearance. The front-pull cable routing ensures maximum efficiency with minimum operating forces. The mounting options are not only high clamp , low clamp, E-type and direct mount, the FD-M6020 for the first time also uses the mid-clamp option. This optimises the weight-function ratio and improves the optics. * E-type and direct mount versions are compatible with B-cranks with 3 mm outer chainlines. ** FD-M6020: Frames must be made for E-type mounts, retrofitting an E-type retaining plate is not possible. MTB 2x10-speed: * e-Type and Direct Mount only smooth shiftingefficient cable routingstable function on full suspension bikespainted parallelogram, plated cage plates2 joint bushings (FD-M6025-E/L) or 4 joint bushings (FD-M6020) or 8 joint bushings (FD-M6025-E/H) Side-Swing The Shimano Side-Swing front derailleurs are controlled from the front (Front-Pull), which allows for much more efficient cable routing. This significantly improves shifting performance, especially when shifting to the large chainring - with lower operating forces. Other advantages include increased tyre clearance thanks to the slimmed-down design and noise reduction thanks to the optimised chainstay angle. In addition, Side-Swing technology favours the construction of frames with shorter chainstays, which simplify the control of the bike. 1 x Shimano Deore FD-M6020 front derailleurorFD-M60251 x 28.6 mm adapter (only clamp model)1 x 31.8 mm adapter (only clamp model)

name: SRAM Force D2 AXS Front Derailleur 2-/12-speed - Workshop Packaging
description: Elevate your cycling experience with the cutting-edge SRAM Force D2 AXS 2-speed front derailleur designed specifically for the modern cyclist. This 12-speed marvel is the heart of your drivetrain, offering a seamless and wireless shifting system that ensures you're always in the right gear, whether you're tackling gravel, road, or cyclocross terrains. Compatible exclusively with Red eTap AXS groupsets, it promises a high-tech ride with unmatched efficiency and precision. The cassette's maximum chainring size of 50 teeth and a 2-speed crankset gearing level cater to a wide range of cycling styles and intensities. With a capacity of 13 teeth, it's engineered to handle steep climbs and fast descents with ease. The wireless shift system not only reduces cable clutter but also offers quick, reliable gear changes at the push of a button. Designed to fit chainstay angles between 61 - 66°, it ensures optimal chain alignment and smooth pedaling across all terrains. This gear cassette is a must-have for cyclists who demand the best in performance and technology.

name: Shimano Ultegra Di2 FD-R8150 2-/12-speed Front Derailleur
description: The Shimano FD-R8150 Ultegra Di2 Front Derailleur - Enormous shifting speed The FD-R8150 electronic front derailleur for the Ultegra 2x12-speed road bike groupset from Shimano has a more compact design than its predecessor and is therefore even more aerodynamic. With a total capacity of 16 teeth, this allows large chainrings with a maximum of 50 to 52 teeth to be shifted, whereby the shifting speed has been increased enormously compared to the past. The front derailleur is compatible with a chainline of 44.5 mm and is designed for braze-on mounting. With the help of a suitable adapter, however, it is also possible to mount a clamp on the frame. It is connected to the battery via a cable, which in turn is also connected to the rear derailleur and, if applicable, the STIs. Of course, FD-R8150 has the proven Synchro and Semi-Synchro Shift function, which enables an automated interaction with the rear derailleur and thus makes shifting easier. The inner parallelogram and the deflectors of the front derailleur are made of steel, the outer parallelogram is made of aluminium to save weight. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . high shifting speed: 45 % faster than FD-R9150slimmer, flatter and lighter than predecessorfront area reduced by 33 %, thereby less wind resistanceconnected to battery via cablefully- and semi-synchronous shift mode adjustable (via E-Tube or rear derailleur)firmware updates via E-Tube Project4 joint bushingspainted parallelogramplated cage plates Digital Integrated Intelligence (Di2) Di2 systems are the electronic shifting systems from Shimano. They are based on the SEIS, the Shimano Electronic Intelligent System, which takes over the index shifting function from the mechanical components, only via power cables or radio signals and not via a Bowden cable. Shifting is done by simply pressing a button. This has the advantage that no great effort is required, your concentration on the ride is not disturbed and operation is easy even with cold hands. In addition, the electronic gear changes are very fast and highly precise. There is also no risk of a defective circuit due to dirty cables or other problems. You can adjust individual settings via the E-Tube Project, such as adjusting the shifting speed, the number of shifting operations per button press or the Synchro or Semi-Synchro shifting function. Shimano offers an app for this purpose. Gear maintenance and firmware updates are also done via E-Tube, with the bike connected to a PC running the appropriate E-Tube software for more extensive workshop work. Shimano Synchronized Shift Shimano's synchronised shifting function is a shifting mode that automatically matches the Di2 rear derailleur and Di2 front derailleur. It is activated either via the E-Tube platform or via the rear derailleurs with a function button. Synchro Shift means that the front derailleur automatically selects a suitable gear depending on the position of the rear derailleur, while Semi-Synchro Shift means that a suitable rear derailleur position is automatically set when you operate the front derailleur. This gives you the advantage that you only have to concentrate on one side of the shifting process and are not thrown off-rhythm by sudden unfavourable changes to the gear ratio. I-FDR8150F 1 x Shimano Ultegra Di2 FD-R8150 front derailleur

name: SRAM Rival eTap AXS 2-/12-Speed Front Derailleur
description: The SRAM Rival eTap AXS Front Derailleur - For 2x12-speed drivetrains on road bikes The SRAM eTap AXS front derailleur from the Rival series is electronically controlled and shifts smoothly and directly on your road bike with 2x12-speed drivetrain. It harmonises especially with X-Range chainrings with a gradation of 33-46 or 35-48 teeth. With AXS, you can shift electronically without any wiring, and you can also adjust the shifting behaviour with the help of the app. The eTap shifting logic is intuitive and allows for uncomplicated shifting. Thanks to Yaw technology, fine adjustment is unnecessary. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . optimised for chainring combinations with 33-46 or 35-48 teetheasy personalisation with SRAM AXSclassic Yaw shift cage technology AXS™: AXS is SRAM's electronic integration platform that combines electronic bicycle components and software. The SRAM AXS app allows you to view battery status, change component behaviour, adjust controls, receive maintenance reminders and update firmware. eTap™: SRAM's eTap is a simple, unambiguous and intuitive shifting logic. With the shift lever on the left-hand side you move the rear derailleur inwards to a larger sprocket, with the shift lever on the right-hand side you move the derailleur outwards to a smaller sprocket. With the shift lever pressed down, you can directly shift several gears. Pressing both shift levers at the same time causes a front derailleur movement in 2x shifting systems. Yaw™: The Yaw technology allows trim-free shifting, as the front derailleur cage describes an arc and is therefore at a constant angle to the chain. Shifting transitions are thus more direct and precise, providing unprecedented performance when shifting up front. 00.7618.172.000 1 x SRAM Rival eTap AXS front derailleur1 x SRAM bolt1 x SRAM washer3 x SRAM adapter wedges1 x bolt SRAM battery for eTap / AXSSRAM charger for eTap / AXS

name: absoluteBLACK HOLLOWcage Carbon Ceramic Oversized Derailleur Pulley Shimano 8150
description: absoluteBLACK HOLLOWcage Carbon Ceramic - quiet and highly efficient oversized derailleur pulley system for Shimano R8150 The HOLLOWcage derailleur pulley system by absoluteBLACK - here in the version for the Shimano Ultegra Di2 R8150 12-speed rear derailleurs - has a super-light, single-sided carbon polymer cage and super-quiet running derailleur pulleys with oversized ceramic bearings. It is characterised by top shifting performance with extremely low noise development. The secret is the built-in Xring rubber ring, which dampens the impact of the chain on the teeth of the idler pulley, eliminating the biggest source of annoying rear derailleur noise. With the absoluteBLACK Silent-Xring pulleys, your bike ist therefore significantly quieter than with conventional polymer or aluminium derailleur pulleys and approx. 40% (or at least 5 decibels) quieter than with the original Shimano shifting cogs. Full ceramic bearings are used, i.e. both the bearing balls and the raceways are made of ceramic. This way you benefit from maximum efficiency, long durability and mileage. Ball bearing cage and seals are made of low-friction polymer. The minimalist HOLLOWcage made of carbon and polymer and its colour-contrasting lower lockring create a spectacular look. It also contributes significantly to the fact that the whole system does not weigh much more than 70 grams. Shimano Ultegra Di2 RD-R8150 derailleur pulley system with one-piece carbon polymer cage and oversized, ceramic bearing-mounted pulleysSilent-Xring idler: 5 to 7 decibels (or 40 %) quieter than original pulley thanks to the built-in X-ring rubber ring for damping chain guide noisehighly efficient all-ceramic bearings (balls made of silicon nitride ceramic, raceways made of zirconium oxide ceramic) with cage and seals made of low-friction polymertop shifting performance at the same level as the originalweight saving through open mono-plate construction of the carbon-polymer cagelower lock ring in contrasting colour for a spectacular lookthree spring tension options For Compact and Sub-Compact chainring increments (i.e. up to 34-50 t), select the lowest spring tension option (first hole from the left). However, when riding on rough surfaces such as cobblestones, roads with potholes, etc., it is recommended to set the high spring tension option (first hole from the right). Select the high spring tension for a chainring size of 52 teeth or larger. 1 x absoluteBLACK HOLLOWcage Carbon Ceramic Oversized Shimano 8150 derailleur pulley system1 x lockring tool2 x absoluteBLACK Xring replacement rubber rings

name: CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated Derailleur Pulley System for Shimano R9100 / R8000-SS
description: CeramicSpeed OSPW coated derailleur pulley system for Shimano 9100 / 8000-SS - the ultimate upgrade With the CeramicSpeed OSPW derailleur pulley system for Shimano Dura-Ace RD-R9100 and Ultegra RD-R8000-SS, you can upgrade your drivetrain for more performance and durability. It consists of a 13-tooth upper derailleur pulley and a 19-tooth lower derailleur pulley (black, gold or red) based on super-smooth ceramic bearings. Additionally, a weight-saving carbon cage is used. Compared to the predecessor model, a stop bolt has been added to simplify the installation. Besides the 11-speed mechanical rear derailleurs mentioned above, this system is also compatible with the Dura-Ace RD-R9150 and Ultegra RD-R8050-SS electronic rear derailleurs. Like all Oversized Pulley Wheel (OSPW) systems from CeramicSpeed, the Shimano version also provides less friction compared to standard derailleur pulleys and allows a significant reduction in power. There are also other advantages of the Coated version: The metallic coating of the bearing races improves the already strong performance even further, the durability also increases and the bearing has almost no wear. For hazard warnings, safety and application information, please see CeramicSpeed Oil for Derailleur Pulleys . high-performance bearings with special ceramic balls made of grade 3 silicon nitride (best achievable degree for ceramic bearings)CeramicSpeed bearing balls: 15% harder, 100% smoother and 99% more resilient than commercially available ceramic ballsball bearing retainer made of reinforced polyamide, race made of hardened steel with polished channeladditional metal-coated race for more performance and durabilityunique durability and performance: energy savings of up to 2.4 watts, up to 60% less friction thanks to the OSPW systemhandmade in Denmark Ceramic Bearings by CeramicSpeed CeramicSpeed ceramic balls are rounder, harder, smoother, lighter and more resilient than steel balls and ceramic balls from other manufacturers. CeramicSpeed ceramic bearings therefore last 3 to 5 times longer than other commercially available bearings. All CeramicSpeed bearings are manufactured by hand in Denmark under clean room conditions and are subject to a strict four-stage control procedure. Among other things, the size of the ceramic balls is checked down to the thousandth of a millimetre. Tests are then carried out in the laboratory or preferably by professionals in training and competition. CeramicSpeed bottom brackets guarantee you the lowest possible friction, optimised power transfer and maximum durability and also help you save watts and reach the finish line faster. It's not about seconds, it's about minutes! OSPW The Oversized Pulley Wheel System (OSPW System) is a breakthrough innovation by CeramicSpeed, developed in collaboration with world-class triathletes. This unique system is known for 40 - 60% less friction compared to standard derailleur pulleys and allows power savings of at least 1.6 and up to 2.4 watts. The OSPW system features the unique CeramicSpeed bearing, aluminium derailleur pulleys and a polyamide-carbon cage, making it 3 to 5 times more durable than standard systems on the market. A real advance in the field of cycling performance. Coated CeramicSpeed coated products offer the ultimate in performance and durability. This is achieved by a unique coating that increases the hardness of the races, so that in combination with the smoothness of CeramicSpeed ball bearings, there is virtually no bearing wear. The coating is a metal layer that is 75% harder than hardened steel. It is applied very thinly (0.003 mm) and evenly over the entire surface of the race and is used both internally and externally for optimum results. 1 x CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated derailleur pulley system for Shimano R91001 x CeramicSpeed oil, 15 ml dropper bottle1 x sticker sheet

name: CeramicSpeed OSPW RS Alpha Derailleur Pulley System for Shimano R9250 / R8150
description: oversize derailleur pulley system with ceramic bearings for Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 RD-R9250 and Ultegra Di2 RD-R8150Further Drive technology to improve and extend performance in road usehigh-performance bearings with very hard, above-average supple and resilient ceramic balls made of grade-3 silicon nitride (best achievable grade for ceramic bearings)Alpha Disc tension pulley for greater rigidity, durability, safety and reduced noise levelscompatible with 10-34 12-speed cassetteshandmade in Denmark For hazard warnings, safety and application information, please see CeramicSpeed Oil for Derailleur Pulleys . Ceramic Bearings by CeramicSpeed CeramicSpeed ceramic balls are rounder, harder, smoother, lighter and more resilient than steel balls and ceramic balls from other manufacturers. CeramicSpeed ceramic bearings therefore last 3 to 5 times longer than other bearings on the market. All CeramicSpeed bearings are handmade in Denmark under clean room conditions and subjected to a strict four-stage inspection process. Among other things, the size of the ceramic balls is checked down to the thousandth of a millimetre. Tests are then carried out in the laboratory or preferably by professionals in training and competition. CeramicSpeed bearings guarantee the lowest possible friction, optimised power transfer and maximum durability and also help you save watts and reach the finish line faster. It's not about seconds, it's about minutes! OSPW The Oversized Pulley Wheel System (OSPW system) is a breakthrough innovation from CeramicSpeed, developed in collaboration with world-class triathletes. This unique system is known for 40 - 60% less friction compared to standard derailleur pulleys and allows power savings of at least 1.6 and up to 2.4 watts. The OSPW system features the unique CeramicSpeed bearings, aluminium derailleur pulleys and a polyamide-carbon cage, making it 3 to 5 times more durable than standard systems on the market. Further Drive CeramicSpeed derailleur pulley systems with Further Drive technology are designed to make your drivetrain more durable and less sensitive to wear so that it works efficiently over a long period of time. This means you can still fully rely on it at the end of the race or late in the season. Further Drive includes a completely revised cage structure of the OSPW system with greater material thickness, but without unnecessary weight. ADR and ALPHA Disc are also central components of the Further Drive concept. ALPHA Disc ALPHA Disc is a two-part construction that affects the lower pulley, the tension pulley. The teeth have a Narrow-Wide profile for better chain retention and are made of a highly wear-resistant, noise-reducing composite material. They sit on a solid aluminium disc, which prevents foreign objects such as branches from getting caught. At the same time, the disc increases the strength and rigidity of the derailleur pulley. The first ALPHA discs were tested at the Cyclocross World Cup. The technology was then used regularly by the Tormans CX Team sponsored by CeramicSpeed and was able to impress in the most difficult conditions. Before transporting the bicycle in a travel bag, the rear derailleur should be completely disassembled, otherwise the OSPW system could be damaged. 1 x CeramicSpeed OSPW RS Alpha derailleur pulley system for Shimano R9250 / R81501 x CeramicSpeed oil, 15 ml dropper bottle
specs: {"Application": "Road, Triathlon & Time Trial", "Gearing": "12-speed", "Cassette Teeth (max.)": "34-tooth", "Compatibility": "Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 RD-R9250, Ultegra Di2 RD-R8150", "Derailleur Pulleys": "13 tooth (upper derailleur pulley), 19 tooth (lower derailleur pulley)", "Outer Cage Material": "polyamide", "Inner Cage Material": "polyamide", "Other Materials": "aluminium, composite", "Bearings": "Ceramic", "black": "113490", "team edition-black": "113491"}

name: CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated Derailleur Pulley System for SRAM Rival AXS
description: CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated System for SRAM Rival AXS - additional metal coating The CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated derailleur pulley system for SRAM Rival AXS rear derailleurs has oversized pulleys with ceramic bearings whose races have been coated with metal for added durability. This unique system is known for 40 - 60% less friction compared to standard derailleur pulleys and allows power savings of at least 1.6 and up to 2.4 watts. The OSPW system features the unique CeramicSpeed bearing, aluminium derailleur pulleys and a polyamide-carbon cage, making it 3 to 5 times more durable than standard systems on the market. Coated CeramicSpeed coated products offer the ultimate in performance and durability. This is achieved by a unique coating that increases the hardness of the races, so that in combination with the smoothness of CeramicSpeed ball bearings, there is virtually no bearing wear. The coating is a metal layer that is 75% harder than hardened steel. It is applied very thinly (0.003 mm) and evenly over the entire surface of the race and is used both internally and externally for optimum results. Before transporting the bicycle in a travel bag, the rear derailleur should be completely disassembled, otherwise the OSPW system could be damaged. 1 x CeramicSpeed OSPW Coated derailleur pulley system for SRAM Rival AXS1 x CeramicSpeed oil, 15 ml dropper bottle1 x assembly tool

name: Schwalbe Inner Tube No. 7 for 20"
description: Inner tube for 20" tyres. 20 x 1.50 (40-406)20 x 1.75 (47-406)20 x 2.00 (50-406)20 x 2.10 (54-406)20 x 2.125 (57-406)20 x 2.35 (60-406)20 x 2.50 (62-406)20 x 2.00 (54-428) 20x1.5-2.0 AV / Schrader 20x1,5-2.0 SV / Presta 20x1.5-2.0 DV / Dunlop Tubes are available with various valve types. Choosing a valve is dependent on application and the rim's valve hole diameter. AV / Schrader Valve: Synonyms: Auto Valve (AV), Schrader ValveOuter Diameter: 8.5 mm SV / Presta Valve: Synonyms: Sclaverand Valve (SV), French Valve, Presta ValveOuter Diameter: 6.5 mmOther: all Schwalbe tubes with a Presta valve can be unscrewed. (To lengthen the valve, add anti-flat agents, etc.) DV / Dunlop Valve: Synonyms: Blitz Valve, Normal Valve (NV)Outer Diameter: 8.5 mm Inflation Pressure Stability A Schwalbe inner tube maintains the air much longer. The quality of the inner tube is already determined by its raw materials, through the ingredients and the purity of the rubber compound. During vulcanisation, each Schwalbe inner tube is placed in a mould and is then inflated. This is the only way to ensure a uniform wall thickness and excellent air retention. Reliability Rigorous monitoring that ensures the best operational reliability: each inner tube is inflated in the fabric and stored under pressure for 24 hours to check the air retention ability. Tube Groups System Due to its high elasticity and quality, a single inner tube covers a large number of tyre sizes. For example, inner tube no. 17 works just as well for 28 mm wide tyres as for 47 mm wide tyres. Only an extremely high-quality and reliable inner tube can meet this requirement. 1 x Schwalbe No. 7 inner tube

name: Schwalbe Tube 7 Air Plus for 20"
description: Schwalbe's Air Plus Inner Tube 7 for 20" tyres is characterised by its special puncture resistance and air retention and is therefore also suitable for e-bikes and cargo bikes. This is made possible by a 70% higher wall thickness and a high proportion of pure butyl rubber. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. 20 x 1.50 (40-406)20 x 1.75 (47-406)20 x 2.00 (50-406)20 x 2.10 (54-406)20 x 2.125 (57-406)20 x 2.35 (60-406)20 x 2.40 (62-406) 40/62-406 SV / Presta 40 mm 40/62-406 AV / Schrader 40 mm Tubes are available with various valve types. Choosing a valve is dependent on application and the rim's valve hole diameter. AV / Schrader Valve: SV / Presta Valve: Good to know: The valve of all Schwalbe tubes with Presta valves can be unscrewed, e.g. for valve extensions or for filling with tyre sealant. Air Plus: Schwalbe's Air Plus tubes hold the air much longer than other tubes due to their high proportion of pure butyl rubber, so that you need to re-pump less often. Puncture Protection: 70% more wall thickness makes the Air Plus inner tubes exceptionally robust against punctures and snake bites. 1 x Schwalbe No. 7AP inner tubes

name: tubolito Tubo-BMX 20" Inner Tube - 2021 Model
description: Get ready to ride through the city, hit the dirt jumps, and master the slopestyle with the Tubo-BMX 20" Inner Tube from Tubolito. Designed for the urban warrior, the dirt enthusiast, and the slopestyle artist, this inner tube is perfect for MTB, city, and touring applications. Made from a high-tech plastic (TPU), it offers durability and flexibility that traditional rubber tubes can't match. With a minimum and maximum diameter of 406, it fits perfectly into your 20" wheels, ensuring a snug and secure fit. The maximum width of 64 allows for compatibility with a wide range of tire sizes, giving you the versatility you need for different riding styles. The valve, also made from plastic (TPU), guarantees a reliable air seal with every pump. Lightweight yet tough, this inner tube is a game-changer for riders looking to minimize their bike's weight without sacrificing reliability. Whether you're weaving through city streets, launching off dirt ramps, or flowing through slopestyle courses, the Tubo-BMX 20" Inner Tube is your go-to for an unbeatable ride. Say goodbye to frequent flats and hello to more time on your bike, doing what you love.

name: Schwalbe Aerothan 26" Inner Tube
description: Schwalbe's Aerothan inner tube for 26" mountain bikes combines optimal puncture resistance and minimal rolling resistance - and is extra lightweight to boot. It keeps its shape even at lower pressure, and its robust material prevents snakebites and sidewall damage. Outside the tyre, your Aerothane inner tube can be carefully inflated until it is wrinkle-free and has a round contour. This corresponds to a maximum pressure of 0.3 bar. It should never be filled with a pressure exceeding this value. Otherwise, there is a risk that the Aertothan will overstretch or burst. 26 x 2.10 (54-559)26 x 2.25 (57-559)26 x 2.35 (60-559)26 x 2.40 (62-559) 26 x 2.1-2.4 SV / Presta 40 mm: Tubes are available with various valve types. Choosing a valve is dependent on application and the rim's valve hole diameter. SV / Presta Valve: Good to know: The valve of all Schwalbe tubes with Presta valves can be unscrewed, e.g. for valve extensions or for filling with tyre sealant. 1 x Schwalbe Aerothan inner tube For on the road, you can order the matching Glueless Patches patches for travel.

name: Schwalbe 21+ Air Plus Inner Tube for 27.5" / 27.5+ - Workshop packaging
description: The Schwalbe inner tube 21+ Air Plus for 27,5"/27,5+ is the ultimate companion for both city slickers and mountain trail enthusiasts and is designed to fit seamlessly into your urban and off-road biking adventures. Crafted from high-quality butyl material, it offers exceptional durability and puncture resistance, ensuring a smooth and reliable ride no matter the terrain. Whether you're navigating the bustling streets of the city or tackling rugged mountain trails, this tube provides the versatility needed for diverse cycling demands. Its robust construction minimizes air loss, allowing for longer periods between inflations and ensuring your bike is always ready to go. Ideal for those who love to explore both urban landscapes and the great outdoors, this butyl tube is a must-have in your cycling kit.

name: tubolito Tubo-CX/Gravel-All Tube 27.5"/28" Model 2025
description: Elevate your cyclocross and gravel riding experience with the tubolito Tubo-CX/Gravel-All 27,5"/28" inner tubes, designed specifically for the demanding conditions of off-road cycling. Crafted from durable plastic (TPU), these tubes offer exceptional puncture resistance and longevity, ensuring you stay rolling through the toughest terrains. Compatible with tire sizes ranging from 650 x 32B to 700 x 50C, they provide a versatile fit for a wide array of bicycles. The plastic (TPU) valve material further enhances durability, making these tubes a reliable choice for adventurous riders. Whether you're tackling muddy cyclocross courses or exploring gravel paths, these tubes are engineered to deliver optimal performance and comfort. Their lightweight design doesn't compromise on strength, offering you the perfect balance between weight and resilience. Easy to install and replace, they are a must-have for cyclists who demand the best in reliability and efficiency.

name: Schwalbe Aerothan 27.5" / 27.5+ Inner Tube
description: Schwalbe's Aerothan inner tube for 27.5" and 27.5+ mountain bike tyres combine optimal puncture resistance, low weight and minimal rolling resistance. It keeps its shape even at lower pressure, and its robust material prevents snakebites and sidewall damage. Outside the tyre, your Aerothane inner tube can be carefully inflated until it is wrinkle-free and has a round contour. This corresponds to a maximum pressure of 0.3 bar. It should never be filled with a pressure exceeding this value. (To lengthen the valve, add anti-flat agents, etc.) Inflation Pressure Stability A Schwalbe inner tube maintains the air much longer. The quality of the inner tube is already determined by its raw materials, through the ingredients and the purity of the rubber compound. During vulcanisation, each Schwalbe inner tube is placed in a mould and is then inflated. This is the only way to ensure a uniform wall thickness and excellent air retention. Reliability Rigorous monitoring that ensures the best operational reliability: each inner tube is inflated in the fabric and stored under pressure for 24 hours to check the air retention ability. Tube Groups System Due to its high elasticity and quality, a single inner tube covers a large number of tyre sizes. For example, inner tube no. 17 works just as well for 28 mm wide tyres as for 47 mm wide tyres. Only an extremely high-quality and reliable inner tube can meet this requirement. 5 x Schwalbe No. 19 inner tube

name: tubolito Tubo-Road-700C Tube Model 2025
description: Hit the road with confidence with the tubolito Tubo-Road-700C model 2025 premium road bike tube, designed for tire sizes ranging from 700 x 18C to 700 x 32C. Crafted from high-quality plastic (TPU), this tube offers unparalleled durability and resistance to punctures, ensuring a smooth ride on any road surface. The valve, also made from sturdy plastic (TPU), guarantees a secure and leak-free connection, making inflation quick and easy. Whether you're a casual rider or a competitive racer, this tube is the perfect upgrade for any road cycling enthusiast looking for reliability and performance. Its lightweight design doesn't compromise on strength, providing you with the perfect balance between speed and safety. Say goodbye to frequent stops for repairs and hello to longer, uninterrupted rides. This tube is your go-to choice for enhancing your road cycling experience, offering peace of mind with every pedal stroke.

name: tubolito Tubo-S-Road-700c Inner Tube 28"

(To lengthen the valve, add anti-flat agents, etc.) Inflation Pressure Stability A Schwalbe inner tube maintains the air much longer. The quality of the inner tube is already determined by its raw materials, through the ingredients and the purity of the rubber compound. During vulcanisation, each Schwalbe inner tube is placed in a mould and is then inflated. This is the only way to ensure a uniform wall thickness and excellent air retention. Reliability Rigorous monitoring that ensures the best operational reliability: each inner tube is inflated in the fabric and stored under pressure for 24 hours to check the air retention ability. Tube Groups System Due to its high elasticity and quality, a single inner tube covers a large number of tyre sizes. For example, inner tube no. 17 works just as well for 28 mm wide tyres as for 47 mm wide tyres. Only an extremely high-quality and reliable inner tube can meet this requirement. 1 x Schwalbe No. 15 inner tube

This is made possible by a 70% higher wall thickness and a high proportion of pure butyl rubber. (To lengthen the valve, add anti-flat agents, etc.) Inflation Pressure Stability A Schwalbe inner tube maintains the air much longer. The quality of the inner tube is already determined by its raw materials, through the ingredients and the purity of the rubber compound. During vulcanisation, each Schwalbe inner tube is placed in a mould and is then inflated. This is the only way to ensure a uniform wall thickness and excellent air retention. Reliability Rigorous monitoring that ensures the best operational reliability: each inner tube is inflated in the fabric and stored under pressure for 24 hours to check the air retention ability. Tube Groups System Due to its high elasticity and quality, a single inner tube covers a large number of tyre sizes. For example, inner tube no. 17 works just as well for 28 mm wide tyres as for 47 mm wide tyres. Only an extremely high-quality and reliable inner tube can meet this requirement. 25 x Schwalbe No. 19 inner tube

name: DT Swiss FR 541 Disc 29" Rim
description: The FR 541 Disc 29" Rim by DT Swiss - For custom freeride wheels Use the FR 541 rim from DT Swiss to build the 29" downhill wheel of your choice. The weight-optimised rim for disc brakes impresses with particularly high impact resistance. The forged aluminium is particularly robust, which is why the rim holes do not require eyelets. This also contributes to weight savings. The shape of the rims with hooks for wired and folding tyres has been designed in such a way that the risk punctures in the inner tube is enormously reduced. description: Unleash your inner speed demon with the C-2345 Disc Carbon 28" rim by Mavic Experience the pinnacle of performance with the C-2345 Disc Carbon 28" rim, a game-changer for road, triathlon, and time trial enthusiasts. Designed by Mavic, these wheels are engineered to push the limits of speed and efficiency. The UST Tubeless technology not only reduces the risk of flats but also improves rolling resistance, so you can glide faster and with less effort. With an inner rim width of 23 mm, they are optimized for clincher or folding tires, ensuring a snug fit and optimal performance. Whether you're aiming to set a new personal best or stand atop the podium, the C-2345 Disc Carbon 28" rim are your ticket to excellence.

name: Mavic A-22 Disc 29" rim
description: Explore New Horizons with the A-22 Disc 29" Rim by Mavic for Road, Cyclocross, Gravel, and City & Touring Embark on your next adventure with the A-22 Disc 29" Rim by Mavic, designed for versatility across Road, Cyclocross, Gravel, and City & Touring applications. This rim is your gateway to exploring new paths and conquering diverse terrains. Crafted from high-quality Aluminum, the A-22 Disc Rim ensures durability and a lightweight feel, making your ride smoother and more enjoyable. Its compatibility with Disc brake systems adds to your confidence, offering reliable stopping power in various weather conditions. The UST Tubeless system is a standout feature, allowing for a reduction in flats and an improvement in traction, giving you the freedom to ride with less worry and more grip. With a valve hole diameter of SV (6.5 mm) and an inner rim width of 22.00 mm, this rim accommodates a wide range of clincher tyres and folding tyres, providing flexibility in tyre choice for different riding experiences. The Effective Rim Diameter (ERD) of 596 mm ensures a perfect fit for your 29" wheels, enhancing the overall performance of your bike. Whether you're navigating city streets, tackling gravel paths, or enjoying a scenic tour, the A-22 Disc 29" Rim is your reliable partner. Upgrade your bike with this rim and experience the difference in your ride's quality and performance. Get ready to push your limits and explore further with the A-22 Disc Rim.

name: Mavic P1-21 Disc 29" Rim
description: Unleash Speed with P1-21 Disc 29" Rim by Mavic Experience the perfect blend of durability and performance with the P1-21 Disc 29" Rim, specifically designed for road cycling enthusiasts. Crafted by Mavic, this rim is engineered to elevate your road cycling experience. Its aluminum construction ensures both lightness and strength, making it an ideal choice for riders seeking to improve their bike's responsiveness and speed. Compatible with disc brake systems, it offers superior stopping power in all conditions, ensuring your safety on long descents and high-speed rides. The rim's 21mm inner width is optimized for clincher and folding tires, providing a snug fit and enhancing tire stability for a smoother, more efficient ride. With an ERD (Effective Rim Diameter) of 589 mm, it supports a wide range of tire sizes, allowing you to customize your setup according to your riding preferences and conditions. Whether you're upgrading your current road bike or building a new one from scratch, the P1-21 Disc 29" Rim is a choice that promises to enhance your cycling performance and enjoyment. Get ready to push your limits and experience the road like never before.

Whether you're aiming for a personal best in your next triathlon or tackling challenging road routes, the C-2132 Disc Carbon 28" Rim is your ally for achieving peak performance. name: Mavic Rim
description: Elevate your road, triathlon, and time trial performance with our high-quality aluminum clincher rims, designed specifically for rim brake systems. These lightweight rims boast a 32-spoke configuration, ensuring durability and reliable performance on any course. With an inner rim width of 15.00 mm and an outer rim width of 19.00 mm, they accommodate clincher and folding tires perfectly, offering a seamless fit and enhanced riding experience. The rims feature a standard SV valve hole diameter of 6.5 mm, making them compatible with a wide range of tires. Crafted without a tubeless system, they focus on simplicity and efficiency, providing a straightforward setup for athletes who value speed and precision. The effective rim diameter (ERD) of 596 mm ensures a snug fit for your tires, optimizing aerodynamics and reducing drag for faster times. Whether you're pushing the pace in a time trial or fighting for position in a triathlon, these rims are built to help you achieve your best performance.

name: Mavic Open Pro Carbon UST 28" Rim
description: The Open Pro Carbon UST rim by Mavic - with laser machined brake tracks The Mavic Open Pro Carbon UST rim crowns the Mavic Open Pro series. It is slightly lighter than the aluminium model thanks to carbon fibres and features iTgMAX brake track technology for optimum braking performance in all conditions. It is best to ride them without a tube to benefit from Road Tubeless advantages, such as lower rolling resistance, puncture protection and less weight. The rim profile of the Open Pro Carbon is 25 mm high and therefore rather flat. tubeless rim tape width: 25 mm (included)tubeless ready (with Mavic UST valve - included)100 % carbonflat profileconventional rim drilling iTgMAX Integral Glass Transition Temperature. iTgMAX means an inner rim bed sealed with multiple layers of seamless carbon fibre to achieve a unique one-piece rim shape without cutting away fibres. The brake track is given a lasered finish to guarantee optimum braking efficiency. Consistent and efficient braking, 50 % less time to decelerate in wet conditions. The most reliable carbon rim that withstands the toughest use of the most powerful riders in the worst conditions. Road UST UST means Universal Standard for Tubeless and is compatible with UST Tubeless Ready tyres. The UST technology improves traction, control and riding comfort with reduced inertia and reduced risk of punctures. 1 x Mavic Open Pro Carbon UST rim1 x Mavic tubeless rim tape1 x UST valve with accessorieswashers for nipples

Its versatility and durability make it a must-have accessory in your cycling toolkit. name: Schwalbe Tubeless Valve Set
description: The Schwalbe Tubeless valve set of 2 simplifies tubeless mounting Schwalbe's tubeless valves come in a revised version. They are available in lengths of up to 100 mm, making valve extensions redundant. The inner diameter at the valve base has been increased to 4 mm, which makes it easier to inflate the tyre with air and sealant and reduces the risk of blockages caused by particles in the sealant. The hex socket allows the valve to be mounted more firmly into the rim. Due to the shortened cone, the valve base sinks deeper into the valve hole and thus makes room for the tyre beads. In addition, the O-ring has been enlarged. The valve now adapts perfectly to different rim contours, and the valve nut prevents damage to the rim. 2 x Schwalbe tubeless valves

name: DT Swiss MTB
description: Elevate your mountain biking experience with our DT Swiss 350 MTB DEG 72 LTD Boost disc brake rear hub, designed for the most demanding All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB trails. Crafted from durable aluminum, the hub shell promises lightweight performance without compromising on strength. The innovative disc brake system, compatible with 6-bolt rotors, ensures precise and reliable stopping power in all conditions, letting you tackle steep descents and technical trails with confidence. Equipped with a Ratchet DEG 72 freehub, this hub offers quick engagement, allowing for efficient power transfer and smooth acceleration. Whether you're pushing your limits on challenging terrains or enjoying a leisurely ride through scenic trails, this versatile wheelset is engineered to boost your performance and enhance your riding experience.

name: e*thirteen Quick Fill Tubeless Valve - 2 Pack
description: The e*thirteen Quick Fill Tubeless valves for easy filling with sealant and air The Quick Fill tubeless valves from e*thirteen allow you to easily add sealant and quickly pump a lot of air into your tyres. They have a four-part structure. To fill with sealant, simply unscrew the valve core holder, for which you do not need any tools. The valve core itself does not need to be removed. Tip: The opening of the valve stem connection fits perfectly with the 100 ml bottle of e*thirteen's Tire Plasma. The generous inner diameter of 3.5 mm reduces the risk of the connection sticking, and more air flows when inflating. This makes the valves ideal for mountain bike tyres with a lot of volume. tubeless valves for easy handlingfour-part design with unique valve core holdereasy removal of the valve core holder for filling with sealant without toolsvalve stem ideal for spill-free filling of sealant with the100 ml Tire Plasma bottlevalve stem connector with large diameter (3.5 mm)large air flow during inflationless risk of sticking Schrader 16-24 mm: Schrader 23-31 mm: SV / Presta 16-24 mm: SV / Presta 23-31 mm: 2 x e*thirteen Quick Fill tubeless valves2 x valve caps

name: DT Swiss Upgrade-Kit 3 Pawl to Ratchet LN
description: DT Swiss Upgrade-Kit 3 Pawl to Ratchet LN - Pawl freehub for entry-level wheels This upgrade kit from DT Swiss allows you to convert your hub with a 3-pawl ratchet freehub to a Ratchet-LN disc freehub with 18 teeth. This will bring your 1900 wheelset with 370 hubs up to modern standards. Optionally, the freehub can also be upgraded with 24, 36 or 54 tooth pulleys. 1900 wheels with 370 hub1800 Road wheels with 370 hub The Ratchet LN rotor cannot be used with 240s and 350 hubs. converts hubs with pawl freehub to ratchet freehubratchet with 18 teethefficient connexion for a good propulsionsealing ring attached to the freehub bodymodular constructioneasy maintenance without special tools Ratchet LN The Ratchet LN freehub is used to convert DT Swiss 370 hubs with pawls to a ratchet freehub. The advantage, compared to pawls, is the significantly larger contact surface with improved frictional connection. The seal attached to the freehub body, and not to the hub shell as usual, makes the freehub body easily replaceable. The modular design allows free selection of the engagement angle (18, 24, 36 or 54 teeth) and of the freehub body. name: DT Swiss 350 SP PL-7 Disc Center Lock Hub Dynamo
description: Get ready to power up your gravel adventures with the 350 SP PL-7 Disc Center Lock Hub Dynamo by DT Swiss. Designed specifically for gravel riding, this hub dynamo is your go-to for reliable, self-sustained lighting and power on the go. With its straightpull (straight) head, you're looking at enhanced durability and performance, ensuring you can keep pushing through any terrain. The disc center lock brake system offers precise stopping power, essential for those unpredictable gravel paths. Thanks to its hub dynamo, you'll never worry about lights going out, boasting an impressive 72% efficiency at 15 km/h in a 28" wheel. The aluminum hub shell material not only adds to its sturdiness but also keeps it lightweight, making sure your ride remains swift. The power output connection comes with a 2-pin plug, making it easy to connect your devices. With a flange distance of 44.1 mm (22 mm / 22.1 mm) and a pitch circle diameter of 47.0 mm / 47.0 mm, it's designed for optimal balance and support. Whether you're embarking on an early morning ride or a late-night adventure, this hub dynamo will light the way forward, ensuring you're always ready for what lies ahead on your gravel journey.

name: DT Swiss Tool Set for EXP Rear Hubs
description: Tool Set for DT Swiss EXP Rear Hubs - Do-it-yourself servicing This tool set from DT Swiss allows you to disassemble and reassemble your 180 or 240 EXP rear hub for servicing. The set consists of a tool for installing and removing the ratchet, a tool for installing and removing the ball bearings on the drive side and two 15 mm-diameter bushings. The long bushing measures 24 x 60 mm, the short bushing measures 26 x 40 mm. HWTXXX00N2544S 1 x DT Swiss ball bearing drive side EXP installation tool1 x DT Swiss EXP ratchet hub installation tool1 x DT Swiss bushing, long1 x DT Swiss bushing, short

name: Muc-Off Tubeless Valves Big Bore Lite
description: Upgrade your ride with the high-quality Tubeless Valve Big Bore Lite from Muc-Off, designed to enhance the performance of your MTB, Road, City, and Touring bikes. Constructed from premium 7075 aluminum, this valve is not only lightweight but also incredibly durable, ensuring a long-lasting addition to your cycling setup. It's the perfect choice for cyclists looking to make the switch to tubeless tires, offering a seamless and reliable seal that can handle any terrain. Whether you're climbing steep hills, navigating city streets, or embarking on long touring adventures, this tubeless valve will provide the reliability and performance you need. Its easy installation process means you'll be back on the road or trail in no time, enjoying a smoother ride with reduced risk of flats. Ideal for cyclists who demand the best in terms of both functionality and durability, this tubeless valve is a small upgrade that can make a big difference in your biking experience. Say goodbye to traditional tubes and welcome the benefits of going tubeless with our top-tier valve.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha BB90/86 mm Shimano Road Bearing Set
description: Dive into the world of smooth pedaling with the Alpha BB90/86mm Shimano Road Bearing Set from CeramicSpeed, designed specifically for 86mm x 41mm bottom bracket. Crafted with precision, this set boasts ceramic balls that ensure a frictionless rotation, making every ride feel effortless. The stainless steel used for both the inner and outer race materials not only promises durability but also provides a sleek look that complements any road bike. Whether you're gearing up for a race or embarking on a long, scenic ride, this bearing set is your go-to for optimal performance. Its compatibility with Shimano components means you can trust in a seamless fit and function, ensuring your focus remains on the road ahead. Say goodbye to unwanted resistance and hello to a smoother, more enjoyable cycling experience. With the Alpha BB90 Shimano Road Bearing Set, you're not just upgrading your bike; you're elevating your entire ride.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Gravel Bearing Set
description: Get your bike ready for some serious gravel grinding with the Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Gravel Bearing Set from CeramicSpeed, a top choice for bottom bracket applications. This set features a high-quality design with deep groove ball bearings, ensuring smooth and efficient power transfer as you tackle any terrain. The bearings are crafted with ceramic balls for reduced friction and enhanced durability, while both the inner and outer races are made of stainless steel for maximum resistance against wear and corrosion. Whether you're upgrading your current setup or building a new gravel grinder from scratch, this bearing set promises to deliver exceptional performance and reliability. Its precision engineering is compatible with Campagnolo bottom brackets, making it a must-have for enthusiasts looking for the best in bike componentry. Say goodbye to power loss and hello to smoother rides, even on the roughest of roads. With its advanced materials and design, the Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Gravel Bearing Set is your ticket to optimizing your bike's efficiency and enjoying every mile of your gravel adventures.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Road Bearing Set
description: Get your bike's bottom bracket running smoother than ever with the Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Road Bearing Set from CeramicSpeed, a top choice for road cycling enthusiasts. This set features ball bearings made from high-quality ceramic, ensuring a low-friction ride that translates to better performance and efficiency. The inner and outer races are crafted from durable stainless steel, designed to withstand the rigors of road cycling. With a deep groove design, these ball bearings offer superior stability and alignment, reducing wear and tear on your bottom bracket. Whether you're upgrading your current setup or replacing worn-out parts, this bearing set promises a noticeable improvement in your bike's handling and speed. Its precision engineering is tailored specifically for the demands of road cycling, offering a blend of durability and performance that's hard to beat. Make the Alpha Campagnolo Pro Tech Road Bearing Set your next upgrade and feel the difference in every pedal stroke.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha Campagnolo Ultra Torque Road Bearing Set
description: Dive into your next ride with the Alpha Campagnolo Ultra Torque Road Bearing Set, the perfect choice for road cycling enthusiasts. Crafted by CeramicSpeed, this bearing set is designed to enhance your bike's performance, ensuring a smoother and more efficient ride. Its precision engineering is tailored specifically for Campagnolo Ultra Torque cranksets, offering unmatched compatibility and reliability. The high-quality materials used in the construction of these bearings promise durability and resistance against the elements, allowing you to tackle any road with confidence. Installation is a breeze, making it easy for you to upgrade your bike and get back on the road in no time. With reduced friction, you'll notice an immediate improvement in your bike's responsiveness and speed. Whether you're a competitive racer or a weekend warrior, this bearing set is an essential upgrade that will take your cycling experience to the next level. Trust in the Alpha Campagnolo Ultra Torque Road Bearing Set to deliver exceptional performance and reliability, mile after mile. Get ready to push your limits and enjoy the ride like never before.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha BB30/68 mm MTB Bearing Set
description: Get your mountain bike's bottom bracket running smoother than ever with the Alpha BB30/68 mm MTB Bearing Set from CeramicSpeed, a top choice for enthusiasts and professionals alike. Crafted with precision, this set features deep groove ball bearings made from robust stainless steel for both the inner and outer races, ensuring durability and resistance to wear and tear. The ceramic ball material not only reduces friction but also offers a significant performance upgrade, letting you pedal with less effort and more speed. Whether you're upgrading your current ride or building a new one from scratch, this bearing set is designed to fit seamlessly into any bottom bracket designed for the BB30 68 mm x 42 mm standard. The stainless steel components are corrosion-resistant, guaranteeing longevity and reliability through all your rides. With its easy installation process, you'll be back on the trail in no time, enjoying a smoother, more efficient bike. This bearing set is a must-have for any serious cyclist looking to enhance their mountain biking experience. Say goodbye to grinding and hello to effortless pedaling with the Alpha BB30/68 mm MTB Bearing Set.

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha BB30/68 30 mm Road Bearing Set
description: With the Alpha BB30/68 30 mm Road bearing set from CeramicSpeed, specially developed for use in the bottom bracket shell of your road bike, you bring ultimate precision and durability directly to your ride.This bearing set stands out for its high-quality deep groove ball bearings that ensure a smooth ride.The ceramic balls not only offer exceptional longevity but also improved rolling efficiency that you will feel on every ride. Both the inner and outer bearing races are made of stainless steel, guaranteeing excellent corrosion resistance and long service life. Whether you’re looking to boost performance or simply need a reliable solution for your road bike, the Alpha BB30/68 30 mm Road bearing set is the ideal choice.

name: DT Swiss Pro Lock® Squorx Pro Head® 2.0 mm Brass- 5 pcs.
description: The DT Squorx Pro Head® nipple combines ease of assembly and a light weight thanks to the DT Pro Head® shape combined with an additional torx and square tool holder. The Torx drive provides more contact surface when building wheels, which means that the torque transmitted from the tool to the nipple is better distributed. The spherical contact area in the rim guarantees perfect alignment with the spoke. DT Pro Lock®: In the Pro Lock® process, a patented two-component adhesive fluid is injected into the nipple thread, resulting in an extremely durable wheel design. By screwing the nipple onto the spoke, the adhesive is activated and begins to harden. With Pro Lock®, the wheel can be re-tightened at any time with only a slight reduction in the screw-locking function. 15 mm: Length: 15 mmDiameter: 2.0 mmManufacturer Numbers: NPBH20150S0500 (black), NPBH20150N0500 (silver) 5 x DT Swiss Pro Lock® Squorx Pro Head nipples®

name: DT Swiss Aero Comp® Straight Pull 2.0 / 2.3 / 1.2 Spokes - 20 pcs.
description: Balanced ratio of stiffness, aerodynamics and durability: the Aero Comp Straight Pull Spoke from DT Swiss This spoke is butted in its centre using a cold-forging process, making it lighter and stronger. In a further complex process, it is flat-forged to optimize its aerodynamic properties while simultaneously increasing its material strength. The DT Aero Comp® guarantees a balance between rigidity, aerodynamics and durability. The straight pull version is optimally designed for straight pull hubs and offers even greater durability. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Bladed: The central part of the spoke is forged flat for better aerodynamics. A combination of butted and bladed spokes makes it possible to the meet ever-increasing demands for strength and weight reduction. Double Butted: These spokes have two different diameters. The spoke is partially butted by cold forging. As a result, the diameter is smaller and thus enables a reduction in weight while at the same time improving the strain values. Straight Pull: In order to achieve an ideal weight/stability ratio, many DT Swiss wheels use different kinds of straight pull spokes. Straight pull spokes do not need a spoke bend and thus eliminate a weak point. Nevertheless, they can be trued and replaced with standard tools. 20 x DT Swiss DT Aero Comp straight pull spokes

name: DT Swiss Competition® Straight Pull 2.0 / 1.8 Spokes - 100 pcs.
description: Optimised for straight pull hubs: the Competition Black Straight Pull Spokes from DT Swiss Just as versatile as the DT Competition®, which is cranked in a J-shape, but with a straight spoke. The DT Competition® straight pull spokes are optimally adapted to modern straight pull hubs and offer all the advantages of double-butted DT Competition® spokes. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Double Butted: These spokes have two different diameters. The spoke is partially butted by cold forging. As a result, the diameter is smaller and thus enables a reduction in weight while at the same time improving the strain values. Straight Pull: In order to achieve an ideal weight/stability ratio, many DT Swiss wheels use different kinds of straight pull spokes. Straight pull spokes do not need a spoke bend and thus eliminate a weak point. Nevertheless, they can be trued and replaced with standard tools. 100 x DT Swiss DT Competition straight pull spokes, black

name: Sapim D-Light J-Bend Spokes + Nipples - 5 Pieces
description: The D-Light spokes from Sapim - great for MTB wheels The short 2 mm section of the Sapim D-Light J-Bend spoke - sold here in a pack of 5 - reduces weight, especially on the threaded side. The 2 mm-thick section starts at the beginning of the thread, which greatly reduces the rotational mass at the end of the spoke. This results in significant advantages in terms of the wheel's acceleration and braking properties. The middle section was broadened to 1.65 mm, making the D-Light much more rigid and torsion-resistant during lacing than if it had a 1.5 mm middle section. This facilitates the process of wheel construction. adapted to the requirements of MTB wheels (maximum strength, minimum weight, suitable for discs)low rotational mass at the spoke endhigh torsional stiffness thanks to a broadened middle section (strength 1370 N/mm²)Sapim Cold Forging Technology (SCFT System) 5 x Sapim D-Light J-Bend spokes5 x Sapim Polyax 12 mm brass nipples, silver

name: Robert Axle Project Bike Trailer Thru-Axle for 142 and 148 mm Over Locknut Dimensions
description: No thru-axle like any other: the Kid Trailer Axle by the Robert Axle Project The Robert Axle for bicycle trailers replaces your original thru-axle, so you can attach a child, pet or luggage trailer to your bike with 12 mm over locknut dimension. Kid trailer axles from the Robert Axle Project are compatible with all hitch trailers that have two wheels and a single connection point, e.g. from Thule or Burley. Robert axles are three to four times stronger than standard axles and are therefore suitable for e-bikes as well as racing bikes, mountain bikes or fat bikes. They are manufactured by enthusiastic cyclists in accordance with the strictest industry standards. Rigorous testing procedures ensure that they exceed user expectations. The Robert Axle Project is run by the ultimate thru-axle experts. With their help you will find the right thru-axle - for your trailer, your roller trainer or as a light tuning part for your MTB or road bike. To find out which thru-axle you need, you must first find out the dimensions of your current thru-axle. Often the length and the thread pitch are noted on the axle itself. If not, print this template from the Robert Axle Project (in original size, do not scale) to determine the relevant data. name: DT Swiss RWS Plug-In X-12 MTB Thru Axle with Quick-Release Lever
description: DT Swiss RWS Plug-In X-12 MTB Thru Axle with removable Quick-Release Lever The DT Swiss RWS thru axle with removable quick release lever fits mountain bikes with X-12 standard dropouts. The plug-in quick-release lever can be removed so that it does not interfere with riding. If you need to loosen the axle, the lever can be put back into the hexagon socket, Allowing for tool-free installation. X 12 standardremovable quick-release levertool-free assemblymade of full metal RWS: The R atchet W heelmounting S ystem is a system for tool-free wheel mounting for all disciplines of cycling. In the style of quick-release levers, wheels with RWS axles can be quickly attached. However, they can withstand stronger forces caused by higher speeds and increased track requirements. The axles are as stable as thru axles, And thanks to the lever, the axle can be released or clamped as easily as a quick-release axle. The lever is lifted for this reason, and is operated by turning it. RWS Plug-In: The RWS Plug-In System combines the advantages of tool-free wheel attachment in the RWS system with the advantages of a thru axle. The quick-release lever can be connected to the axle via a hexagon socket, which is then released or tightened by turning. Afterwards the lever is removed again, so it does not disturb riding and the bike maintains the look of a classic thru axle. name: Shimano Thru axle AX-MT700 12 mm
description: Elevate your MTB experience Shimano AX-MT700 12 mm thru axle, designed specifically for mountain biking enthusiasts. Crafted from high-quality aluminum, this axle ensures a lightweight yet durable performance, enhancing your ride's efficiency and stability. Its application for RW 12 x 142/148 mm makes it versatile and suitable for a wide range of mountain bikes. The axle features a nominal diameter of M12 and a thread pitch of 1.5 mm, ensuring a snug and secure fit for your rear wheel. The thru axle comes equipped with a quick release lever, allowing for fast and easy wheel changes without the need for additional tools. This design not only improves your bike's overall performance but also enhances safety during your off-road adventures. Whether you're tackling rugged trails or enjoying a leisurely ride through the mountains, this rear wheel axle is the perfect upgrade for your MTB. Its aluminum construction offers the perfect balance between strength and weight, making every ride smoother and more enjoyable. Upgrade your mountain bike today and experience the difference in durability, stability, and performance.

name: Schwalbe Doc Blue Professional Tyre Sealant
description: The Doc Blue Professional Tyre Sealant by Schwalbe - For tight tubeless systems Doc Blue Professional tyre sealant from Schwalbe is ideal for sealing your tubeless tyres. In addition to sealing during tubeless mounting, it also offers puncture protection while riding. It easily seals cracks or holes up to 6 mm in size. It remains effective for up to seven months. You can extend its shelf life by replenishing it regularly. In addition to tubeless systems, you can also use it as a preventive measure for bicycle inner tubes or tubular tyres. As it dries, it forms a rubber film that can be easily peeled off, which is helpful for tasks such as mounting new tyres. name: Continental RevoSealant Tyre Sealant
description: The RevoSealant Tyre Sealant by Continental - Effective protection against punctures Continental tyre sealants have been successfully replacing the spare wheel in many passenger cars for years. Now this technology has been further developed specifically for the requirements and use in bicycle tyres and tubes. The ammonium and protein-free RevoSealant reliably seals punctures and small cuts without chemically attacking the tyre or tube. Not only for repair, but also as a preventive measure, the universally applicable RevoSealant from Continental effectively protects against punctures in inner tubes, tubular tyres and tubeless tyres. In addition, RevoSealant can also be used as a sealant for the tubeless systems popular in mountain biking with appropriately suited tyres. Especially optimized for use in Continental bicycle tyres, RevoSealant can be used down to -20° Celsius. ammonium and protein freereliable sealing of punctures and small cutsprotects the tyrecan also be used preventivelyfor tubes, tyres with tubes and tubeless systemsbased on the technology of Conti passenger car tyre sealantsusable up to -20° Celsiuseffective period from 4 to 24 weeks (depending on external conditions) No marking required. name: bc basic Tubeless tyre repair kit
description: The repair kit for tubeless tyres by bc basic - quick and easy repair The bc basic tubeless tyre repair set lets you easily repair your tubeless tyre on the road. It includes the necessary tools and five tubeless tyre patches of different sizes. These can be easily cut to size and are also available in refill packs. The patches are housed in a little aluminium box whose lid serves as a holder for the inserting tool. This way, the patches remain protected from dust and dirt. To save time, the tool can also be loaded before the ride. patches can be cut to sizepatches also available separately (3.5 mm,1.5 mm)with aluminium storage box in black or bc-orangeinserting tool in the box lid Instructions and Tricks: 1. Remove foreign body. 2. Thread the patch into the inserting tool. 3. Insert the tool tip in the hole. 4. Push through until you have nearly reached the end of the patch and turn halfway round. 5. Hold down the patch and pull out the inserting tool. 6. Turn the repaired side down, so the tyre sealant can seal itself with the tubeless patch. bc basic tubeless tyres repair set, consisting of: 5 x patches 3.5 mm x 50 mm5 x patches 1.5 mm x 50 mm1 x capsule with insertion tool
