name: TONIQ Sealant Tyre Sealant
description: The TONIQ Sealant Tyre Sealant helps you have a carefree ride TONIQ Sealant is an environmentally-friendly bike tyre sealant that reliably seals holes and punctures up to 6 mm in size while in motion. Use it as puncture protection for tubeless tyres and experience the feeling of a worry-free ride, just like on the first day you got your bike. The sealant is gentle on tyres and rims. It does not clump and works for up to 9 months before you need to renew it. TONIQ Sealant, which is made from raw plant-based materials, is also suitable for repairing tyres with latex inner tubes or tubular tyres. seals up to 6 mm punctures and cuts while ridingshelf life in the tyre at least 6 and maximum 9 monthstemperature insensitive: works from -20 °C to +60 °Csuited for use with CO2 cartridgessustainably produced in the EU100% plant-basedbiodegradablepackaging made from recycled polyethylene terephthalate (rPET) * 1. Shake bottle well before use. 2. Fill TONIQ Sealant either through the valve (with the valve core removed) or directly through the tyre. Approx. 30 ml per tyre is recommended for gravel or road tyres and approx. 60 ml per tyre for MTB tyres. 3. Replace the valve core or inflate the tyre and rotate the wheel to distribute the sealant in the tyre. 4. Inflate the tyre with a pump or CO2 cartridge to the desired air pressure. * Before riding with tubeless tyres, in case of a defect with tyres with latex inner tubes or tubular tyres. When converting to tubeless, be sure to follow the tyre and rim manufacturer's installation instructions.Regularly check whether there is enough sealant in the tyre. If necessary, refill with TONIQ Sealant. No marking required. TONIQ Bike Care TONIQ bike care products give you back the feeling of having a new bike to ride every day. They were developed with a special focus on sustainability. TONIQ Bike Care products are made from 100% renewable, plant-based raw materials, are environmentally friendly and non-toxic. TONIQ's supply chains are also intentionally short, and all packaging is made from recycled materials. name: Peaty's Holeshot Biofibre Tubeless Tyre Sealant
description: water-based tyre sealant for tubeless tyresgood sealing effect for holes and cracks up to 6 mm diameterbiodegradable fibres and Bioglitter made of cellulose combined with latexlow viscosity for easy fillingfor temperatures between -20 °C and +50 °Cfor air pressure between 1 and 8.25 bars (15 and 120 psi)suitable for use with CO2cartridges120 ml are sufficient for about 60 mm wide tyreslasts up to 6 months 1. Shake bottle well. 2. Remove old sealant completely from the tyre. If you have been using Peaty's Tubeless Sealant, you can skip this step. Degrease the inside of a new tyre, rinse it and dry it thoroughly. 3. Pull the tyre onto the rim and pump it up until it pops into the rim bed. 4. Deflate completely, turn the valve to 3 o'clock, remove the valve core. 5. Pour the sealant into the tyre via the valve. 6. Replace the valve core and inflate the tyre to the desired pressure. Spread the sealant by rotating the tyre and bouncing it on the ground. 7. Seal leaks by rotating the tyre until there are no more leaks, add a little sealant if necessary. 8. Wipe off excess sealant with a little water. No marking required. Peaty's Ltd. name: milKit Tubeless Compact Service Kit
description: Clean, safe, simple: the Tubeless Compact Service Kit from milKit The Tubeless Compact Service Kit from milKit greatly simplifies maintenance for tubeless systems. The idea for this was born on a mountain bike tour across the USA, when a tubeless tyre became flat due to dried-out sealant. Unfortunately, it's a problem that many tubeless riders are all-too familiar with. The product development engineer and enthusiastic mountain biker Pius Kobler decided to find a solution, and thus developed the milKit system. With milKit, you can now check the fill level and condition of the sealant in just a few minutes and replace it if necessary without having to deflate or remove your tyre. It's that easy! Features:Fast: Measure and refill the sealant without letting air out of the tyre.Clean: No clogged valves. A rubber flap prevents sealant from intruding.Simple: clean hands and easy to use.Reliable: milKit shows exactly how much sealing milk is in the tyre.Application:Unscrew the valve heart from the milKit valve: air remains in the tyreInsert the milKit applicator through the valve into the tyre and measure the amount of sealantCheck the quantity and quality of the sealantDose out the required refill quantity in the same wayScrew the valve heart back into the valveContents:1 x milKit measuring and refill syringe2 x milKit tubeless valves1 x milKit connecting tube1 x milKit valve key1 x milKit tool for valve corewithoutTyre Sealantnot incl. rim tape

name: DT Swiss Anti Pedal Kickback Conversion Kit DEG DF for E-MTB
description: Upgrade your E-MTB experience with the DT Swiss Anti Pedal Kickback Conversion Kit DEG DF, designed specifically for E-Bikes & Pedelecs up to 25 km/h. Crafted from durable steel, this kit is your go-to solution for transforming your ride with an anti-pedal kickback system, ensuring smoother, more efficient pedaling on any terrain. Compatible exclusively with DT Swiss Ratchet DEG hubs, it seamlessly integrates into your setup, offering a direct upgrade that enhances your bike's performance. Whether you're tackling steep climbs or cruising on flat roads, this conversion kit minimizes the strain on your legs and maximizes your pedaling efficiency. Easy to install, it's a must-have for any cyclist looking to boost their E-MTB's capabilities without compromising on quality or durability. Say goodbye to unwanted pedal kickback and hello to a more enjoyable ride with this essential upgrade.

name: NEWMEN Gen2 Freehub Body for MTB
description: NEWMEN freehub body Gen2 for MTB - for your MTB rear hub The NEWMEN freehub body Gen2 for MTB is a replacement or conversion part for your Evolution SL MTB rear hub by NEWMEN. It is available in a version for Shimano 11-speed, SRAM XD 12-speed and Shimano Micro Spline 12-speed. Unlike previous models, bearing clearance adjustment is no longer possible with the Gen2. NEWMEN MTB 12 x 142 mm, straight pull, disc 6-bolt, 28 hole Gen2 hubs (Shimano MTB / SRAM XD)NEWMEN MTB 12 x 148 mm, straight pull, disc 6-bolt, 28 hole Gen2 hubs (Shimano MTB / SRAM XD)NEWMEN MTB 12 x 142 mm, straight pull, disc Center Lock, 28 hole Gen2 hubs (Shimano MTB / Shimano Micro Spline)NEWMEN MTB 12 x 148 mm, straight pull, disc 6-bolt, 28 hole Gen2 hubs (Shimano MTB / Shimano Micro Spline)Evolution X.A.25 wheelsEvolution A.30 wheelsEvolution A.35 wheels High Quality Deep Groove Ball Bearings: The bearing clearance has been reduced, which means that the balls still run in their specified race even with an increased axial load. Close-fitting seals on the outside ensure better protection against water and dirt ingress. The grease contains additional solid lubricants. As a result, the bearings run tougher when new, but this normalises after a breaking-in period of several hundred kilometres. Ratchet Freehub vs. Pawl Freehub: With NEWMEN ratchet freehubs, all teeth are always in use. In the worst case, it can happen that only one pawl is in use with a pawl freehub. NEWMEN ratchets are made of high-strength tool steel made in Germany. 1 x NEWMEN Gen2 MTB freehub body2 x NEWMEN bearings

name: Shimano SM-CS50 Braze-on Down Tube Cable Stops
description: Shimano SM-CS50 braze-on down tube cable stops - For steel or aluminium frames The Shimano SM-CS50 cable stops are for mounting on the braze-on sockets on the down tube. The version suitable for steel frames has a curved underside, as these frames have a narrower down tube. The version for aluminium frames has a rather flat underside because these down tubes are wider in diameter. This way, you can make sure that the cable stop is properly affixed to the frame. A pair of mounting screws is also included. for mounting on the braze-on sockets on the down tubeversion for steel frame with slightly curved undersideversion for aluminium frame with flat underside 1 x pair Shimano SM-CS50 cable stops2 x bolts

name: RAAW Mountain Bikes Rocker for Madonna V2
description: The RAAW Mountain Bikes Rocker allows different riders to have the same riding fun The RAAW Mountain Bikes Rocker is a spare part for your Madonna V2 bike. You have two versions to choose from, the Rocker 60 and the Rocker 65. Suspension travel and progression do not differ, but the rear shock stroke with which the rocker interacts does. On the 60 mm version, bikers with a lower rider weight up to 90 kg benefit from a higher ratio, which is conducive to efficient damping and the sensitivity of the rear end on small impacts. The 65 mm version with a lower ratio works perfectly for heavier bikers over 90 kg and allows them to ride with lower air pressure or softer steel coil springs. Four ball bearings are already press-fitted. Note: If you want to convert from a Rocker 60 to a Rocker 65 (or vice versa), the stroke length of the rear shock must also be adjusted by the manufacturer. name: Enduro Bearings Angular Contact Ball Bearing 7901 12 mm x 24 mm x 6 mm
description: Maximum number of balls in the angular contact ball bearing: the 7901 MAX from Enduro Bearings MAX bearings are characterised by a 35 to 40 % higher load capacity than standard radial bearings. For 20 years Enduro Bearings has been manufacturing them specifically for use on mountain bike shocks. As its name indicates, MAX bearings are fitted with the maximum possible number of balls. In standard radial bearings, only 3 or 4 balls make contact during the load at any given time. Inside of Enduro Bearings' Angular Contact (A/C) bearings, ALL balls are engaged so that they can distribute force over a larger surface area. This reduces friction and minimizes wear. Type 1: Angular contact ball bearing with 15° angleMAX = maximum number of balls, without cage or partitions35 % higher load carrying capacity than standard bearings, turn less easilyrace grooves made of carbon-chrome steel alloy, heat and triple cold treated (down to -190° C), minimum hardness Rockwell HRC 62, polishedchrome steel balls 10th degree = circularity is 10/1,000,000"Level 1 rating from the Annular Bearing Engineer's Committee (ABEC) in terms of noise, manufacturing tolerances correspond to level 32RS: 2 rubber seals, one on each side90% filled with waterproof high-pressure grease 1 x Enduro Bearings 7901 12 mm x 24 mm x 6 mm ball bearing

description: The bc original Podsol frame protector for the right chainstay This chainstay protector is a spare part for the Podsol MTB frame from bc original. name: Syntace X-12 Derailleur Hanger
description: Syntace X-12 derailleur hanger for Liteville frames. Shimano Direct Mount: Standard rear derailleurs from Shimano are connected to the frame/dropout with the B2 Body Plate (small movable mounting arm). Direct mount rear derailleurs, on the other hand, no longer have this receptacle and are connected directly to the designated frame/dropouts. Current 10-/11-speed rear derailleurs from Shimano can be easily converted and mounted by removing the B2 body plate from a direct mount rear derailleur. name: ParkTool GP-2 Super Patch Self-Adhesive Patches
description: Tyre patching made easy: the GP-2 Super-Patch Self-Adhesive Patches by ParkTool One of the most successful ParkTool products ever. In cooperation with 3M, a self-adhesive patch has been developed that takes every deformation of the tube in stride. Neither glue nor bulky packaging are required. Simply roughen the surface of the tube slightly with the enclosed sandpaper, clean it, press on the patch and you're ready to go. The set contains six patches with sandpaper in a handy little box. GP-2 1 x box ParkTool Super Patch with 6 patches

name: NoTubes DART repair kit for tubeless tires
description: The DART repair kit for tubeless tyres by NoTubes - real repair instead of patchwork The name DART stands for " Dual Action Repair for Tubeless" , because NoTubes has found a way to repair punctures even faster and better than conventional plug tools. While with conventional tools, rubber strips are only pulled through the hole, NoTubes relies on a chemical reaction of the plug with Stan's Tire Sealant. Another advantage is the plastic tip of the DART plugs, which is designed to stay safely in place and can not cause any further damage. tyre repair tool with built-in core removerimmediate, airtight repair with the plugs reacting to Stans Tire Sealantflexible material that adapts to the puncture site and provides a large surface area for reaction with the sealantplastic tips anchor themselves in the tyre with barbs, the patch cannot be pulled out while drivingno trimming of the patch necessary, runs off cleanrepaired area is not noticeable while driving, not even on road tyres NoTubes Dart Tool repair set, comprising: 1 x NoTubes Dart tool2 x NoTubes Dart patches NoTubes Tire Sealant and NoTubes Tire Sealant for the road

name: Favero Assioma DUO-Shi Power Meter Pedal Axle Kit
description: The Assioma DUO-Shi Power Meter Pedal Axles bring Favero power meters to your Shimano road bike pedals The Assioma DUO-Shi Power Meter pedal axle kit by Favero includes a right as well as a left axle that are compatible with certain Shimano SPD-SL pedal bodies and have each been equipped with a power meter. This means that users of the PD-R8000 and other Shimano pedals can also enjoy the highly accurate, dual-sided power measurement that has long proven itself on Look-compatible pedals from Favero. Not only can you check your performance, left-right balance and round pedalling--the kit also opens up access to other aspects of performance development with IAV Cycling Dynamics. Thanks to a built-in gyroscope, these power meter pedal axles also work reliably when you use oval chainrings. Assioma DUO-Shi also scores with quick, easy installation, ANT+ and Bluetooth wireless technology and automatic temperature compensation. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Shimano Pedals: PD-R8000PD-R7000PD-R6800PD-R550PD-R540 Chainrings: can be combined with round and oval chainrings Devices: all bike computers and smartphones with ANT+ PWR (Bike Power) profile (CT + PO) or Bluetooth with CPP profile Apps: Assioma app for one-time activation, firmware updates, crank arm length adjustment, charge level indicator, info on new functionsother apps that work with data sent via ANT+ or Bluetooth, such as Zwift, The Sufferfest, Strava, Rouvy, Trainerroad, etc. accurate, repeatable, consistent measurements with instantaneous angular velocity technology (bilateral)manufacturer calibrated specifically for Shimano, no manufacturer maintenance required (manual zero adjustment)two USB cables allow simultaneous charging of both sensorsmagnetic pin charging contact prevents damage (no critical openings)easy assembly without special toolsAutomatic Temperature Compensation technology (ATC)built-in cadence sensorbuilt-in gyroscopecompact design, no snagging on the sensor when pedalling, even when corneringsensor with bi-component cover made of synthetic resin for more robustness and waterproofnesswider Q-factor than Favero Assioma pedalaxle additionally equipped with grease retaining ringlightweight: only 157 g per side in combination with PD-R8000 (not included)permitted operating temperature: -10° C to +60° CMade in Italy 772-02-S 1 x Favero Assioma DUO-Shi Pedal Axle with Sensor / Power Meter, left1 x Favero Assioma DUO-Shi Pedal Axle with Sensor / Power Meter, right2 x USB cable with micro USB plug and magnetic connector, 2 m1 x charger1 x EU plug adapter1 x US plug adapter1 x UK plug adapter1 x AU plug adapter1 x hex tool4 x washers

name: SRAM Apex AXS Wide DUB Power Meter Upgrade Kit
description: The SRAM Apex AXS Wide DUB Upgrade Kit turns your crank into a power meter The Apex AXS Wide DUB Upgrade Kit from SRAM includes the left crank arm with power meter axle and comes in matching Apex optics. It is used for left-side power measurement, using proven QUARQ technology. The measuring unit is hidden in the crank axle and reliably protected from water. In combination with a DUB bottom bracket, you get a durable unit with an impressive performance. Overall, the upgrade means a negligible additional weight of just under 40 g. The life of the AAA lithium battery, which you can easily replace yourself, is over 400 hours and thus covers a whole season. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: Shimano Ultegra Power Meter FC-R8100-P Hollowtech II Crankset
description: The FC-R8100-P Crankset by Shimano - Power meter for Ultegra With the FC-R8100-P 2x12-speed crankset, Shimano offers the option of double-sided power measurement for its Ultegra road bike series for the first time. This gives you access to information about your overall performance, cadence, torque efficiency, left-right balance and round pedalling. The accuracy of the 24 strain gauges can be described as very high with a deviation of only 1.5%. Thanks to Bluetooth and ANT+ radio protocol, there is broad compatibility with bike computers and similar devices. The lithium-ion battery is located in control unit on the crank spider, which you can easily recharge yourself. If it is completely full again after about 2.5 hours, it will last for at least 300 hours. By the way, the charging cable is the same as for your Ultegra Di2 shifters. You can also carry out firmware updates via the E-Tube Project. On the housing of the control unit, you will find an LED that signals the battery charge level and a button for easy zero calibration. Of course, the entire construction is waterproof and there is active temperature compensation, so you don't have to worry about the weather. You can attach the magnet for cadence measurement to the chainstay, seat tube or down tube using the included positioning tool. Apart from these special features, the FC-R8100-P is technically identical to the " normal" Ultegra crankset. It converts your power into propulsion in a highly efficient manner, is characterised by an optimal stability/weight ratio thanks to the Hollowtech II design and inspires with precise, fast shifting processes. The crank arms are hollow-formed, as is the large chainring, which is partly made of carbon, resulting in significant weight savings. Apart from the axle, all essential parts were made of lightweight metal. FC-R8100-P has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . *not transmitted via Bluetooth connections 2x12-speed: very accurate power measurement on both sides via 24 strain gaugesintegrated, rechargeable lithium-ion battery with long service lifecharging time approx. 2.5 hours, same charging cable as Di2waterproof constructionactive temperature compensation (operating temperature range -10 °C to +50 °C)simple zero-point calibration via button on the control unit or bicycle computercontrol unit with LED display for battery charge level (green, red, flashing red)firmware updates via E-Tube Projectperfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the fronthollow crank arms (Hollowtech)hollow-formed large chainring made of aluminium-carbon composite (Hollowglide)anodised crank arms and chainringsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. Second-Generation Power Meters Shimano second-generation power meters use an improved force vector analysis and are therefore more accurate than their predecessors. Both crank arms have 12 sensors each, which are mounted in such a way that the crank deformation can be compensated for and the acting forces can be identified. The right and left sides are connected via the battery located in the axle, ensuring accurate measurement on both sides. The built-in temperature compensation contributes to the precision. You can easily recharge the battery with the Di2 charging cable EW-EC300. The power meters have Bluetooth and ANT+ compatibility to communicate with bike computers and smartphones. For firmware updates and data display, Shimano provides the E-Tube Project Cyclist App or the E-Tube Ride App. A more detailed performance analysis is possible via Shimano Connect Lab software. 1 x Shimano Ultegra FC-R8100-P power meter crankset (34-50or36-52)1 x Shimano crank bolt1 x Shimano EW-EC300 charging cable, 1.5 m1 x installation ring for left crank arm1 x magnets1 x magnet cover, black1 x magnet cover, white2 x double-sided adhesive tape rolls1 x Shimano TL-FC40 crank tool for left crank arm1 x cover cap for left crank arm1 x positioning tool for magnet

name: SRAM Force 1 D2 AXS DUB DM 1x12-Speed Carbon Powermeter Crankset
description: The Force 1 D2 AXS Wide DUB DM 1x12-speed carbon crankset by SRAM with power measurement for road bikes and more This SRAM Force 1 D2 AXS DUB DM power meter crankset with carbon arms is equipped with left-side power measurement and is mainly suitable for a 1x12-speed drivetrain on road bikes as well as triathlon bikes. The proven QUARQ technology scores with accuracy, the data of the power meter can be evaluated with the AXS app. The shiny detail around the logo and series name attracts attention without being too obtrusive. The chainring is attached via Direct Mount. Thanks to DUB technology, the crankset is extremely durable and perfectly matched to DUB bottom brackets. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: SRAM Force E1 XPLR Wide DUB Powermeter Upgrade Kit
description: Elevate your gravel riding experience with our SRAM Force E1 XPLR Wide DUB Powermeter Upgrade-Kit, designed specifically for the gravel enthusiast who demands precision and durability. This state-of-the-art crankset features a power meter integrated into the left arm, ensuring accurate power readings directly from the crank axle. Crafted from high-quality carbon, the crank arms promise lightweight performance without sacrificing strength, allowing you to tackle the toughest terrains with ease. The axle, made from robust aluminum, guarantees a solid connection to your bike, providing reliability and enhancing your bike's overall efficiency. With over 400 hours of operating time on a single AAA lithium battery, you can embark on extended adventures without worrying about power loss. This crankset is compatible with SRAM Road Wide DUB inner bearings, ensuring a seamless fit and optimal performance. Connectivity is a breeze thanks to the inclusion of both Bluetooth and ANT+ protocols, allowing you to easily pair the crankset with your favorite cycling computers and apps to monitor your performance in real-time. Whether you're training for your next big event or simply enjoying the scenic backroads, this crank with power meter is the perfect upgrade for any gravel bike, combining advanced technology with unmatched durability and performance.

name: SRAM Force E1 Aero DUB 1x12-/13-speed Carbon Powermeter Crankset
description: Unleash your potential with the latest SRAM Force E1 Aero DUB 1x12-/-13 speed Carbon Powermeter crankset designed for the road, triathlon, and time trial enthusiasts. Engineered with precision, it offers a remarkable measurement accuracy of 1.5 %, ensuring every watt you push is accounted for. This high-performance crankset is constructed from premium carbon material, promising not only durability but also a lightweight advantage to keep you swift on the climbs and powerful on the flats. With an impressive operating time of 200 hours on a single CR2032 battery, your training sessions are uninterrupted, allowing you to focus purely on performance. It seamlessly integrates with ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, making it a breeze to connect with your favorite cycling computers and apps for real-time data analysis. The crank comes equipped with a power meter that meticulously measures left/right power balance, giving you insightful feedback on your pedal stroke and efficiency. Recommended for use with SRAM DUB inner bearings, this crankset is tailored for a smooth and reliable drivetrain setup. Whether you're aiming to crush your personal bests or stand atop the podium, this crank with power meter is your gateway to achieving peak performance.

name: Shimano Ultegra Powermeter Crank FC-R8100-P Hollowtech II without chainrings
description: The FC-R8100-P Crank by Shimano - Power meter for Ultegra With the FC-R8100-P 2x12-speed crank, here in the version without chainrings, Shimano offers the option of double-sided power measurement for its Ultegra road series for the first time. This gives you access to information about your overall performance, cadence, torque efficiency, left-right balance and round pedalling. The accuracy of the 24 strain gauges can be described as very high with a deviation of only 1.5%. Thanks to Bluetooth and ANT+ radio protocol, there is broad compatibility with bike computers and similar devices. The lithium-ion battery is located in control unit on the crank spider, which you can easily recharge yourself. If it is completely full again after about 2.5 hours, it will last for at least 300 hours. By the way, the charging cable is the same as for your Ultegra Di2 shifters. You can also carry out firmware updates via the E-Tube Project. On the housing of the control unit, you will find an LED that signals the battery charge level and a button for easy zero calibration. Of course, the entire construction is waterproof and there is active temperature compensation, so you don't have to worry about the weather. You can attach the magnet for cadence measurement to the chainstay, seat tube or down tube using the included positioning tool. Apart from these special features, the FC-R8100-P is technically identical to the " normal" Ultegra crank. It converts your power into propulsion in a highly efficient manner, is characterised by an optimal stability/weight ratio thanks to the Hollowtech II design and inspires with precise, fast shifting processes. The crank arms are hollow-formed, which results in a significant weight saving. Except for the axle, all essential parts were made of lightweight metal. FC-R8100-P has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . *not transmitted via Bluetooth connections 2x12-speed: very accurate power measurement on both sides via 24 strain gaugesintegrated, rechargeable lithium-ion battery with long service lifecharging time approx. 2.5 hours, same charging cable as Di2waterproof constructionactive temperature compensation (operating temperature range -10 °C to +50 °C)simple zero-point calibration via button on the control unit or bicycle computercontrol unit with LED display for battery charge level (green, red, flashing red)firmware updates via E-Tube Projectperfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the fronthollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank armsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. Second-Generation Power Meters Shimano second-generation power meters use an improved force vector analysis and are therefore more accurate than their predecessors. Both crank arms have 12 sensors each, which are mounted in such a way that the crank deformation can be compensated for and the acting forces can be identified. The right and left sides are connected via the battery located in the axle, ensuring accurate measurement on both sides. The built-in temperature compensation contributes to the precision. You can easily recharge the battery with the Di2 charging cable EW-EC300. The power meters have Bluetooth and ANT+ compatibility to communicate with bike computers and smartphones. For firmware updates and data display, Shimano provides the E-Tube Project Cyclist App or the E-Tube Ride App. A more detailed performance analysis is possible via Shimano Connect Lab software. 1 x Shimano Ultegra FC-R8100-P power meter crank1 x Shimano crank bolt1 x Shimano EW-EC300 charging cable, 1.5 m1 x installation ring for left crank arm1 x magnets1 x magnet cover, black1 x magnet cover, white2 x double-sided adhesive tape rolls1 x Shimano TL-FC40 crank tool for left crank arm1 x cover cap for left crank arm1 x positioning tool for magnet4 x chainring bolts Ultegra FC-R8100 chainrings

name: SRAM Force D2 AXS DUB DM 2x12-speed Carbon Power Meter Crankset
description: The SRAM Force D2 AXS DUB DM power meter crankset with carbon arms for 2x12-speed drivetrains on road bikes The Force D2 AXS DUB DM crankset from SRAM is equipped with carbon arms, a spider-based power meter function and two chainrings. The power meter is fully integrated into the chainring set and measures the power on the left and right with an accuracy of +/- 1.5% as well as the distribution between the left and right leg. The reliable DZero technology from QUARQ ensures that the measurement results are unaffected by temperature fluctuations. With the X-Range gradation of 13 teeth, you benefit from fast gear changes, while the chainrings score points for durability. In combination with a separately available DUB bottom bracket, you get a durable unit with strong performance. The discreet and characteristic design with a shimmering logo is visually impressive. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . road crankset with carbon arms and power meter functionpower meter integrated in spider to save weightaccurate, weather-independent power recording with QUARQ DZero technologymeasurement of the power distribution between the right and left leglightweight, rigid and durable constructionX-Range 13-tooth gradation for a wide range and harmonious gear changescrisp, precise gear changesdiscreet design with iridescent logo underneathIPX7 waterproof up to 1 metre for 30 minutesdurable and simple thanks to DUB technology DZero DZero is QUARQ's next generation power meter, named after the DZero Experiment, one of the most accurate and innovative scientific projects to discover subatomic particles. With a revised measurement loop, optimised strain gauge design, increased accuracy and the features of the Qualvin and SRAM AXS app, DZero represents the state of the art in power meter technology. You can choose between Bluetooth LE and ANT+ technology for data transfer. AXS AXS is SRAM's electronic integration platform that combines electronic bicycle components and software. The SRAM AXS app allows you to view battery status, change component behaviour, adjust controls, receive maintenance reminders and update firmware. X-Range The X-Range technology was developed with the possibilities of today's dropbar bikes in mind. It is distinguished by a broad gear range with smooth, even gear changes. The combination of chainrings with 13-tooth spacing with a high bandwidth cassette, starting with a 10-tooth sprocket, ensures well thought-out, homogeneous gear jumps and always puts you in the right gear. In combination with AXS, you can make various shift settings and personalise your drivetrain to suit you. MagicZero Calibration takes place automatically during the ride. You don't need to pedal backwards or perform a manual calibration from your computer. DUB The unit of crankshaft and bottom bracket is the heart of the DUB technology. Stiffness meets durability. SRAM has gone a step further and made everything even easier and better. It is mainly the system approach through the integration of chainring, crank, spindle and bottom bracket that means better drivetrain performance.

name: SRAM Rival E1 XPLR Wide DUB DM 1x13-speed Powermeter Crankset
description: Unleash your gravel riding potential with the SRAM Rival E1 XPLR Wide DUB Direct Mount 1x13-speed Powermeter crank arm set designed specifically for gravel enthusiasts. This high-precision tool, crafted from durable aluminium, offers more than 400 hours of operating time, ensuring you stay informed and efficient on the longest rides. It's compatible with SRAM Wide DUB inner bearings, guaranteeing a seamless fit and optimal performance. The power meter measures your power output directly from the crank axle with an impressive accuracy of 1.5 %, allowing you to train smarter and improve your performance over time. Equipped with both ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, this crank arm set power meter enables you to easily connect with your favorite cycling apps and devices, sharing your data in real-time for a comprehensive training analysis. Powered by a single AAA lithium battery, it combines convenience with reliability, making it a hassle-free addition to your cycling gear. Whether you're tackling rugged trails or embarking on long endurance rides, this power meter is the perfect companion for any gravel adventure, helping you push your limits and achieve your cycling goals.

name: Campagnolo Super Record Wireless Ultra Torque 12-speed Power Meter Crankset
description: Elevate your cycling performance with our cutting-edge crankset featuring an integrated dual-sided power meter. Designed for the road enthusiast, this crankset is meticulously crafted from UD carbon for the crank arms and titanium for the axle, ensuring a lightweight yet durable construction. With its Bluetooth connectivity, you can effortlessly sync with your favorite cycling apps or devices to monitor power (dual-sided) and cadence in real-time, boasting an impressive measurement accuracy of 1.00%. The lithium-ion battery provides a generous 100 hours of operating time, so you're ready to tackle long rides without worrying about power loss. It's recommended to pair this crankset with either the Campagnolo Pro-Tech Pressfit or Pro-Tech T47 bottom brackets for optimal performance. The non-boost compatible hub spacing and a Q-factor of 148 mm cater to standard road bike setups, ensuring a seamless fit. Whether you're training for your next race or simply aiming to improve your cycling efficiency, this crankset with a power meter is the perfect upgrade to give you the edge you need on the road.

name: SRAM AXS Powermeter Kit 2x12-speed for RED E1
description: Get the precision and advanced technology you need for your road bike with the SRAM AXS Power Meter Kit 2x12-speed for Red. This state-of-the-art power meter kit features dual-sided power measurement with a highly accurate sensor integrated in the spider, delivering an impressive measurement accuracy of ±1.5%. It allows you to precisely monitor your left/right power balance. Designed specifically for the SRAM Red 2x12-speed groupset, it’s the perfect upgrade for your road bike. With an outstanding battery life of 200 hours on a single CR2032 battery, you won’t have to worry about losing power during training or racing. Thanks to ANT+ and Bluetooth support, you can seamlessly transfer your data to a variety of devices and apps to track and analyze your performance. Whether you're looking to increase your power, improve efficiency, or simply want a reliable tool for serious training, this power meter kit is the ideal choice for ambitious road cyclists.

description: Elevate your road cycling experience with this SRAM Rival E1 DUB DM 2x12 speed Powermeter crank set, a drank with powermeter (left) version, designed for the avid cyclist who demands precision and durability. name: SRAM Force E1 XPLR Wide DUB DM 1x13-speed Carbon Powermeter Crankset
description: Elevate your gravel riding experience with the SRAM Force E1 XPLR Wide DUB DM 1x13-speed crank with power meter technology, designed specifically for the adventurous gravel rider. This cutting-edge crankset features a power meter integrated into the left crank arm, ensuring precise power measurement with an accuracy of 1.5 %. Crafted from high-quality carbon for the crank arms and durable aluminium for the axle, it combines lightweight performance with rugged durability, perfect for the unpredictable terrains of gravel riding. Powered by a single AAA lithium battery, it boasts an impressive operating time of over 400 hours, ensuring you stay connected and informed on the longest rides. The crankset is compatible with SRAM Wide DUB inner bearings, offering seamless integration and optimal performance. With ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, it effortlessly connects to your cycling devices, allowing you to monitor your power output in real-time and make adjustments to your training on the fly. Whether you're pushing your limits on a long gravel ride or fine-tuning your performance for a race, this crank with power meter is an essential tool for serious cyclists seeking to enhance their riding efficiency and achieve their best performance.

name: QUARQ DFour DUB Power Meter Spider
description: The DFour DUB power meter spider by QUARQ - concentrated power meter know-how With the QUARQ DFour DUB power meter spider you can equip DUB cranks with an 8-bolt interface, e.g. the DUB Carbon cranks, with power measurement functions. The spider was designed for Shimano Dura Ace R9100 chainrings, but is also compatible with Ultegra R8000 or 105 R7000 chainrings. The power meter platform contains more than a decade of experience with power measurement technology. DFour impresses with excellent temperature compensation, 200 hours battery life, ANT+ and Bluetooth data transfer and last but not least with MagicZero™, an automatic calibration while riding. Add the smart DUB bottom bracket technology and you get a product that is second to none in stiffness, reliability and weight optimisation. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . cranks with an 8-bolt interface and DUB axlesShimano Dura Ace R9100 chainringsShimano Ultegra R8000 and 105 R7000 chainrings (visually not the best fit)SRAM AXS app for zeroing, battery status, diagnostics and firmware updates 8-bolt interfaceDUB: stronger, stiffer, lightertool-free battery replacement10K temperature compensation (programmed with over 10,000 data points)no cadence magnet required thanks to AxCad (multi-axis acceleration sensor)automatic recalibration while ridingLED status displaystandby after 10 minutes of inactivity, automatic restart by crank rotationeasy chainring change without recalibration QUARQ Operating Principle The crankset forms the heart of your bike. Their only task is to convert the force of both legs into forward motion - the perfect place to measure performance. Power meters calculate power by measuring torque (pedal force) and angular velocity (cadence). Power = torque x cadence. When you pedal, all parts of the bicycle drivetrain shift (bend) slightly under the load. Power meters are designed using FE analysis so that these displacements take place in a very controlled manner and at specific locations in relation to the applied load. Strain gauges are used to measure this displacement and calculate the applied torque. Reed switches are used to calculate the cadence. DZero DZero is QUARQ's next generation power meter, named after the DZero Experiment, one of the most accurate and innovative scientific projects to discover subatomic particles. With a revised measurement loop, optimised strain gauge design, increased accuracy and the features of the Qualvin and SRAM AXS App, DZero represents the state of the art in power meter technology. You can choose between Bluetooth LE and ANT+ technology for data transfer. A simplified product line makes it easier for you to find the right power meter for your bike. OmniCal™ The power measurement depends on the choice of the right chainring. Change from a Road to a Time Trial chainring without sacrificing accuracy. No recalibration necessary. MagicZero™ Calibration takes place automatically during the ride. You don't need to pedal backwards or perform a manual calibration from your computer. 00.3018.268,002 1 x QUARQ DFour DUB power meter spider1 x CR2032 batteries

name: Shimano Dura-Ace Hollowtech II Power Meter FC-R9200-P Crankset
description: The Dura-Ace Crankset FC-R9200-P by Shimano - Power meter with high accuracy Thanks to the Shimano FC-R9200-P crankset, you can equip your Dura-Ace 2x12-speed road bike groupset with a power meter on both sides. This gives you access to information about your overall performance, cadence, torque efficiency, left-right balance and round pedalling. The accuracy of the total of 24 strain gauges is even higher than the previous model, with a deviation of only 1.5%. Thanks to Bluetooth and ANT+ radio protocol, there is broad compatibility with bike computers and similar devices. The lithium-ion battery is located in control unit on the crank spider, which you can easily recharge yourself. If it is completely full again after about 2.5 hours, it will last for at least 300 hours. By the way, the charging cable is the same as for your Dura-Ace Di2 shifter. You can also carry out firmware updates via the E-Tube Project. On the housing of the control unit, you will find an LED that signals the battery charge level and a button for easy zero calibration. Of course, the entire construction is waterproof and there is active temperature compensation, so you don't have to worry about the weather. You can attach the magnet for cadence measurement to the chainstay, seat tube or down tube using the included positioning tool. Apart from these special features, the FC-R9200-P is technically identical to the " normal" Dura-Ace crankset. It converts your power into propulsion in a highly efficient manner, is characterised by an optimal stability/weight ratio thanks to the Hollowtech II design and inspires with precise, fast shifting processes. The crank arms are hollow-formed, as is the large chainring, which is partly made of carbon, resulting in significant weight savings. Apart from the axle, all essential parts were made of lightweight metal. FC-R9200-P has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. The 40-54 tooth gradation option is specifically designed for competition use. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . *not transmitted via Bluetooth connections 2x12-speed: power measurement on both sides via 24 strain gaugesmore accurate measurement than previous modelintegrated, rechargeable lithium-ion battery with long service lifecharging time approx. 2.5 hours, same charging cable as Di2waterproof constructionactive temperature compensation (operating temperature range -10 °C to +50 °C)simple zero-point calibration via button on the control unit or bicycle computercontrol unit with LED display for battery charge level (green, red, flashing red)firmware updates via E-Tube Projectperfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the front40-54 T as an option for racinghollow crank arms (Hollowtech)hollow-formed large chainring made of aluminium-carbon composite (Hollowglide)anodised crank arms and chainringsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. Second-Generation Power Meters Shimano second-generation power meters use an improved force vector analysis and are therefore more accurate than their predecessors. Both crank arms have 12 sensors each, which are mounted in such a way that the crank deformation can be compensated for and the acting forces can be identified. The right and left sides are connected via the battery located in the axle, ensuring accurate measurement on both sides. The built-in temperature compensation contributes to the precision. You can easily recharge the battery with the Di2 charging cable EW-EC300. The power meters have Bluetooth and ANT+ compatibility to communicate with bike computers and smartphones. For firmware updates and data display, Shimano provides the E-Tube Project Cyclist App or the E-Tube Ride App. A more detailed performance analysis is possible via Shimano Connect Lab software. 1 x Shimano Dura-Ace FC-R9200-P Power Meter Crankset (34-50, 36-52or40-54)1 x Shimano crank bolt1 x Shimano EW-EC300 charging cable, 1.5 m1 x installation ring for left crank arm1 x magnets1 x magnet cover, black1 x magnet cover, white2 x double-sided adhesive tape rolls1 x Shimano TL-FC40 crank tool for left crank arm1 x cover cap for left crank arm1 x positioning tool for magnet

name: Garmin Rally XC200 Power Meter Pedals
description: The Garmin Rally XC200 Power Meter Pedals - Double-sided power metering for off-road use The Garmin Rally XC200 Power Meter pedals for MTB and gravel use are compatible with Shimano SPD cleats to measure bilateral power, cadence, right-left balance and power peaks over the course of pedal rotations. They also analyse other aspects of performance development depending on riding position and bike set-up, otherwise known as Cycling Dynamics. The pedals are easy to mount and can therefore be transferred from one bike to another seamlessly. The pedal bodies are interchangeable, so you can use them on road bikes with Look Kéo or SPD-SL cleats as well. The Rally XC helps you to train more efficiently, which in turn allows you to prepare faster to dominate future challenges. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Rally XC Cleats (recommended)Shimano SPD Cleats from the original manufacturerGarmin watches, Edge bike computers, Garmin Connect app for data analysis, software and settings updatesGarmin Connect app for training analysis or sharing training data with third-party platforms such as Strava, TrainingPeaks or TrainerRoad bilateral power metering with full access to Cycling Dynamics for advanced power analysisrobust design for mountain biking or gravel ridingslim profile with fully-integrated battery housing and low profile for better ergonomicseasy mounting lets you swap out pedals between several bikesreplaceable pedal bodieseasily replaceable batterieson-site calibrationadjustable tension55 mm Q-factor possible with enclosed spaceroperating temperature range -10 °C to 50 °C How Garmin Rally Power Meters Work Garmin Rally pedals measure the force applied to the pedal during 360° pedalling cycles and the direction of the force. Based on this, the force that causes the propulsion (tangential vector) and the force that acts on the crank in the form of compression or elongation (radial vector) are considered equally. This results in a more realistic measurement in comparison to relying solely on the tangential vector, and gives you a better overall picture of pedalling forces. 010-02388-04 1 x Garmin Rally XC200 Pedal with Power Meter axle (left)1 x Garmin Rally XC200 Pedal with Power Meter axle (right)1 x pair Garmin Rally XC Cleats4 x fixing screw for cleats2 x 2 mm washer2 x replacement gasket for battery compartment cover2 x CR1/3N batteries (installed) Optional accessories: Rally RK Pedal Body Replacement Kit for Look Kéo CleatsRally RS Pedal Body Replacement Kit for Shimano SPD-SL cleats

name: Favero Assioma Duo Power Meter Pedals
description: The Favero Assioma Duo power meter pedals - unleash your power based on hard facts The Assioma Duo power meter pedals by Favero measure power on both sides of the body, i.e. on the left and right leg. In this way, the right-left balance as well as the torque efficiency and concentricity on both sides can be determined. The pedals' ground-breaking technology provides ultra-precise and reliable wattage readings, allowing you to redefine your goals. Based on hard facts, not just estimates, you'll get more out of your pedal strokes and make your training more efficient than ever. The Assioma Duo can be installed as easily as normal pedals and quickly transferred from one bike to another. Communication with your smartphone or bike computer is wireless via Bluetooth or ANT+. As an additional feature that previous versions of the pedal did not have, the release force is continuously adjustable from 8 to 20 Nm. Favero Electronics has over 30 years of experience in the field of electronic sports equipment and works closely with athletes. The Assioma Duo pedals, for example, have been extensively tested by the UCI Team Bardiani-CSF and successfully tried out in tough racing conditions. to the pedalling speed (frequency): power = torque x cadence. Assioma is a pedal for Road cyclists, equipped with a sensor to measure the force applied to the pedal while pedalling. Assioma Duo integrates the cadence function and calculates the power of the individual leg in real time. The right pedal sends its data to the left pedal, which in turn sends the data from both pedals to the bike computer. name: Favero Assioma Pro RS-Up conversion kit for power meter pedals
description: Elevate your cycling experience with our latest innovation in clipless pedals, designed specifically for the road, triathlon, and time trial enthusiasts who demand precision and performance. These pedals are not just about sleek looks; they're about bringing cutting-edge technology to your ride. With a 3-hole cleat mounting system compatible with Shimano SPD-SL, these pedals ensure a secure and efficient connection to your bike. Crafted from durable plastic with a stainless steel axle, these pedals are built to last and withstand the rigors of intense cycling. But what truly sets them apart is their integrated power measurement system. Measuring current power from 0 to 3000 watts, cadence between 30 to 190 rpm, and offering insights into your cycling dynamics such as right-left balance, power phase, and platform center offset, these pedals are a powerhouse of data. They even delve deeper, providing metrics on torque efficiency, power on the right side, and pedal stroke smoothness, all with a remarkable measurement accuracy of 1.00. Powered by a lithium-ion battery, these pedals are designed to keep up with your longest rides without faltering. Whether you're pushing your limits on a steep climb or sprinting to the finish line, these pedals offer the reliable power measurement you need to track and improve your performance. Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to detailed analytics that can help you become a more efficient and powerful cyclist.

Whether you're pushing your limits on a steep climb or pacing through a long gravel ride, the Rally RS110 power meter pedals are your trusted companion for accurate performance metrics and improved cycling dynamics.

name: Garmin Rally XC110 Power Meter Pedals
description: Experience the ultimate cycling upgrade with the Garmin Rally XC110 Power Meter Pedals for versatile applications including All Mountain, Cross Country, Cyclocross, and Gravel. These clipless pedals come equipped with power measurement on the left side, ensuring you get precise data with a measurement accuracy of 1% to fine-tune your performance. They're compatible with SPD pedal systems and feature a robust steel pedal axle for unmatched durability on any terrain. With ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, these pedals seamlessly connect to your devices, allowing you to monitor your power output in real-time. The 2-hole cleat mounting system ensures compatibility with your favorite cycling shoes, making installation a breeze. Powered by a rechargeable battery, you're guaranteed long-lasting performance on even the longest rides. Whether you're tackling steep climbs, technical descents, or simply enjoying a gravel ride, the Rally XC110 Power Meter Pedals are your go-to for improving your cycling efficiency and achieving your best performance yet. Get ready to push your limits and explore new trails with confidence.

name: Garmin Rally RS210 Power Meter Pedals
description: Unleash your potential on cyclocross, gravel, and road rides with the Garmin Rally RS210 power meter pedals. These cutting-edge pedals are designed to elevate your performance by providing dual-sided power measurement, allowing you to fine-tune your efforts by analyzing power from both the left and right sides, along with your cadence. With ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, syncing with your favorite cycling devices and apps is a breeze, ensuring you're always connected and tracking your progress. The pedals boast a slim stack height of 12.2 mm for optimal power transfer and feature a durable steel pedal axle to withstand the rigors of intense riding. The cleat mounting system is compatible with 3-hole designs, ensuring a secure and streamlined connection to your cycling shoes. Precision is key, and with a measurement accuracy of 1%, you can trust the data to guide your training and racing decisions. The rechargeable battery not only reduces waste but ensures you're always charged up and ready to hit the road. Whether you're grinding through gravel, tackling challenging cyclocross courses, or pushing the pace on the road, these pedals are your secret weapon for measuring and improving your performance.

description: Dive into the world of advanced cycling with the Rally RS/XC210 Pedal Power Meter bundle by Garmin, designed for the performance-driven rider. This cutting-edge pedal set not only measures your power output with a stunning accuracy of 1% but also supports both ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, ensuring seamless connectivity with your cycling gadgets. Crafted with steel pedal axles, these Klickpedale guarantee durability and a reliable performance measurement on both sides, giving you a comprehensive view of your effort and technique. Whether you're pushing limits on the road or tackling challenging trails, this bundle is your go-to for precise power data. With its dual-sided measurement, you can fine-tune your pedaling balance and improve your cycling efficiency like never before. Embrace the technology that keeps you one pedal ahead of the competition, and transform your ride with the Rally RS/XC210 Pedal Power Meter Bundle.

name: Garmin Rally RK/XC210 power meter pedal bundle
description: Experience the ultimate precision and versatility with the Rally RK/XC210 power meter pedal bundle by Garmin, designed for Cross Country, All Mountain, Enduro, and Road applications. This high-tech pedal set supports both ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, ensuring seamless connectivity with your cycling devices. Crafted with a robust steel pedal axle and a durable pedal body made of steel and carbon, these pedals are built to withstand the rigors of intense riding. The Rally RK/XC210 is a click pedal version with power measurement on both sides, offering detailed insights into your performance. With a rechargeable battery, you won't have to worry about running out of power on long rides. The pedals boast an impressive measurement accuracy of 1%, guaranteeing precise data to help you optimize your training and racing strategies. The measurement point at the pedal gives you direct feedback on your effort and technique, making it easier to improve your cycling efficiency. Whether you're tearing up the trails or dominating the road, these pedals are your perfect companion for achieving peak performance. Upgrade your ride with the Rally RK/XC210 and experience the difference in your cycling journey.

name: Garmin Rally RK210 Power Meter Pedals
description: Experience the cutting-edge Rally RK210 Pedal Power Meter by Garmin, designed for the avid road, cyclocross, and gravel cyclist. With its ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, this dual-sided power meter keeps you connected and informed. It accurately measures power, cadence, and the left/right power balance directly from the pedal, where the rubber meets the road. The Rally RK210 is compatible with 3-hole cleat mounting systems and is specifically tailored for Look Keo cleat compatibility, ensuring a seamless fit for your cycling shoes. The recommended Look Kéo Grip Cleats enhance your connection to the bike, providing stability and confidence on every ride. Crafted with a durable steel pedal axle and boasting a slim stack height of 12.2 mm, these pedals are built to last and designed to perform. The rechargeable battery ensures you're always ready to go, while the measurement accuracy of 1% guarantees precise data to track your performance improvements. Whether you're grinding gravel, tackling cyclocross challenges, or speeding on the road, the Rally RK210 pedals are your go-to for advanced power measurement.

name: Garmin Rally RK110 Power Meter Pedals
description: Introducing the Rally RK110 powermeter pedals by Garmin, the perfect upgrade for your gravel or road cycling adventures. These clipless pedals come equipped with ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, ensuring seamless connectivity to your cycling devices. With a focus on precision, they boast a measurement accuracy of 1 % and provide real-time data on power (left) and cadence, enhancing your training sessions. The pedals feature a 3-hole cleat mounting system compatible with Look Keo Grip Cleats, offering a secure and efficient pedal stroke. Crafted with a durable steel pedal axle and designed to work exclusively with the Look Keo pedal system, these pedals are built to last. The stack height is a low 12.2 mm, allowing for a more natural pedaling position. As they are powered by a rechargeable lithium battery, you can count on consistent performance ride after ride. Whether you're pushing your limits on the road or exploring rugged gravel paths, the Rally RK110 Powermeter Pedals are your gateway to advanced cycling metrics and improved performance.

name: Favero Assioma Pro MX-1 Power Meter Pedals
description: Unlock Your Ride's Potential with Assioma Pro MX-1 Power Meter Pedals by Favero for Gravel and MTB Discover the pinnacle of cycling technology with the Assioma Pro MX-1 Power Meter Pedals by Favero, designed specifically for the gravel, MTB, cross country, and cyclocross rider. These pedals are not just about adding a competitive edge to your ride; they're about transforming the way you interact with your bike. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel and 6061-T6 aluminum, the Assioma Pro MX-1 stands out for its durability and lightweight design. With an impressive operating time of over 50 hours on a single charge of its lithium-ion battery, these pedals ensure you're always ready to hit the trails or tackle a grueling cross country course. The Assioma Pro MX-1 is equipped with ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, making it effortless to connect with your favorite cycling apps and devices for real-time performance tracking. Its precise measurement of torque efficiency, pedal smoothness, power, and cadence, with an accuracy of 1.00, offers invaluable insights into your riding dynamics. This allows you to fine-tune your efforts for maximum efficiency and speed. The recommended Favero cleats ensure a secure and comfortable fit, while the Shimano SPD pedal system is compatible with a wide range of cycling shoes, making it versatile for various cycling disciplines. The sleek design and low stack height of 11 mm not only enhance the aesthetic appeal of your bike but also improve power transfer for a more responsive ride. Whether you're a competitive racer or a dedicated enthusiast seeking to push your limits, the Assioma Pro MX-1 Power Meter Pedals by Favero are your gateway to unlocking new levels of performance and enjoyment on your bike. Gear up and experience the difference precision engineering can make in your cycling adventure.

name: Favero Assioma Uno Power Meter Pedals
description: The Favero Assioma Uno power meter pedals - it's the facts that count The Assioma Uno power meter pedals by Favero, unlike the Assioma Duo , perform a one-sided power measurement on the left leg. Torque efficiency and pedal stroke are only determined on the left side and you do not get any information about the right-left balance. The pedal's ground-breaking technology provides ultra-precise and reliable wattage readings, allowing you to redefine your goals. Based on hard facts, not just estimates, you'll get more out of your pedal strokes and make your training more efficient than ever. The Assioma Uno can be installed as easily as normal pedals and quickly transferred from one bike to another. Communication with your smartphone or bike computer is wireless via Bluetooth or ANT+. As an additional feature, which previous versions did not have, is the continuous release hardness adjustment from 8 to 20 Nm. Favero Electronics has over 30 years of experience in the field of electronic sports equipment and works closely with athletes. The Assioma Uno pedals, for example, have been extensively tested by the UCI Team Bardiani-CSF and successfully tried out in tough racing conditions. And if a one-sided measurement one day should not be enough for you: Upgrading from Uno to Duo is possible at any time. discharged battery)Upgrade to Assioma Duo (measurement on both sides) possible if the right pedal is retrofitted with sensorMade in Italy Assioma Uno Functionality Power is measured in cycling by relating the force acting on the pedals to the pedalling speed (frequency): power = torque x cadence. Assioma is a pedal for Road cyclists, equipped with a sensor to measure the force applied to the pedal while pedalling. Assioma Uno integrates the cadence function and calculates the power of the left leg in real time. The left pedal sends its data to the bike computer. name: Garmin Rally RK200 Power Meter Pedals
description: The Garmin Rally RK200 Power Meter Pedals - Dual-sided power metering on road bikes for Look Kéo Garmin's Rally RK200 Power Meter road pedals are compatible with Look Kéo Cleats to measure bilateral power, cadence, right-left balance and power peaks over the course of pedalling. They also analyse other aspects of performance development depending on riding position and bike set-up, otherwise known as Cycling Dynamics. The pedals are easy to mount and can therefore be transferred from one bike to another seamlessly. The pedal bodies are interchangeable, which means they can also be used with Shimano SPD-SL cleats for MTB and gravel riding. The Rally RK helps you to train more efficiently, which in turn allows you to prepare faster to dominate future challenges. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Rally RK Cleats(recommended)Look Kéo Cleats from the original manufacturerGarmin watches, Edge bike computers, Garmin Connect app for data analysis, software and settings updatesGarmin Connect app for calibration, training analysis or sharing training data with third-party platforms like Strava, TrainingPeaks or TrainerRoad bilateral power metering with full access to Cycling Dynamics for advanced power analysisslim pedal design with fully-integrated battery housing and low profile for better ergonomicseasy mounting lets you swap out pedals between several bikesreplaceable pedal bodieseasily replaceable batterieson-site calibrationadjustable tension55 mm Q-factor possible with enclosed spaceroperating temperature range -10 °C to 50 °C How Garmin Rally Power Meters Work Garmin Rally pedals measure the force applied to the pedal during 360° pedalling cycles and the direction of the force. Based on this, the force that causes the propulsion (tangential vector) and the force that acts on the crank in the form of compression or elongation (radial vector) are considered equally. This results in a more realistic measurement in comparison to relying solely on the tangential vector, and gives you a better overall picture of pedalling forces. 010-02388-00 1 x Garmin Rally RK200 Pedal with Power Meter axle (left)1 x Garmin Rally RK200 Pedal with Power Meter axle (right)1 x pair Garmin Rally RK 6° Cleats6 x fixing screw for cleats2 x 2 mm washer2 x replacement gasket for battery compartment cover2 x CR1/3N batteries (installed) Optional accessories: Rally RS Pedal Body Replacement Kit for Shimano SPD-SL cleatsRally XC Pedal Body Exchange Kit for gravel/MTB use

name: Specialized Road Bandit Saddle Mount
description: The Road Bandit saddle mount by Specialized - only compatible with SWAT The Specialized Road Bandit is a special saddle mount into which the Specialized Road Tube Spool inner tube rewinder is integrated. This mean that you can safely carry a spare inner tube, a 16 g CO2 cartridge, a tyre lever and a valve head. However, the mount must be attached to the SWAT™ threads in Specialized saddles and is therefore not compatible with other saddles. A Velcro fastener fixates the whole thing, but can also be opened quickly if necessary. Using the Road Bandit, you can give your road bike a minimalist look without having to sacrifice the most important helpers in case of a puncture on the road. unique design for mounting on SWAT threads under Specialized saddlespatent-pending design allows the replacement inner tube to be gently rolled up without damage from the valveCO2 cartridge head and tyre lever (both included in the scope of delivery) snap exactly into the designated storage space and are securely fastened in their positionsholds a 16 g CO2 cartridge with its threadaccepts inner tubes with a valve length of up to 80 mmrobust, lightweight outdoor Velcro fastener for a secure positioningdelivery is without inner tube and CO2-cartridge SWAT™ SWAT is the acronym for " Storage, Water, Air, Tools" and describes a whole range of solutions that Specialized offers for space-saving accessories. There are SWAT elements that are built into Specialized frames from the get-go, such as the opening below the bottle cage on certain mountain and gravel bikes. And there are SWAT components which can be retrofitted to any wheel, e.g. the Conceal Carry Tool or the EMT Cage Mount Tools for SWAT bottle cages. The aim is to always use an existing, unused space to carry accessories such as drinking bottles, inner tubes, tools or CO2 cartridges, while being within easy reach, in a safe space and without impairing the aerodynamics. This often results in backpacks or bags being out of the question and emergency solutions such as spare tubes tied to the frame are something that everyone wants to avoid. 27120-9941 1 x Specialized Road Bandit saddle mount1 x Specialized SWAT tyre lever1 x Specialized SWAT Mini CO2 valve head

The criteria for evaluation are strict. They are continuously reviewed and cover the entire product life cycle from development and production to maintenance and usability after use. VAUDE Green Shape products offer you the highest quality and functionality. At the same time, they give you the certainty that the environment is being polluted as little as possible. Eco Finish: VAUDE products with Eco Finish are environmentally friendly, water-repellent and are manufactured without fluorocarbons (PFC). PFCs belong to a group of chemical compounds that are used in many outdoor products to waterproof the outer fabric. As they are not degradable, accumulate in the body and are suspected of being harmful to health, VAUDE has decided not to use PFCs at all. PVC free: The VAUDE seal PVC-free means that this product is manufactured completely without PVC (polyvinyl chloride). Looks like a truck tarpaulin, is just as durable and waterproof, but is made of PU (polyurethane) coated textile fabric instead of PVC. PVC often contains plasticisers (phthalates) that are suspected of being harmful to health. 144690100 1 x VAUDE Raincover for saddles

Duro-Tek Cover made of durable, heavy-duty material. FeC Alloy Rail Sturdy and flexible carbon iron steel alloy, Ø7 mm. Gel Flow The special anatomical cut-out offers very good comfort for soft tissue and at the same time allows more flexibility along the saddle nose. ID Match System ID Match was formed out of the plan to create a saddle shape that guarantees maximum comfort and maximum performance for every cyclist. It is the first system to allow cyclists to determine the perfect saddle shape using anthropometric and functional tests. After evaluating this data, the ID Match system recommends a category of saddles from which you can choose the one that suits you best. name: Selle Italia SLR Boost Endurance Superflow Saddle
description: The SLR Boost Endurance Superflow saddle by Selle Italia - short for long<\/h2>The Selle Italia SLR Boost Endurance Superflow saddle is designed for passionate long distance riders. It has been designed for comfort, with its shortened design and Light Gel Plus padding. Compared to the standard model of the SLR Boost, this saddle ensures a more comfortable position even over long distances.

name: Ergon SR Sport Gel Women Saddle
description: Road bike saddle with comfort for women: the SR Sport Gel Women saddle by Ergon The perfect saddle for female road cyclists. Anatomically speaking, the pubic symphysis (the anterior cartilage connection between the two halves of the pelvis) is on average 1/4 lower in a female than in a male pelvis, and the angle of the pubic bones to each other is wider. Moreover, women tend to be more flexible, which means their pelvises often tilt forward further on the saddle. Unfortunately, this often results in high pressure in the genital area. Thanks to the far forward-slanted opening and wide V-shape saddle flanks, the emerging pressure is reliably distributed to the bony structures of the seat area. Particularly innovative: relief inlays in the seat and perineum area. The saddle has undergone an extensive development process, and has been thoroughly tested by the Canyon//Sram UCI Women's Team, the fastest women in the world. Innovative relief inlaysRelief opening for maximum reliefV-shape allows for optimal support in the pubic bone, with pressure shifted to bony structures.Narrow, sloping tail with a flat contour allows good freedom of movement downhill.Wide nose for wide relief opening without disturbing edges Pronounced relief channel The sensitive perineal and genital areas are particularly exposed to increased pressure when cycling. Ergon provides effective relief from sitting complaints and numbness through an anatomically adapted relief channel. Large area pressure distribution Cyclists in sporting disciplines sit on the saddle with their pelvis tilted forward. As a result, areas of the sit bones and the pubic arch are subjected to stress. Ergon saddles take this into account and allow for a large-area pressure distribution without pressure peaks. 1 x Ergon SR Sport Gel Women's saddle

Terry saddles offer continuously adjustable seating with a relief channel for optimal pressure distribution when changing your seat position. 1 x Terry Fly Arteria Max Men's Saddle

name: Syncros Belcarra V 2.0 Cut-Out Saddle
description: On the Syncros Belcarra V 2.0 Cut-Out saddle, road cyclists and mountain bikers adopt an aggressive, aerodynamic posture close to the handlebars.

name: Chromag Overture Saddle
description: Enhance Your Ride with the Overture Saddle from Chromag Experience the ultimate comfort and performance with the Overture Saddle from Chromag, designed specifically for the adrenaline-packed worlds of Dirtjump, Slopestyle, Downhill, and MTB. Crafted with a passion for detail and durability, this saddle combines high-quality materials to ensure a ride that's as reliable as it is exhilarating. Its plastic shell and cover material are built to withstand the rough and tumble of aggressive cycling, while the steel (CrMo) rails offer strength and stability. Whether you're hitting the dirt jumps, mastering slopestyle, or charging down mountains, the Overture Saddle is your throne to conquer the outdoors. Its design does not include a cutout, providing a continuous surface for consistent support during dynamic movements. Choose the Overture Saddle for a blend of durability, comfort, and performance that stands up to the rigors of extreme cycling.

name: Chromag Overture LTD Saddle
description: Gear up for the ultimate ride with The Overture LTD saddle from Chromag, designed specifically for the adrenaline junkies who live for Dirtjump, Slopestyle, and Downhill action. Crafted with a robust plastic shell, this saddle is built to withstand the toughest of landings and the most rugged terrains. The saddle rails, measuring 8 x 8 mm, are made from high-quality CrMo steel, ensuring durability and stability, no matter how hard you ride. With no cutout, this saddle provides a continuous surface that's perfect for dynamic movements and quick shifts in position, offering you the utmost control and comfort. The padding material is a high-density foam that cushions your ride, absorbing shocks and vibrations, so you can focus on nailing those tricks and descents. Covered in a durable textile material, it not only withstands the elements but also provides a secure and comfortable contact point. Whether you're dropping into steep descents or hitting the jumps, this saddle is the perfect companion for your MTB adventures. It's not just a seat; it's an essential part of your ride that offers the support and comfort you need to push your limits. So, grab your bike, hit the trails, and experience the difference a high-quality saddle can make.

name: Specialized Bridge Sport Saddle
description: The Bridge Sport saddle by Specialized - with extra portion of padding<\/h2>The Bridge Sport saddle from Specialized is a flat profiled saddle with extra padding. It is suitable for both on-road and off-road adventures. While designing it, care has been taken to ensure that the blood flow to the sensitive arteries in the sit bone area is never cut off. In addition, the lightweight PU foam in the shell increases long-distance comfort. Threads are integrated into the saddle allowing the attachment of Specialized SWAT™ accessories.

name: SQlab 612 Ergowave Carbon Saddle
description: Performance enhancement through perfect ergonomics: the 612 Ergowave® Carbon by SQlab<\/h2>The weight-optimised 612 Ergowave Carbon was specially developed to meet the needs of racers and athletes on road bikes and MTBs. It is the lightest model in the 612 Ergowave series. The saddle's wave-like shape and raised rear provide perfect rear support and optimum pressure distribution down to the deep structures of the body, which significantly improves the transmission of force to the pedal. In combination with the recess in the middle, the lower nose creates more space and clearance for the perineal area.

name: Ergon SM Pro Men's Saddle
description: The SM Pro Men saddle by Ergon offers extra comfort on the MTB With the SM Pro Men saddle by Ergon, All Mountain riders benefit from the anatomically optimised relief channel and ergonomic padding. The seating position on a mountain bike was also taken into account. The orthopaedic AirCell foam also helps to distribute the pressure evenly. Your sit bones feel less pressure.

The flat shape and the padded edges are responsible for this. Technically demanding terrain is therefore not a problem. The padding is made of AirCell seat foam. It is significantly lighter than gel, but offers high support and optimal pressure distribution. In order to relieve the sensitive perineal area, the relief channel was specifically adapted to the male anatomy. 360° edge paddingnarrow, short saddle for more freedom of movementextra light AirCell saddle foamanatomically adapted relief channel Orthopedic AirCell Foam: The padding made of Orthopedic AirCell Foam distributes the pressure perfectly and provides increased support. In addition, the material is much lighter than, for example, a relieving layer of gel. 4407100 1 x Ergon SM Enduro Comp Men saddle

name: Specialized Power Expert Mirror Saddle
description: The Specialized Power Expert saddle with Mirror technology and relief cut-out The Power Expert saddle with Mirror technology from Specialized helps you to sit more comfortably, whether on a road bike, gravel bike or mountain bike. Mirror is an innovative 3D printing process in which liquid polymer is brought into a honeycomb structure. The result is superior to all foam padding in terms of pressure distribution. In combination with the cut-out in the centre and the ergonomic Body Geometry design, you get a saddle that ensures lasting comfort, perfect blood circulation to the soft tissues and excellent sit bone support. Unlike the S-Works Mirror models, the Power Expert uses a 4-way stretch cover that protects the inside of the saddle from dirt. Add the lightweight, hollow titanium rails and you have a top saddle for competition, training or relaxed leisure use.

name: SQlab 612 Ergowave R Saddle
