name: Ritchey WCS Skyline Carbon Saddle
description: The WCS Skyline saddle by Ritchey is a lightweight, ergonomic saddle with carbon saddle rails. It is ergonomically shaped so that you are protected from unpleasant pressure points. The recess in the middle helps to relieve pressure.

name: tune Speedneedle saddle with leather
description: Dive into the ultimate cycling experience with our premium saddle, designed to elevate your performance across a variety of disciplines including Track, Cross Country, Cyclocross, Enduro, All Mountain, Downhill, Gravel, MTB, Road, Triathlon, and Time Trial. Crafted from high-quality carbon, both the shell and rail materials promise unmatched durability and lightweight performance, ensuring you stay ahead of the competition. The saddle features 7 x 9 mm high-oval carbon rails for superior strength and vibration absorption, offering a smooth ride on any terrain. Although it doesn't have a cutout, the ergonomic design ensures comfort and support during the longest rides. This saddle is a testament to cutting-edge technology and advanced materials, making it a must-have for serious cyclists seeking to optimize their biking experience. Whether you're sprinting on the track, tackling rugged mountain trails, or pushing the limits in a time trial, this saddle delivers the reliability and performance you need to excel.

name: Specialized Power Pro Mirro saddle model year 2025
description: Introducing the Power Pro Mirror saddle from Specialized for every cycling enthusiast, designed to elevate your ride on MTB , road, cross country, all mountian applicatons and gravel tours. Crafted with a 3D printed plastic top material and plastic padding, this saddle offers the perfect blend of comfort and durability, ensuring you stay focused on your journey ahead. The carbon shell material not only adds an extra layer of strength but also keeps the saddle lightweight, making it ideal for those seeking performance without compromise. Featuring a cutout design, it provides additional relief and ventilation, enhancing your riding experience even during the most intense rides. The rails are made of titanium and sized at the standard 7 x 7 mm, offering unparalleled stability and support regardless of the terrain. This saddle is designed to cater to both men and women, making it a versatile choice for cyclists of all levels. Whether you're navigating through the bustling city, embarking on a scenic tour, or pushing your limits on the road or trail, this saddle is your ticket to comfort, performance, and style.

name: Ergon SM Sport Men's Saddle
description: MTB saddle with comfort for men: the SM Sport men's saddle by Ergon The new SM Men saddles are specially adapted to the male anatomy and optimised to meet the special demands of mountain biking. A multi-faceted development team made up of sports scientists, industrial designers, engineers and test riders used current studies and produced many prototypes to design a new generation of pressure-relieving saddles for men. These saddles effectively prevent sitting complaints such as numbness or general discomfort for most types of mountain biking. The SM Sport is the all-rounder for touring, trail riding and all-mountain and offers the best riding comfort thanks to the anatomically optimised relief channel in the sensitive perineal area and athletic comfort padding. Its flattened rear and Y-shape allow for optimal freedom of movement in the moderately inclined posture typical of MTBs. Relief opening for maximum reliefNarrow, sloping tail with flat contour allows for good freedom of movement downhill Effective Relief The extremely deep relief channel, which is lowered at the rear, ends in an opening at the lowest point. The construction combines all the perks of a perforated saddle without the disadvantages (e.g., a very stiff saddle shell) and achieves a particularly high relief in the sensitive perineum area. Too much pressure in this area often triggers discomfort and numbness in the genital region. Large area pressure distribution Cyclists in sporting disciplines sit on the saddle with their pelvis tilted forward. As a result, areas of the sit bones and the pubic arch are subjected to stress. Ergon saddles take this into account and allow for a large-area pressure distribution without pressure peaks. Flat rear A narrow, sloping rear with flat contours and a minimal ramp allows for good freedom of movement downhill. S/M: Sit Bone Distance: 9 - 12 cm M/L: Sit Bone Distance: 12 - 16 cm 1 x Ergon SM Sport Men saddle

description: The Terra Argo X5 saddle by Fizik has been specially developed for gravel biking. The short nose and curved shape allow you to sit bent further forward for a more stable riding position, and ensures optimal weight distribution. The shell is particularly flexible to better absorb shocks and vibrations. name: SDG Bel-Air 3.0 Saddle w/ Steel Rails
description: The Bel-Air 3.0 Saddle by SDG - Proven Comfort and Timeless Design<\/h2>The Bel-Air 3.0 saddle by SDG with nylon base and steel rails stands for light weight and long durability. The relief gap runs along the entire length of the saddle to ensure optimum relief of the perineal area. Super-light EVA padding provides a sporty, comfortable seat feeling.

name: Selle Italia SLR Boost Kit Carbonio Superflow Saddle
description: The SLR Boost Kit road bike saddle by Selle Italia has a compact shape and carbon rails. The Superflow cut-out in the middle provides pressure relief in the perineal area.

name: Ritchey Classic Saddle
description: The Classic saddle by Ritchey gives your gravel bike a timeless look without compromising on comfort. The perforated surface provides good ventilation. The PU foam has exactly the right degree of hardness for long tours.

name: Specialized Power Comp Saddle
description: The Specialized Power Comp saddle - with Body Geometry Design The Power Comp from Specialized is a saddle with a robust steel frame, short, lowered nose and large recess for more pressure relief. Due to its Body Geometry Design, blood circulation is maintained even in aggressive seating positions, resulting in more pedalling efficiency. The padding made of lightweight PU foam is of medium thickness to achieve an optimal balance between damping and feedback, which is also suitable for long distances. Threads are integrated into the saddle shell to allow the attachment of Specialized SWAT™ accessories. The Power comp is suitable for men and women alike, but there is also a special women's model with MIMIC Technology.

name: Selle Italia Novus Boost Evo TM Superflow Saddle
description: The Novus Boost Evo TM from Selle Italia is a high-performance road bike saddle for endurance riders. It features carbon rails and a Superflow cutout.

name: Fizik Vento Argo R1 Adaptive Carbon Saddle
description: Elevate your road cycling experience with the Fizik Vento Argo R1 Adaptive Carbon saddle, designed to cater to both men and women riders. Crafted with a top layer of carbon, this saddle combines lightweight durability with a sleek design, ensuring you can ride faster and longer. The shell is constructed from a blend of plastic and carbon, offering a perfect balance of comfort and strength. The rails, made from carbon and measuring 7 x 9 mm in high-oval shape, provide exceptional stability and support, reducing the overall weight of your bike. Featuring a strategic cutout, this saddle is engineered to relieve pressure in sensitive areas, enhancing your comfort during long rides. The padding material, made from plastic, is meticulously chosen for its ability to conform to your body, offering additional support where it's needed most. Whether you're competing in races or enjoying scenic routes, this saddle is your ticket to a more enjoyable and efficient cycling journey.

name: Fizik Vento Argo R3 Adaptive Saddle
description: Elevate your ride with the Vento Argo R3 Adaptive saddle from Fizik designed for the ultimate road cycling experience. Crafted with a top layer of carbon, this saddle combines lightweight performance with enduring strength, ensuring a smooth ride on any road. The shell, a robust blend of plastic and carbon, offers a perfect balance of flexibility and support, adapting seamlessly to your movements. Mounted on metal alloy rails with a standard 7 x 7 mm dimension, it promises easy installation and compatibility with most seatposts. The innovative cutout design enhances comfort by reducing pressure in sensitive areas, making long rides more enjoyable. Suitable for both women and men, this saddle is tailored to meet the needs of all cyclists seeking to push their limits. The padding, made from high-quality plastic, provides a cushioned layer that absorbs shock without compromising on the saddle's firmness, delivering a ride that's both comfortable and efficient. Whether you're racing or embarking on a leisurely journey, this saddle is your ticket to a superior cycling experience.

name: SQlab 613 Ergowave R ltd. Team Carbon Saddle
description: Unleash your full potential in triathlons and time trials with this high-performance saddle designed specifically for the needs of speed-focused cyclists. Crafted with cutting-edge carbon rail material, this saddle offers an exceptional strength-to-weight ratio, ensuring both durability and a lightweight feel that won't hold you back. The high-oval shape of the saddle rails, measuring 7 x 9.6 mm, promises a secure fit and optimized power transfer, allowing you to push harder with every pedal stroke. Despite its robust construction, comfort is not compromised, thanks to the plush foam padding that provides ample support during long races and intense training sessions. The saddle's cover is made from durable plastic, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of competitive cycling while maintaining a sleek, aerodynamic profile. This saddle does not feature a cutout, providing a continuous surface for consistent support and pressure distribution across the entire saddle. Perfect for triathlon and time trial enthusiasts, this saddle is designed to enhance your cycling performance and comfort, helping you achieve new personal bests. Whether you're racing against the clock or pushing your limits in training, this saddle is your ally in the pursuit of speed and endurance.

name: Ergon SR Allroad Core Comp Men's Saddle
description: The BASF Infinergy® core of the SR Allroad Core Comp saddle by Ergon for road and gravel riders effectively absorbs shocks caused by bumps on asphalt, gravel and forest trails. The male perineal and sensitive seat area is relieved, the athletic posture is supported by the flat shape and the firm upper padding made of Orthopedic AirCell Foam.

name: Selle Italia SLR Boost Tekno Superflow Saddle
description: The SLR Boost Tekno Superflow Saddle by Selle Italia - Handcrafted performance made from carbon<\/h2>The SLR Boost Tekno Superflow saddle from Selle Italia is hand-crafted, made almost entirely of carbon and is ideal for high-performance on the road bike. It was developed in cooperation with race car manufacturer Dallara, so that high-end technologies from the automotive industry were transferred to the bicycle sector. The carbon and nylon shell is particularly light and very resistant, which means it can withstand even extreme racing situations such as aggressive target sprints. The edges are rounded so that your legs can glide along the sides without getting caught. The rails are made of a carbon mesh, which also makes them particularly robust. In addition, the rail length is 10 mm more than usual. This gives you a wider range of adjustment. The Superflow cut-out in the middle serves to relieve pressure, so that even long race days are no problem for you.

name: Fizik Vento Antares 00 Carbon Saddle
description: Elevate your road cycling experience with Fizik Vento Antares 00 Carbon saddle, designed for the avid cyclist who demands both performance and comfort. Crafted with a carbon shell and carbon rails, this saddle combines lightweight durability with sleek aesthetics, making it a top choice for competitive and recreational road cyclists alike. The high-oval 7 x 9 mm saddle rails ensure a robust connection to your bike, providing stability and precision handling at high speeds. Despite its feather-light construction, this saddle does not compromise on comfort. The foam padding is meticulously engineered to offer support and cushioning where you need it most, allowing for extended rides without discomfort. Its aerodynamic design minimizes air resistance, offering an advantage in both races and long-distance journeys. This saddle is the perfect upgrade for cyclists who value performance, comfort, and style on the road.

name: Specialized Sitero Saddle
description: Dive into the world of high-speed racing with the Specialized Sitero saddle, designed for both men and women who push the limits in Triathlon and Time Trial events. Crafted with a durable plastic shell and a comfortable foam padding, it offers the perfect blend of comfort and performance. The saddle features a practical cutout to reduce pressure and enhance your riding experience during long races. With its standard 7 x 7 mm steel (CrMo) rails, it ensures a sturdy and secure fit on most bikes, providing the stability you need when every second counts. The sleek plastic cover is not only stylish but also easy to maintain, keeping your focus strictly on the competition. Whether you're a seasoned triathlete or a time trial enthusiast, this saddle is built to help you achieve your best performance.

name: Wahoo ELEMNT PUCK Quarter-Turn Adapter
description: With this adapter piece you can turn any Garmin bike computer quarter-turn mount into a Wahoo bike computer mount. WFCC1M5 1 x Wahoo ELEMNT PUCK adapter

name: Shimano OT-RS900 Shifter Cable Housing - 1 Pack
description: The OT-RS900 shift cable housing by Shimano - For current 11-speed road rear derailleurs The Shimano OT-RS900 shift cable housing is required for Dura-Ace RD-R9100, Ultegra RD-R8000, 105 RD-R7000 and other current 11-speed road or gravel rear derailleurs. The reason for this is the smaller radius that results when routing the cable from the frame to the rear derailleur, which cannot be created with the stiff standard OT-SP41 cable housing. The OT-RS900 is 240 mm long and has a diameter of 4 mm. RD-R9100RD-R8000RD-R7100RD-R7000RD-RX820RD-RX822RD-RX810RD-RX812RD-RX400 pre-lubricated with special silicone grease to ensure smooth shifting The length of the OT-RS900 should be adjusted accordingly depending on the bicycle frame size. This is necessary for optimal performance. The OT-RS900 should be cut from the correct side when adjusting the length. One of the two ends is flare-processed. This flare-processed end is inserted into the barrel adjuster of the rear derailleur and should therefore remain there. OT-RS900 For Dura-Ace, Ultegra, 105, GRX and other 11-speed or 12-speed road and gravel rear derailleurs, Shimano has developed the special OT-RS900 cable housing. It is less stiff than the conventional OT-SP41 housing and is therefore better suited to the tight curve where the cable is routed from the frame to the rear derailleur. Thanks to OT-RS900, problems with the barrel adjuster can be prevented and the rear wheel can be removed more easily. OT-RS900 is not intended for use on the shift/brake lever side. 1 x Shimano OT-RS900 shifter cable housing1 x end caps, sealed, for rear derailleur1 x Shimano long pointed end caps

Among other things, the size of the ceramic balls is checked down to the thousandth of a millimetre. Tests are then carried out in the laboratory or preferably by professionals in training and competition. CeramicSpeed bottom brackets guarantee you the lowest possible friction, optimised power transfer and maximum durability and also help you save watts and reach the finish line faster. name: Topeak Nano TorqBar Torque Wrench
description: Elevate your bike maintenance game with the precision-engineered Nano TorqBar Torque Wrench by Topeak, designed specifically for the dedicated cyclist. This tool is a must-have for anyone serious about their cycling, from track racers to cross-country adventurers, cyclocross enthusiasts, enduro riders, city commuters, and everyone in between. With a preset torque function, it guarantees that all your bike components are tightened to the exact specifications, preventing damage and ensuring optimal performance across all terrains including gravel, MTB, road, and even in triathlon & time trial settings. Crafted from durable steel with an aluminum handle, this torque wrench combines strength with lightweight ease of use. Its 12-inch length provides ample leverage to achieve precise torque settings effortlessly. Whether you're adjusting components on your downhill beast, tuning your city bike for a smoother ride, or prepping your slopestyle rig for the next big competition, this tool has you covered. It's not just a wrench; it's an essential companion for every ride and race. Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to precision with this indispensable tool in your bike maintenance kit. Perfect for both professional mechanics and DIY enthusiasts alike, it ensures your bike is always in top condition, ready to tackle whatever challenges the road or trail throws at you.

name: PRO Torque Wrench
description: A technical and visual highlight: the Torque Wrench by PRO Nothing is more annoying than the moment when you hold your brand new parts in your hands, want to mount them straight away and then it happens: you went with your gut and used a bit too much force with your wrist when screwing them on. The screws are overtightened or even torn off. Instead of enjoying your new parts, you are now bitterly waiting for the next possible use of your bike. PRO has developed a torque wrench that is not only elegant, but also impressive in terms of function, so that exactly this misfortune will no longer happen to you in the future. The PRO torque wrench is a precision tool for correctly tightening bolts and nuts to a predefined torque. Its textured handle fits comfortably in the hand, the slim design improves handling in hard-to-reach places and the exclusive black finish with blue accents is pleasing to the eye of the user. Its own weight speaks for high value and the easy-to-read scale for good operability. This reliable tool makes it easy and safe to set the correct amount of torque. PRO's torque spanner has been carefully calibrated to ASME B107.14-2004 so that all values are within a measurement tolerance of +/- 4%. A corresponding certificate showing the measured values at the set 2 Nm, 9 Nm and 15 Nm, the test date and the tester is enclosed. Anyone who appreciates high-quality tools will love the PRO torque wrench. suitable for installation work, e.g. stems, handlebars, seatpostsclicks when the set amount of torque is reachedtextured handle for better gripsimple, slim designeasy to read scaleblack with blue accentsincl. certificate of calibration at 2, 9 and 15 Nm Manufacturer Number:PRTL0066Contents:1 x PRO torque wrench1 x PRO Certificate of Calibration

description: The 4-6 Nm Torque Wrench Set by 3min19sec - Practical tool at a fair price This 3min19sec torque wrench set consists of a torque wrench with an adjustment range of 4 to 6 Nm and four attachments from ParkTool. The torque wrench is a practical helper for assembly work in the workshop. You only have to set the target torque and tighten the key until the first crack, then the appropriate torque is reached. The T-handle design with integrated storage for the included bits makes this tool ideal for quickly assembling components such as stems, handlebars and brakes. adjustable torquetorque limitation during rotationincl. hex and Torx bitsstowage function for bits in the handle A note to our customers: The click sound can be very quiet at low torque levels. Be careful that a higher torque isn't applied without noticing. The 3min19sec torque wrench is suitable for right-hand threads. Even though the head has a toggle function, the wrench should only be used to tighten screws within the torque range. This way, it will serve you well for a long time. What torque should I use? The proper torque for you components is either printed on the part or can be found in the instruction manual. The 3min19sec 4-6 Nm torque wrench set includes: 1 x 3min19sec torque wrench1 x ParkTool 3 mm hex bit1 x ParkTool 4 mm hex bit1 x ParkTool 5 mm hex bit1 x ParkTool T25 Torx bit

name: Cyclus Tools Cutting / Milling Tool for Bottom Bracket Threads and Housing
description: This cutting/milling tool is a professional tool that has been specially developed for cutting and milling work on the bottom bracket shell. After you have cut the thread, the cutting tool is decoupled and the face-milling tool is used. Re-clamping the tool is not required, and face-milling of 100% of the bottom bracket shell contact surface is guaranteed. Face-milling is an absolute must for Campagnolo Ultra Torque, Shimano Hollowtech II and other bottom brackets with outboard bearings, for example, in order to fit a bottom bracket precisely into the frame. guarantees 100% face-milling of the contact surfacesfor Shimano Hollowtech 2 and other bottom brackets with external bearingsa must for the exact installation Note: Regular oiling and cleaning of your cutting tool will significantly extend its life and ensure perfect results every time. 1 x Cyclus Tools cutting / milling tool

description: The Cyclus Tools thread cutting tool allows you to re-cut the thread of the fork tube. Before you start with the thread cutting process, you should first clean the fork tube. Then place the cutting blade (guide) at right angles to the steerer tube on the thread of the fork. Make sure that you turn the tool exactly onto the existing thread and do not tilt it. This prevents damage to the existing thread. Please note that the fork thread cutting tool is only used for re-tapping an existing thread on the fork. suitable for recutting the thread on the fork tubewith matching dieoptionally as 1" or 1 1/8" Note: Use an oil suitable for the material for the cutting process. name: Wera Hex-Plus SPKL L-Key Set with Holding Function
description: The Hex-Plus L-keys from Wera have a larger contact surface in the screw head, and thus reduce the destructive notch effect on screw heads. At the same time, up to 20 % higher torques can be transmitted. With the ball head on the long leg, screwing in a slightly slanted position is also possible. The additional special holding function on the long leg ensures that the screws stay on the tool even in hard-to-reach areas. The L-keys come with a plastic sheath (SPKL), which are made of round material that is easy to grip. The sheath makes work comfortable and safe even at low temperatures. All L-keys can be grabbed quickly thanks to the colour coding and also size identification. In addition, the wear-free material of the clip guarantees a secure hold of the angle spanners and easy removal at all times. L-keys in two-component clip: secure fit of the L-key in the clip, no wear, easy removal.hex L-key with BlackLaser surface treatment (excellent surface protection, long service life, high corrosion protection)hose-coatedall L-keys can be grabbed quickly thanks to their colour coding and size identificationHex-Plus drivehexagonal ball head on long leg with holding function (notfor size 1.5 mm, 2.0 mm and 2.5 mm) Hex-Plus: Makes hexagon socket screws last longer. Hexagon socket screws have the problem of being " rounded" quickly. The reason is the impact of the sharp edge of the tool on the inner surface of the screw head. The gradual wear process eventually leads to " round turning" . Wera Hex-Plus tools have larger contact surfaces in the screw head. The notch effect and thus the deformation of the screw are reduced. At the same time, up to 20 % higher torques can be transmitted. Holding function: The clamp of the hex bolt is ensured by a spring-loaded ball on the L-key. Particularly helpful in hard-to-reach work areas where you cannot use your second hand to hold the screw. 5022210001 Wera 950 SL/9 SM HF Allen key set consisting of: 1 x Wera hex torque tool (1.5 x 90) without retention function1 x Wera hex torque tool (2.0 x 101) without retention function1 x Wera hex torque tool (3.0 x 123) without retention function1 x Wera hex L-key (4.0 x 137)1 x Wera hex L-key (5.0 x 154)1 x Wera hex L-key (6.0 x 172)1 x Wera hex L-key (8.0 x 195)1 x Wera hex Torx tool (10.0 x 224)1 x Wera clips

name: Wera Torx L-Key Set
description: Also for difficult assembly positions: the Torx® L-Key Set by Wera This Wera L-Key set covers both inside Torx® bolts and tamper-resistant Torx® bolts. The Torx® BO (BO = bore hole) on the shorter end and the Torx® ball head on the longer end enable screwdriving even in a slightly inclined position, and thus safe working even in difficult installation positions. The plastic-sheathed L-keys (SPKL) are made of round material that is easy to grip. The sheath makes work comfortable and safe even at low temperatures. All L-keys are easy to handle thanks to the size indications; colour coding also helps in the multicolour version. The wear-free material of the clip guarantees a secure hold and easy removal. name: ParkTool Quick-Change T-handle w/ Bits QTH-1
description: magnetic bit driver with T-handle8 common bits in magnetic holderquickly change bits with one handbit holder can be attached to any magnetic surface, e.g. repair standalternatively, fixed mounting on the wall is possibleholder has two empty spaces for additional 1/4" bits 1. To select a bit from the holder, put the end of the driver on the bit until it is picked up by the magnet. 2. If necessary, turn the tool slightly so that the bit is fully seated in the tool. 3. To detach a bit from the tool, guide the bit back into the bit holder so that it makes contact with the magnet. 4. Meanwhile, pull and hold the trigger. 5. Pull the driver away from the bit holder so that the bit remains in the holder, release the trigger. For QTH-1 to work properly, the bits must be inserted into the holder with the drive side down. name: 3min19sec Pedal Wrench 15 mm
description: The Pedal Wrench by 3min19sec is a welcome help when loosening and tightening pedals The 3min19sec pedal wrench always promotes an optimal working position thanks to its offset and the two 15 mm forks. The long lever and the rubberised handle allow effortless and safe work. Of course, the wrench can also be used as a normal 15 mm open-end wrench and, in addition to the two forks, has a third 15 mm socket as a ring wrench in the middle. Workshop Tip: Pedals have threads running in opposite directions so that they cannot come loose while riding. This means that the right pedal has a right-hand thread, the left pedal a left-hand thread. Loosen Pedals: The easiest way to release a pedal is to bring the crank forward horizontally, place the pedal wrench to the rear in the direction of the bottom bracket (also as horizontally as possible) and then press the wrench downwards. This way both sides can be released without problems. Tighten Pedals: To tighten the pedal, align it horizontally to the rear. Position the wrench forward towards the bottom bracket (again as horizontally as possible) and push the pedal wrench down. offset 15 mm pedal wrench with two openingsrubberised gripadditional 15 mm receptacle, which can be used as a ring wrench 1 x 3min19sec 15 mm pedal wrench

name: Wera Joker Switch Ratcheting Combination Wrench
description: Joker Switch Ratcheting Combination Wrench by Wera - Loosen, tighten, lock The Joker Switch ring wrench with ratchet function from Wera helps you tighten nuts and bolts when conventional tools fail. It just works well in every position. The fine-toothed ratchet mechanism can be easily switched in both directions by means of a lever. This mechanism has exceptionally fine toothing with 80 teeth on the ring side and therefore ensures flexibility in the tightest spaces. In addition, the ring side is angled at 15° to the tool axis, making it easier to apply the key in confined working spaces. With the integrated holding function, you guide nuts and screws directly and safely to the place of use so that you can insert the thread there quickly and safely. This effectively prevents the screw or nut from falling off and time-consuming searching for it. Refitting, repositioning and adjusting force to avoid the risk of injury? That's in the past. With its end stop, the Joker reduces the risk of slipping downwards from the screw head. This makes driving screws easier and allows you to apply more force. To ensure that everything fits perfectly, the clever double hexagon geometry of the Joker makes a form-fitting connection with screw or nut. The replaceable, hardened metal plate in the Joker's jaws holds the screw securely in place. Both reduce the risk of slippage even at high torques. practical holding function by metal plate in the jawsno slipping due to end stopdouble hexagon geometry reduces the risk of slippagefine-toothed ratchet mechanism can be easily switched in both directions via a leveralways find the right tool thanks to the " Take it easy" colour-coding system that sorts tools by size 050200 1 x Wera Joker ring wrench w/ ratchet function

name: Wera Screwdriver with Ratchet Function 816 RA
description: The ratchet screwdriver is a high-quality bit holder. The Rapidaptor quick-change chuck enables lightning-fast bit changes without auxiliary tools. The strong permanent magnet always keeps the bits bombproof, and the Kraftform Plus handle ensures comfortable, ergonomic working, avoiding blisters and calluses. The hard grip zones enable a high working speed, while the soft grip zones guarantee a high torque transmission. Without actuating the sleeve, the bit can be pushed into the drive. The lock is automatically activated as soon as the bit is placed in the screw, and the bit sits securely and wobble-free. To change the bit, simply push the sleeve forward. The spring mechanism lifts the bit off the magnet and unlocks the tool. The bit can be removed quite easily. This is particularly helpful for effortless removal of even the smallest bit sizes without auxiliary tools. 1/4" hexagon socketsuitable for bits with 1/4" external hex drive according to DIN ISO 1173-C 6.3 and E 6.3 and Wera connection series 1 and 4ratchet screwdriver with Rapidaptor technology for lightning-fast bit changesratchet with 44-piece fine gearing for low return anglewith switching (right, fixed, left)maximum torque of up to 50 Nmmulti-component Kraftform handle for fast and ergonomic screwing Kraftform - The shape that made the hand The whole hand makes contact with the handle. name: Wera Phillips Screwdriver 350 PH
description: Kraftform Plus Screwdriver - graspable ergonomics. The screwdriver from Wera protects the entire hand-arm system, even in continuous use. In combination with other technical and practical product advantages such as the laser tip for a secure fit in the screw, Kraftform screwdrivers are the ideal choice when it comes to driving screws. It happens again and again that one slips out of the screw. Sometimes valuable surfaces are damaged or you even injure yourself. The tip of Wera Lasertip screwdrivers is microscopically roughened with laser beams. This rough surface literally " bites" into the screw head. Accidental slipping out can thus be avoided. The large contact surface of the Kraftform handle with particularly high friction to the soft zones results in high torque transmission, without pressure caused by edges. The hard materials used for the handle guarantee a quick grip without the danger of the skin " sticking" to the handle. The softer, non-slip zones enable the low-loss transmission of high torques. In addition, the hexagonal roll-off protection makes it difficult to roll away at the workplace. This also puts an end to the search for dropped tools. screwdriver for Phillips head screwshard grip zones for high working speed, soft grip zones for high torque transmissionalways find the right tool thanks to the " Take it easy" colour-coding system that sorts tools by size and profilewith hexagonal roll-off protection against rolling awaywith laser tip for more grip in the screw head Kraftform - The shape that made the hand The whole hand makes contact with the handle. The smooth, hard zones glide through the hand like wheels when gripping and enable particularly high working speeds. The grippy, soft zones are optimal contact surfaces for the hand and enable high power transfer. 05008720001 1 x Wera 350 PH Phillips head screwdriver for Phillips recess screws (PH 2 x 100 mm)

name: ParkTool TM-1 Spoke Tension Meter
description: Always ensures the right tension: the TM-1 spoke tension gauge by ParkTool The key to a stable and durable wheel is correctly and evenly trued spokes. The TM-1 tension meter measures the spoke tension of each individual spoke and, in addition, the relative tension of all spokes of a wheel precisely and reliably. Easy to use and reasonably priced, the TM-1 can be used universally with almost all spokes. Diameter, material or shape do not matter. A must-have for every mechanic who builds or maintains wheels, whether professionally or as a hobby. This definitely should not be missing in any workshop. Includes a summary table for easy translation of measurement data to the actual tension values for almost every spoke type. measures spoke tension for each individual spokemeasures relative tension of all spokes of a wheelprecise and reliableeasy to useuniversally applicable for almost all spokesdiameter, material or shape do not mattera replacement coil is available separately Note: The TM-1 comes with a summary table for easy translation of measurement data to the actual tension values for almost every spoke type. Due to new and different steel bladed spokes on the market, there is an additional web page with a spreadsheet for spokes not included in the table. TM-1 1 x ParkTool TM-1 Spoke Tension Meter

name: ParkTool HBT-1 Brake Hose Cutter
description: brake hose cutter for hydraulic hosesalso suitable for pressing in barbed hose insertshard anodised aluminium body for improved tool wearCNC machinedstainless steel blade, replaceablereplaceable pin tip Shortening hydraulic hoses: 1. Place the hose in the recess of the HBT-1 trigger. 2. Compress the lever until the blade almost comes into contact with the hose. 3. If necessary, slide the hose into the desired position. 4. Fully compress the trigger to cut the hose. Hose barb installation: 1. Partially insert the hose barb into the end of the hose by hand. 2. With the barb end facing in, feed the hose through the clamp towards the push pin tip until the contact surface of the hose barb is completely flush with the end of the hose. 3. Tighten the clamp down firmly with the knob. 4. Compress the trigger until the shoulder of the hose barb is completely flush with the end of the hose. 5. Loosen the knob and remove the hose. The HBT-1 is not suited for cutting steel braided hydraulic hoses. HBT-1 1 x ParkTool HBT-1 brake hose cutter2 x spare blades Optional Accessories: replacement blades

name: Gates Universal Transmission Spring Tension Tester
description: The Universal Transmissions Spring Tension Tester is a gauge for the professionally-equipped workshop to measure and check the tension of Gates belts. It works with an integrated ruler, a scale with pointer and a measuring stone that is pretensioned by a spring and uses the deflection of the belt as a measure of the current belt tension. A correctly tensioned belt is essential for the belt drive to function optimally, so that it neither skips nor runs too heavily, thus avoiding increased wear. Common tension adjustment systems include inclined or vertical dropouts, horizontally sliding dropouts (not recommended by Gates) and eccentric bottom brackets. Place the Spring Tension Tester over the two sprockets on the belt. This changes the position of the finger and shifts the pointer on the scale.Use the pointer to read the current belt tension: red means the belt tension is too low, yellow means it's too high, green means the belt tension is on an optimal level.Repeat the measurement at different crank positions. Before doing so, always return the pointer to its starting position below the red area. Tension recommendations for Gates Carbon Drive are as follows: Off-road and urban - soft and even pedalling style: 40-60 Hz (35-45 lbs)Off-road and urban - strong and hard pedalling style: 60-75 Hz (45-53 lbs)Internally geared hubs: 35-50 Hz (28-40 lbs)Tandem: 60-65 Hz (45-48 lbs)Shimano STEPS: 35-45 Hz (28-35 lbs) S8100030 1 x Gates Universal Transmissions Spring Tension Tester
specs: {"Function": "Measures belt tension", "Type": "gauge, special tool", "Compatibility": "Gates Carbon Drive System"}

name: Gates Universal Transmission Eco Tension Tester
description: The Universal Transmissions Eco Tension Tester is a low cost tester with separate ruler for measuring and checking the tension of Gates belts. Correct belt tension is essential for optimum functioning of the belt drive so that the belt neither skips nor runs too heavily, thus avoiding increased wear. Common tension adjustment systems include inclined or vertical dropouts, horizontally sliding dropouts (not recommended by Gates) and eccentric bottom brackets. Hang the measuring rod on the belt and place the ruler on both sprockets.Check the tension: red means increase the tension, yellow means decrease the tension, green means the tension is OK.During tension adjustment, you must maintain the correct alignment of the belt.Turn the crank a quarter turn and measure again.Repeat the measurement with subsequent crank rotation several times, as the tension level can be different at different points on the belt. Tension recommendations for Gates Carbon Drive are as follows: Off-road and urban - soft and even pedalling style: 40-60 Hz (35-45 lbs)Off-road and urban - strong and hard pedalling style: 60-75 Hz (45-53 lbs)Internally geared hubs: 35-50 Hz (28-40 lbs)Tandem: 60-65 Hz (45-48 lbs)Shimano STEPS: 35-45 Hz (28-35 lbs) S8200061 Gates Universal Transmissions Eco Tension Tester, consisting of: 1 x measuring device1 x ruler
specs: {"Function": "Measures belt tension", "Type": "gauge, special tool", "Compatibility": "Gates Carbon Drive System"}

name: SRAM Chain Gap Adjustment Gauge
description: The SRAM chain gap adjustment gauge - for a perfectly adjusted rear derailleur With the chain gap adjustment gauge by SRAM you can align your rear derailleur correctly. On a full suspension mountain bike, first bring the chassis in SAG. Place the template on the upper pulley. Then turn the B-adjust screw on the rear derailleur until the longest teeth of the largest cassette sprocket are aligned with the sprocket outline of the tool. The template " Eagle universal" is handled slightly differently: Put the chain on the second largest sprocket and place the template on the largest sprocket with the arrow pointing towards the upper derailleur pulley. Then turn the adjusting bolt B on the rear derailleur until the arrow on the template points exactly to the centre of the axle of the upper derailleur pulley. 1x8-speed: Eagle universal: eTap AXS 26-44: 1 x SRAM chain gap adjustment gauge
specs: {"Function": "rear derailleur alignment", "Type": "special tool", "Material": "Composite material", "Compatibility": "eTap AXS 26 - 44 tooth", "Manufacturer Number": "11.7518.100001"}

name: Rohloff Caliber 2 Chain Wear Indicator
description: The right time: the Caliber 2 Chain Wear Indicator by Rohloff Even if a derailleur chain is still fully functional, it no longer matches the sprockets exactly once it reaches a certain wear size. If the chain is not replaced with a new one, the sprocket and chainrings will wear down prematurely and also have to be replaced the next time the chain is exchanged. The Rohloff Caliber 2 makes it possible to quickly and reliably determine the right time to change the chain. Only drive derailleur chains to the wear limit and thus reduce excessive wear on your valuable sprocket sets. Ride drivetrains with chain tensioners with a fully-functional chain to preserve the chainrings. Specifications:Function:Chain Wear IndicatorCompatibility:1/2" x 3/32"Technical Information:Material:stainless steelFeatures:two-sided design: one side (S) for steel sprockets, the second (A) for aluminium and titanium sprocketswear values: 0.75 % (aluminium/titanium), 1 % mm (steel)made of hardened stainless steelUse:Simply place the Rohloff Caliber 2 with the recess on a roller and swing it onto the chain with the measuring nose. With a new chain, the measuring nose just fits with the tip between the rollers. The greater the wear, the deeper the measuring nose dips. If the measuring side A dips completely so that the gauge rests on the rollers over the entire measuring length, the chain is worn by 0.075 mm per joint. To protect aluminium or titanium sprockets from premature wear, the chain should now be replaced with a new one.If the measuring side S dips completely, the chain is worn by 0.1 mm per joint. To protect steel sprockets from premature wear, the chain should now be replaced with a new one.Manufacturer Number:3000Contents:1 x Rohloff Caliber 2 Chain Wear Indicator

name: Rohloff HG-Check Sprocket Wear Indicator
description: Perfect propulsion thanks to fresh sprockets: the HG-Check Sprocket Wear Indicator by Rohloff A check with the Rohloff HG-Check informs you quickly and reliably about the wear condition of your Shimano Hyperglide sprockets. The test should be carried out before longer bike rides, but especially before road or MTB races, so that you are not suddenly unpleasantly surprised by a jumping chain. With the Rohloff HG-Check, you can concentrate on your intensive bike tour or your race - the wear indicator will show you precisely what condition your Shimano sprockets are in. tool for checking the condition of HG sprocketsimportant before longer tours and races as well as before every chain swap Place the HG-Check one after the other on the sprockets to be checked on the HG cassette block mounted on the rear wheel. For sprockets with 12 to 21 teeth, angle the last chain link outwards with the measuring roller and press it against the chain. Press the lever handle firmly (approx. 10 kg) with the other hand in the direction of travel and, with the measuring chain loaded, swing the measuring roller into the tooth gap. If the measuring roller swings completely into the tooth space without resistance, the tooth profile is still secure. Even when the chain is swapped out, the new chain runs perfectly. If the measuring chain hits the tooth head or can only be swivelled into the tooth space with pressure, the sprocket is worn and should be replaced. If the electrode immediately jumps out of the toothing when pressure is applied to the handle, the amount of sprocket wear is particularly high. Sprockets with more than 21 teeth rarely wear in such a way that the chain run causes problems. An examination is therefore not absolutely necessary. Nevertheless, it can be checked here whether, when the electrode is fully inserted, it pops out when the lever is pressed. If the electrode remains in the gearing, the sprocket is OK. If it pops out, you can expect problems with very heavy chain loads. 3100 1 x Rohloff HG-Check sprocket wear indicator

name: Wera Bicycle Set 1
description: The compact tool set for on the road and in the workshop: the Bicycle Set 1 by Wera Bicycle workshops and bikers with a passion love putting together bicycles. name: Topeak Ratchet Rocket Essential HD Ratchet set
description: Crafted for the dedicated cyclist, the versatile torque wrench set Ratchet Rocket Essential HD from Topeak is an indispensable companion for MTB, road, city, and touring adventures. Designed with precision in mind, it features a preset torque function, ensuring your bike components are tightened to the exact specifications, safeguarding against damage from over-tightening. The tool is made from durable steel, promising longevity and reliability on all your rides. It comes equipped with an array of bits including Allen (hex key), Torx, and Phillips (crosshead), making it compatible with a wide range of bike parts. The hex drive 1/4" tool holder ensures a secure fit for the bits, allowing for efficient and precise adjustments. Whether you're fine-tuning your machine for a race or conducting routine maintenance, this torque wrench is your go-to tool for achieving optimal performance and safety on your bike. Its compact design and multifunctional capabilities make it a valuable addition to your cycling toolkit.

name: milKit Hassle Off All-In-One Multi-tool
description: The milKit Hassle Off All-In-One Multi-tool - Over 20 functions in a practical toolbox The Hassle Off All-In-One Multi-tool from milKit has more than 20 functions. The toolbox is attached directly to the bicycle. The centrepiece is the Essential8 tool: the curved screwdriver impresses with high torque and Bit-in-Bit technology. This means that all common bit sizes are magnetically connected to each other and can fit in a space-saving way. A magnetic holder on the outside of the toolbox ensures that no bit gets lost while working. If you want to transport even more bits, there is room for them in the tool box. The angled lever on the tubeless tool makes repairing tyres a piece of cake. Tubeless patches are held in a small compartment in the cutting tool, which you use to cut them to size. There is also a 3-in-1 chain tool on the tyre lever. It is operated via the 3 mm bit and functions simultaneously as a chain tool, valve tool and spoke wrench. A magnetic recess can be found in the tyre lever, and there is also space for up to two master links. You can also attach a mini-pump or CO2 cartridge to the toolbox with a hook-and-loop strap and have everything you need on hand for emergencies on tour. lightweight multi-tool in toolbox format with more than 20 functionsattaches directly to the bicycle frameEssential8: high torque screwdriver with magnetic Bit-in-Bit technology, contains common sizes (H8, H6, H5, H4, H3, H2.5, H2 / T25)magnetic bit holder on the outside of the toolboxstorage option for additional bits in the toolboxtubeless tool: easy handling due to angled levercutting tool with storage compartment for tubeless patches3-in-1 chain tool in tyre lever: chain tool, valve tool, spoke wrench, drive via 3 mm bittyre lever with cut-out and magnetic holder for up to 2 master linksseparate hook-and-loop strap for attaching a mini-pump 1 x milKit Hassle Off All-In-One multi-tool

name: OneUp Components EDC Lite Multi-Tool
description: The EDC Lite Multi-Tool from OneUp Components - A practical companion in the steerer tube The OneUp Components EDC Lite Multi-Tool has nine functions and can be easily stored in the steerer tube via a special container. In contrast to the well-known EDC and EDC V2 tool set, no special threads have to be carved out and no special stem is necessary. The only requirement is that the fork has an Ahead star nut. The star nut is first pressed deeper using the included long bolt and a suitable hammer (not included). Insert the empty container about 7 cm deep into the steerer tube and fasten it to the star nut from the underside using the included short bolt. Now nothing can stand in the way of transporting the multi-tool in the fork. A plastic cap that replaces the stem cap helps pull the EDC Lite out of the container. Thanks to this practical and space-saving companion, you will never again be without the most important tool on the trail. 2 mm hex2.5 mm hex3 mm hex4 mm hex5 mm hex6 mm hex8 mm hexTorx T25flat-head screwdriver Steerer tube: Length:* Fox Racing Shox except Fox 38: 190 mmFox 38 and RockShox: 210 mmin general, the long bolt must be inserted 8.5 cm deep *Stem length measured from the bottom of the fork crown to above the stem spacers or the stem (if no spacers are used) multi-tool with container for transporting inside the steerer tubeincl. all essential tools for on-the-goeasy to install in minutes, without removing the star nut or cutting a threadcontainer has the same colour as the OneUp Components comp pedals, grips, chain guides and handlebar decals 1 x OneUp Components EDC Lite multi-tool1 x OneUp Components EDC Lite container1 x long bolt (EDC Lite Bolt)1 x short bolt (Star Nut Setter Bolt)1 x plastic cap

name: OneUp Components EDC V2 Tool Set
description: The EDC V2 tool set from OneUp Components - the most essential breakdown tool at your fingertips The OneUp Components EDC V2 tool set includes all the essential tools for quick repairs on the road, and you don't even need a backpack to carry it all in. OneUp recommends the Everyday Carry Set consisting of carrier, multi-tool and tyre lever/chain tool combination tool as a clever solution for trips under 3 hours. In comparison to the previous version, the durability of both the spoke wrench and chain rivet has been significantly improved. The set is rounded out with two sealed storage capsules: the smaller capsule is intended for the (not included) Tubeless Plug Kit with insertion tool and patch, which helps to quickly seal holes in tubeless tires, while the larger capsule accommodates the smaller one and offers storage space for further accessories. Both are connected to the bottom part of the EDC V2 Tool's housing; alternatively, a CO 2 cartridge can be attached there. The system can be conveniently stowed in either the steerer tube of tapered forks or inside of the handle of a OneUp mini-pump. As for the former solution, a special headset cap is used instead of a star nut and a thread has to be cut into the aluminium steerer tube. The V2 version of the tool has a low-friction design that enables easier removal. name: OneUp Components EDC Steerer Tube Set Tool System + Tap Kit + Top Cap
description: OneUp Components EDC Steerer Tube set - store your tools in your steerer tube The EDC steerer complete set from OneUp Components gives you an all-inclusive kit to carry the EDC V2 Tool Set in tapered aluminium steerer tubes. In addition to the Everyday Carry V2 tool, which consists of a multi-tool and tire lever chain rivet in the carrier, the EDC Tap Kit is included, which makes it easier for you to thread the steerer tube. The complete set also includes the EDC Top Cap, which pre-tensions the headset instead of a star nut, and includes a steerer tube plug that keeps dirt out. Soon enough you'll start using the extra space to store your tools. name: OneUp Components EDC V2 Threadless Carrier
description: The OneUp Components Threadless Carrier lets you easily stow the EDC V2 tool in the steerer tube The Threadless Carrier is a container that allows you to transport the OneUp Components EDC V2 Tool in the steerer tube without having to cut a thread in it. It is mounted instead of the star nut and pre-tensions your headset via a bolt. In doing so, it creates space for the Everyday Carry V2 tool set, which consists of a multi-tool with 10 functions and a tyre lever/chain riveter combination tool. Even the smaller storage capsule, in which a tubeless plug kit with insertion tool and patches can be stowed, still finds its place. The assembly of the Threadless Carrier can be done in 10 to 15 minutes. You just need to first make sure your fork has a long enough non-oval steerer tube and is not made of carbon. First, remove the star nut - a suitable M6 bolt that can be used in combination with a ratchet is included. To find out which of the four included installation bolts you need to use, measure the distance from the bottom of the fork crown to the top of the stem spacers, or the stem if you are not using spacers above the stem. Or you can use the indicator laser-etched on the container, starting from the 80 mm bolt. When you have found the right bolt, insert it into the lower end cap. Now insert the whole thing from below into the steerer tube, while you insert the Threadless Carrier from above. Turn it clockwise with one hand while holding it from below with the other hand. Then insert the EDC V2 Tool into the container and align the lid so that the lettering runs horizontally. Now you just have to tighten the bolt at the bottom of the fork opening to tighten the whole thing. After that, nothing stands in the way of a ride, and you now always have the most important tools with you without having to carry a bag. Important note in advance: All compatibility information and installation instructions are provided exclusively by OneUp Components. Using the EDC V2 tool System on your bike may void the original manufacturer's warranty. description: Wolf Tooth Components EnCase System Bar Kit One Tool Set - The EnCase all-round worry-free package The Wolf Tooth Components EnCase System Bar Kit One tool set is the complete EnCase system from Wolf Tooth. It includes a multi-tool with 14 functions, another combination tool and two elongated containers that help you store the tools in the handlebars. The multi-tool comes with eight bits for hex, Torx, Phillips head and flat head screws as well as a spoke wrench and valve tool. The combination tool EnCase System Chain + Tire Plug combines a chain tool for chains up to 12-speed and a tubeless tool with five patches. Both tools can be transported in the handlebars using the storage sleeves. These are made of vibration-damping rubber and have aluminium end caps that replace the usual bar end plugs. A Fit Kit specifically for larger diameter drop bars is also included. name: OneUp Components EDC V2 Tool Set + EDC Top Cap
description: OneUp Components EDC V2 tool w/ EDC Top Cap Thanks to the EDC V2 Tool Set from OneUp Components you no longer have to carry important tools in your backpack. Simply stick the Everyday Carry Tool into the tapered steerer tube and use the free space you didn't know you had. The EDC V2 includes a multi-tool, chain rivet and tire lever in the carrier, plus a small accessory capsule designed for a Tubeless Plug Kit with patch and insertion tool, and a large accessory capsule for additional storage space. The EDC Top Cap, the included special headset cap, lets you preload the headset without any star nut. A thread must be cut into the steerer tube beforehand. Included as well is the Steerer Plug, which helps to keep dirt out. description: Designed for the needs of every wrench: the Sport Mechanic repair stand by Feedback Sports The twist-lock attachment of the Feedback Sports repair stand is designed for tubes with diameters of 19-48 mm and can be swivelled through 360°. The handle is easy to use and can be rotated, enabling the bike to be clamped quickly and securely to the repair stand. The clamps of the Sport Mechanic are covered with polypropylene to ensure a secure fixation. The three-point system of the repair stand convinces with high stability on almost any surface. The Sport Mechanic can carry a weight of up to 29.5 kg and fixes the bike at a working height of up to 1.65m - making back pain is a thing of the past. name: Feedback Sports Sprint Repair Stand
description: The optimal solution for the professional: the Sprint Repair Stand by Feedback Sports The Sprint uses its very own holding and fixing concept and is thus the optimal solution for the increasing number of aero frames, seatposts with special profiles or other models that cannot be fixed with a conventional clamp, or only with difficulty. With the Sprint, the wheel is placed on a horizontal rail and fixed either to the fork or to the rear dropout with a clamping mechanism. An adapter ensures that quick release or thru-axle mounts can be clamped in all conceivable dimensions. The frame is additionally supported by placing the bottom bracket shell on a special plate. This means that the wheel is in the safe assembly position in no time at all, which can also be adjusted over an enormously wide range in the working height from 76 to 121 cm, as well as always being optimally balanced thanks to the horizontal displacement of the fixing points. In addition, the system can be rotated through 360°, so that literally every hand movement can be carried out in the optimum position. Nevertheless, thanks to its three wide-reaching tripod legs, the Sprint stands extremely securely and stably not only on level workshop floors but also off-road. In general, the Sprint is predestined for outdoor use. Thanks to its manufacture from a very light aluminium alloy, it has a transport-friendly total weight of 5.7 kilograms, while the protective anodisation ensures extreme weather resistance. When folded, the Sprint also stands out for its small pack size. It can shoulder an impressive 38 kilograms and therefore does not fall to its knees even with heavy mountain bikes or even e-bikes. The Feedback Sports transport bag is ideal for transporting and storing your repair stand. compatible with all common frames thanks to numerous axle adaptersadjustable working height from 76 cm - 121 cm360° rotatable with flexible fork and bottom bracket positionvery light aluminium alloy with protective anodisationvery stable stand due to the 3 tripod legs, even off-roadsmall size when folded 16690 1 x Feedback Sports Sprint repair stand1 x 12 mm thru-axle adapter1 x 15 mm thru-axle adapter

name: SILCA Hirobel Frame Clamp
description: The Hirobel Frame Clamp by SILCA gives delicate frames a secure hold The Hirobel frame clamp from SILCA for repair stands is clamped in the frame triangle and distributes the load evenly over the clamped frame. This is advantageous for bikes made of carbon, as pressure peaks are avoided here. This protects your bike and improves stability, for example when working on unusually heavy bikes. The clamp also holds the frame closer to the centre of gravity, minimising annoying bobbing. Since the bike can be placed much higher, working on it is noticeably more comfortable and particularly easy on the back. The bindings are made of paint-friendly material and can be adapted to almost any conceivable frame shape thanks to their well thought-out shape. safe, stable, ergonomicimproved weight distribution and stabilityspecially shaped, paint-friendly mounts and strapsadaptable to any frame shapeprevents unwanted movements when working on the bike AM-AC-004-ASY-0100 1 x SILCA Hirobel frame mount

name: Topeak PrepStand Team Issue repair stand
description: Discover the ultimate companion for your cycling maintenance and repair needs with the cutting-edge PrepStand Team Issue Bike Stand from Topeak. Designed for versatility, this stand features a 360° rotating head equipped with a crank lock, ensuring easy access to every part of your bike, whether it's an MTB, road bike, your city and touring companion or heavy E-bikes. Its robust construction combines aluminum and fiberglass, offering a lightweight yet durable solution for all cyclists. When not in use, it folds compactly, making storage and transport a breeze. Its holding claw construction type guarantees a secure grip on your bike, ensuring it stays in place as you work. This tool is not just a stand; it's an essential part of your cycling toolkit, designed to meet the demands of every cycling enthusiast.

name: 3min19sec Rear stand 29"
description: The 29" Rear Wheel Stand by 3min19sec - A firm stand for the bike With the 3min19sec 29" rear wheel stand you can easily park your bike anywhere. This bike stand offers the possibility to park the bike upright without having to lean it against a wall. This way it is always stable in the holder. Thanks to the rubberised tips, it is also protected from damage. The parking aid is compatible with virtually all bikes, be they mountain bikes, city bikes or racing bikes. The only important criterion is a distance of approx. 25 mm between frame and hub bottles or between frame and brake rotor. With its simple design, the rear wheel stand cuts a fine figure both in the living room and in the workshop. name: RockShox Suspension Fork Pump / Mini-Pump 20 bar for BoXXer
description: The transformer among pumps: the Suspension Fork Pump by RockShox A unique suspension fork pump for Boxxer and all other air suspension forks and shocks from RockShox. The suspension fork pump is an essential tool that helps you to tune and maintain your forks and shocks. In addition, you can also inflate your normal tyres with this suspension fork pump, which gives you the advantage of not having to carry a second pump. name: Specialized Air Tool MTB Mini-Pump
description: The Specialized Air Tool MTB mini-pump - extra power The Air Tool MTB mini-pump from Specialized convinces with its large volume. Due to a revised design, performance has been increased by almost 30% compared to previous models, making it easier to inflate the tyre. Maximum flexibility is provided by the Twist-Lock valve head, which is compatible with Presta and Schrader valves via a reversible insert. The pump has an easy to grip aluminium body and is supplied with a bracket for mounting on bottle cage threads. Invert Design with a double chamber system (the hose outlet is located on the piston shaft, the cylinder is pressed over the piston) improves performance by about 28% compared to the predecessorTwist-Lock valve head minimises size and allows easy switching between Presta and Schrader valvesa CNC-machined body for a secure grip during tyre inflationboth chambers are made from aluminium for more durabilityimproved dust protection cover, also prevents unintentional opening Twist Lock The Twist-Lock valve head is placed on the tyre valve when open and then fixed in place with a rotating movement so that it closes around the valve. It has an insert compatible with Presta valves on one side and Schrader valves on the other. To change the compatibility of the pump, simply turn the insert around. 47218-3000 1 x Specialized Air Tool MTB mini-pump1 x frame mount

name: Schwalbe Tire Booster Tubeless Inflator
description: Effective mounting aid for tubeless Tyres: the Tire Booster by Schwalbe With the new Tire Booster from Schwalbe, tubeless tyres can be mounted on your bike securely. The lightweight, handy bottle can be used either at rest or on-the-go. Mounting a tubeless tyre requires a strong blast of air so that the tyre bead quickly presses into the rim flange, thus sealing the tyre. Depending on the tyre-rim combination, this is not always possible with conventional floor pumps, according to Peter Krischio, Schwalbe Race Product Manager. A compressor helps in the professional workshop or at the gas station. For safe and easy fitting without a compressor, Schwalbe is now launching the Tire Booster, which was created in cooperation with the British start-up company Airshot. With it, up to 11 bars of air pressure can be brought into the tyre quickly. This means that the tyre immediately sits securely on the rim and seals evenly everywhere, says Peter Krischio. The Tire Booster is a significant advantage in tubeless mounting. At a light weight of 435 grams, you can easily take it with you. If you need stronger airflow, you can also use a special adapter. For this purpose, the valve core is removed and the adapter is screwed directly onto the valve stem, which in turn maximises the airflow. This is how it works: connect the Tire Booster with a conventional floor pump via the SV valve on the Tire Booster, pump up the bottle and then activate the quick-release valve. Immediately, the air is distributed evenly and the tyre sits firmly on the rim - usually with the typical loud crackling sound. no compressor requiredlever to regulate the rare of air flowgenerates a pressure of 11 bar for a short timeBooster is filled via a floor pump (SV valve)for at home or on the road 6080.01 1 x Tire Booster Schwalbe tubeless inflatorincl. mounting material

name: 3min19sec Valve Adapter SV Tube to AV Pump

The two types of valves have different diameters and are not compatible with each other. Have you ever been to a petrol station where they only have car pumps and you can't pump up your tubeless tyre? This will no longer happen with the valve adapter. It can be easily attached to your keychain and brought along with you so that you don't forget it at home. By the way, you can also use this practical small part for Dunlop valves. adapts Presta valves to Schrader pumpspractical attachment to keychain Tubes are available with various valve types. name: Topeak JoeBlow Tubi 2Stage Tubeless Floor Pump
description: The JoeBlow Tubi 2Stage floor pump by Topeak is especially designed for inflating tubeless tyres. The transparent Tubi-Head prevents air or sealant from escaping. The JoeBlow Tubi 2Stage fills any tyre quickly and with high pressure, whether it's a fatbike or road bike. Stage 1: 0-2 bar / 30 psi (large volume)Stage 2: 2-11 bar / 30-160 psi (high pressure) made especially for tubeless tyresvalve core is removed and retained in the valve head so that tyres can be filled with highest amount of volumeTubi-Head valve head with pressure release buttonno escape of air and sealant2 stages for optimum filling: Stage 1 for highest possible volume, stage 2 for high pressure up to 11 baradapter for Auto-/Schrader valveshose can be rotated 360°pressure gauge with double scalehose lock Tubi-Head: The Tubi-Head utilises airtight closure with a Presta valve. The integrated Valve Core Knob is used to unscrew the valve core and hold it in the valve head. After inflation, the valve core is screwed back into the valve and only then is pressure released. This means that tubeless and large-volume tyres in particular can be inflated quickly and without loss of pressure. 2Stage: Pumps with 2Stage technology switch between two modes using the integrated lever. Stage one opens both cylinders of the pump, thus pumping with large volume and low pressure. At stage 2, only the smaller cylinder is opened, and higher air pressure is generated. name: Lezyne Digital Pressure Over Drive Floor Pump
description: Lezyne Digital Pressure Over Drive Floor Pump - Perfect for mounting tubeless tyres The Digital Pressure Over Drive floor pump by Lezyne is a bicycle pump and air compressor in one. It has a separate chamber that you fill with air up to a maximum of 15 bar and empty again using the foot lever to supply a tubeless tyre with air quickly, reliably and evenly. This makes it easier to mount road and MTB tubeless tyres. If you want to use the Digital Pressure Over Drive as a normal pump and inflate a tyre that already contains air, also fill the chamber first. This will equalise the pressure between the chamber and the tyre and the pumping process can be started. The model has a precise digital pressure gauge and an extra-long braided hose. It has a reversible ABS-1 Pro valve attachment with air release function and valve tool, which is compatible with both Schrader and Presta valves. The construction is made of durable aluminium as well as steel. The wooden handle not only looks stylish, but is also very comfortable to work with. name: Lezyne Classic Floor Drive 3.5 Floor Pump
description: Elevate your cycling experience with the Lezyne Class Floor Drive 3.5 high-pressure pump, designed for the avid cyclist who demands reliability and efficiency. Crafted with a durable steel cylinder and an aluminum base, this pump is built to last and withstand the rigors of regular use. The ergonomic T-handle, made of fine wood, ensures a comfortable grip while you pump, making inflation tasks less of a chore and more of a pleasure. Whether you're preparing for a mountain biking adventure, a road race, or a city tour, this pump is versatile enough to meet your needs, compatible with both Presta and Schrader valves. The bottom-mounted, analog pressure gauge allows for precise pressure measurements, ensuring your tires are inflated to perfection for optimal performance and safety. Its 635mm hose offers ample reach, making it easy to connect to your bike's valves without unnecessary strain. Designed for high-pressure applications, this pump is your go-to tool for ensuring your bike is always ready to hit the road or trail. Whether you're a mountain biker, road cyclist, or enjoy city and touring rides, this pump is an essential addition to your cycling gear.

The pump offers floor pump performance in a compact design and is, as the name suggests, designed for high-volume MTB tyres. You can generate pressures of up to 6.2 bar. Thanks to the reversible ABS flip-thread chuck attachment with air release function, the model can be used for both Schrader and Presta valves. name: Shimano Oil service kit for 3-/5-/7-/8-speed hub gears
description: Shimano oil service set for 8-speed internally geared hubs - with oil and immersion bucket With the Shimano Oil Service Set you can service 3, 5, 7 and 8-speed internally geared hubs. It consists of a canister containing 1 litre of oil and a vessel in which the inner gear unit is immersed, left side down, up to the first sprocket for 90 seconds. name: TONIQ Chain Wax
description: TONIQ Chain Wax ensures a quiet, clean drivetrain TONIQ Chain Wax is an environmentally-friendly chain wax which you can use to reduce the wear of your derailleur and counteract noise. Its consistency keeps surfaces dry so that less dirt can adhere to the chain. Apply the wax to the inside and your drivetrain will ride like a new bike. TONIQ Chain Wax is suitable for any weather and any season. It consists of renewable, plant-based raw materials and is completely safe to use. reduced wear and increased chain performanceless contamination of the chain, cassette and rear derailleur sprocketsreduced noisesuitable for year-round use in all weather conditionssustainably produced in the EU100% plant-basedbiodegradablepackaging made from recycled polyethylene terephthalate (rPET) 1. Clean and degrease the bicycle chain thoroughly, even new chains (e.g. with TONIQ Degreaser ). 2. Apply TONIQ Chain Wax sparingly to the dry chain. To do this, turn the crank evenly and apply wax to the inside of the chain links (this is the side where the chain makes contact with the chainring). 3. For the first application, let the wax dry completely once and then repeat the process. 4. If necessary, treat the chain again directly without cleaning: run it through a dry cloth and then apply TONIQ Chain Wax. 5. Wipe away excess wax with a clean cloth. No marking required. name: Rohloff Oil of Speedhub 500/14 Oil Set Model 2024
description: The Rohloff Oil of Speedhub 500/14 oil set for the maintenance of internally geared hubs The Oil of Speedhub 500/14 oil set from Rohloff contains cleaning oil and all-season oil for your internally geared hub. To ensure that it runs smoothly and without defects for a long time, you should change the oil every 5000 kilometres or once a year. Use the cleaning oil to remove abrasion and any water that may have penetrated the internally geared hub, and top up the gear oil to ensure that your drivetrain runs smoothly and quietly. If you need a syringe and hose to fill the hub as well as oil, take a look at the oil change kit from Rohloff. Only Rohloff oils (gear oils/cleaning oils) may be filled into the Rohloff Speedhub 500/14. Filling with other liquids or additives can cause damage to transmission parts (e.g. plastic parts). name: Rohloff Oil of Rohloff Special Chain Lubricant
description: The Oil of Rohloff Chain Lubricant - Acts like grease The special chain lubricant was specially developed by Rohloff in cooperation with a renowned German lubricant manufacturer to meet the tough demands on the bicycle chain and the Rohloff Lubmatic automatic chain lubrication system. The base is a synthetic oil that cares for your chain with special additives. This delivers high pressure stability, much better creep and sliding properties and becomes water-repellent, giving your chain better protection against rust. The Rohloff special chain lubricant is classified as readily biodegradable according to the OECD 301F test method. This method is a test that determines the percentage of the test substance that is completely broken down in a period of 28 days. In order to be rated easily biodegradable, 50% of the Rohloff special chain lubricant must have degraded within the first 10 days of the testing period, and at least 60% in the 4 weeks of the testing period. high pressure stabilityexcellent creep and sliding propertieswater-resistantrust-protectiveeasily biodegradablerefillable containers No marking required. name: r.s.p. Wax melting furnace AX 700 for chain wax
description: Keep your bike chain in top condition with our versatile AX 700 Wax Melting Pot for Chain Wax by r.s.p., designed for every cyclist, whether you're hitting the MTB trails, cruising the city streets, or embarking on a long-distance tour. This tool is a must-have for ensuring smooth and efficient performance across all types of bikes, including road, city, and touring models. It's specifically crafted to provide thorough lubrication, ensuring your chain runs smoothly and lasts longer. With no special markings required for use, this tool is straightforward and easy to use, making it perfect for both beginners and seasoned cyclists alike. Its design ensures that you can maintain your bike's chain without the need for any electrical devices, making it an eco-friendly option for your maintenance toolkit. Plus, with no expiry date requirement, this chain cleaning tool is a durable addition to your cycling gear, ready to assist you in keeping your bike in prime condition for years to come. Whether you're prepping for a race or just keeping your ride in perfect shape, this tool is the ideal companion for every cycling adventure.

name: TONIQ Assembly Paste
description: TONIQ Assembly Paste - Assemble components gently, eliminate cracking TONIQ Assembly Paste is an environmentally-friendly assembly paste which you can use to gently assemble sensitive components on your bike. This ensures a secure connection of all parts and also reduces annoying cracking noises around the bottom bracket, the seatpost or the stem. Apply the paste to the contact surfaces of the components and assemble them according to the manufacturer's instructions. Your bike now rides as smoothly and quietly as if it were brand new. Whether it's aluminium, steel, titanium or carbon, TONIQ Assembly Paste is suitable for all materials. It consists of renewable, plant-based raw materials and is completely safe to use. suitable for all contact surfaces of components made of carbon, aluminium, titanium, steel or other materialsreduced cracking for bottom brackets, seatposts, stems and handlebarsprotection from wear and corrosionsustainably produced in the EU100% plant-basedbiodegradablepackaging made from recycled polyethylene terephthalate (rPET) 1. Clean the parts you want to mount thoroughly (e.g. with TONIQ Bike Cleaner ) and dry them. 2. Apply TONIQ paste sparingly to the contact surfaces and assemble the components according to the manufacturer's instructions. 3. Remove excess assembly paste with a cloth. When assembling components, always observe the manufacturer's torque specifications. No marking required. TONIQ Bike Care TONIQ bike care products give you back the feeling of having a new bike to ride every day. They were developed with a special focus on sustainability. TONIQ Bike Care products are made from 100% renewable, plant-based raw materials, are environmentally friendly and non-toxic. TONIQ's supply chains are also intentionally short, and all packaging is made from recycled materials. name: CeramicSpeed UFO Bearings Race Day Grease
description: The UFO Bearings Race Day Grease by CeramicSpeed - Particularly low friction UFO Bearings Race Day grease is CeramicSpeed's lowest friction grease. It is particularly suitable for use in time trials and track cycling. With use, it changes its viscosity and becomes oily. designed for the lowest possible frictionespecially suitable for time trial and track cyclingDynamic Viscosity Transformation: changes its viscosity while in useideal for CeramicSpeed ceramic bearings, but also suited for steel bearings A fill level of 25 to 30% on the road and 15 to 20% on the track is recommended. Maintenance should be done at least every 2000 km (1200 miles). Dynamic Viscosity Transformation (DVT) Due to the high pressure at the contact point between the bearing ball and the race, the grease film becomes less viscous and resembles a lubricating oil. DVT thus combines the advantages of a light oil with those of a long-lasting grease. No marking required. EUH210 Safety data sheet available on request. name: SILCA Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep
description: SILCA Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep chain cleaner - degreaser and primer in one The Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep chain cleaner from SILCA frees the chain from grease residues and at the same time prepares it for treatment with chain wax. The whole process takes only about 10 minutes, replacing more elaborate procedures normally required to wax a brand new chain. Chain Stripper acts as both a degreaser and as a primer that improves wax adhesion to the chain. chain cleaner with double function: degreaser and primer (improving wax adhesion) in onedeveloped to simplify the waxing of brand-new, manufacturer-greased chainsdissolves and locks in grease and oil to make rinsing off easierprepares the metallic surface for improved adhesion of the chain wax to be applied afterwardsextends the life of the chainquick application: maximum 10 minutescan also be used for relatively new chains already mounted on the bicyclehighly concentrated, biodegradable, environmentally friendlyMade in the USA 1. Immerse the chain in the Chain Stripper and move it around for 30 seconds. 2. Wait 5 to 10 minutes and move again for 30 seconds. 3. Remove the chain from the Chain Stripper and rinse with water, then immediately drop it into the hot wax. The water boils away within minutes and the chain is completely waxed. 1. Apply 1 drop of Chain Stripper to each roller of the chain while turning the crank against the direction of travel. Leave on for 5 minutes. 2. Turn the crank 10 turns against the direction of travel to distribute the Chain Stripper and then apply another 1 drop per roller and leave for another 5 minutes. 3. Rinse with clean water, turning the crank at least 10 turns against the direction of travel. No marking required. Aeromind, LLC/dba SILCA 835 N. Capitol Ave. Indianapolis, IN 46204 USA Tel.: +1 317 748-0494 sales@silca.cc https://silca.cc/ Bottle, 473 ml: 1 x SILCA Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep
