name: Dr. Wack F100 Bio Multi Oil
description: The F100 Bio Multi Oil by Dr. Wack lubricates and protects The F100 Bio Multi Oil by Dr. Wack is an indispensable organic-based multi-talent for your bike workshop. It eliminates the squeaking of moving components and loosens stuck parts such as bolts. Thanks to its high creeping capacity, it can also infiltrate hard-to-reach places. It also displaces moisture and protects against corrosion. Even stubborn dirt such as grease and resin are displaced by the Multi Oil and it does not resinify itself. It is suitable for all surfaces, even rubber seals and electronic contacts. For the sake of environmental friendliness, the oil consists of more than 80 % renewable raw materials and comes in 100 % recycled packaging. lubricant to eliminate squeaking and loosen stuck partshigh creep ability, ideal for hard-to-reach areasdisplaces moisture and protects against corrosiondissolves rust, grease, resin, soot, oil and taralso suitable for electronic contacts and rubber sealsno resinificationorganic based according to DIN EN 16807:2016-12made from more than 80 % renewable raw materialsfree from dyes and fragrancesbottle made from recycled material No marking required. name: TONIQ Degreaser
description: TONIQ Degreaser - eco-friendly cleaner for your drivetrain With the environmentally friendly Degreaser from TONIQ you can remove oil, grease and dirt from the chain, cassette, rear derailleur and other components of your bike's drivetrain. Simply spray on the degreaser, let it work and then rinse it off with water. TONIQ Degreaser makes your drivetrain feel almost like new. It consists of renewable, plant-based raw materials and is solvent-free. functional degreaser for all drivetrain components of the bicycle, such as chain, cassette or rear derailleursuitable for all types of bicycles, including e-bikesdissolves oil, grease and dirtsafe and simple usesolvent-freepH value 10 - 10.5sustainably produced in the EU100% plant-basedbiodegradablepackaging made from recycled polyethylene terephthalate (rPET) 1. Rinse off coarse dirt with clean water. 2. Spray TONIQ Degreaser onto the drivetrain. 3. Leave it on for about 5 minutes. 4. Remove stubborn dirt with a brush or sponge. 5. Rinse the drivetrain thoroughly with clean water 6. If necessary, dry the concerned parts with a clean cloth. Do not use on rubber or seals. Do not use in direct sunlight or on hot surfaces. Contains linalool: May cause an allergic reaction. No marking required. TONIQ Bike Care TONIQ bike care products give you back the feeling of having a new bike to ride every day. They were developed with a special focus on sustainability. TONIQ Bike Care products are made from 100% renewable, plant-based raw materials, are environmentally friendly and non-toxic. TONIQ's supply chains are also intentionally short, and all packaging is made from recycled materials. name: Kärcher Battery low-pressure cleaner
description: Meet your new best friend in bike maintenance: the Kärcher OC 4 cordless low-pressure cleaner. Specifically designed for cleaning, this tool is a game-changer for keeping your bike in top condition. With its powerful cleaning capabilities, you can easily remove mud, grime, and all the stubborn dirt that clings to your bike after a long ride. The plastic handle ensures a comfortable grip during use, making your cleaning sessions less of a chore and more of a breeze. Whether you're a casual rider or a hardcore cyclist, this portable low-pressure cleaner is an essential tool for maintaining your bike's performance and appearance. Say goodbye to endless scrubbing and hello to more time riding.

name: SILCA Super Secret Wax Starter Pack
description: SILCA Super Secret Wax Starter Pack - bundle containing chain cleaner and chain wax The Super Secret Wax Starter Pack consists of a bottle of Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep and a bottle of Super Secret Chain Lube by SILCA. The Chain Stripper removes grease residues from your chain in minutes and prepares it for treatment with chain wax at the same time. Afterwards, apply Chain Lube to minimise friction and noise and extend the life of your drivetrain. Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep: Super Secret Chain Lube: bundle of chain cleaner and chain waxchain cleaner with double function: degreaser and primer (improving wax adhesion) in onedissolves and locks in grease and oil to make rinsing off easierprepares the metallic surface for improved adhesion of the chain wax to be applied afterwardsquick application: maximum 10 minuteschain wax in high purity qualitywith WS2 nanoparticleshas a dirt-repellent, friction-reducing and noise-reducing effecteasy to apply: no heating necessary, can be applied directly to the chain on the bikeallows to save 7 watts compared to equivalent productsextends the life of the chain Ultimate Chain Stripper Wax Prep: Application: 1. Apply 1 drop of Chain Stripper to each roller of the chain while turning the crank against the direction of travel. Leave on for 5 minutes. 2. Turn the crank 10 turns against the direction of travel to distribute the Chain Stripper and then apply another 1 drop per roller and leave for another 5 minutes. 3. Rinse with clean water, turning the crank at least 10 turns against the direction of travel. Hazardous Substance: No marking required. Manufacturer: Aeromind, LLC/dba SILCA 835 N. Capitol Ave. Indianapolis, IN 46204 USA Tel.: +1 317 748-0494 sales@silca.cc https://silca.cc/ Type: Nominal Quantity: 118 mlPackaging Type: dropper bottle Super Secret Chain Lube: Application: 1. Shake the bottle well before use. 2. Run the chain and apply 1 - 2 drops of lube per roller. 3. Work the wax in with your fingers, keeping the chain moving. 4. Shift through the entire cassette at least once. 5. Allow to dry for at least 12 hours, 24 hours in cool, damp weather conditions. Note from the manufacturer: Super Secret chain wax should be applied at temperatures of 5 - 35 °C and stored at 5 - 30 °C. If it is exposed to temperatures below freezing for a longer time, it becomes very thick. However, it can still be used because the function remains given. Hazardous Substance: No marking required. name: 3min19sec Cassette Removal Tool + Chain Whip
description: Cassette removal tool + chain whip by 3min19sec - A practical tool set The cassette removal tool and the chain whip by 3min19sec are also available as a set. They will serve you well when working on cassettes. The cassette removal tool can be used to mount and remove Shimano HG (Hyperglide) cassette lockrings with internal teeth. It can also be used for compatible cassettes that have the same toothing on the lockring, e.g. SRAM, or for Center Lock brake rotors. The highlight is that a 12 mm adapter is supplied which makes the remover compatible with lockrings for thru-axle rear hubs with 12 mm axles. The 12 mm sleeve can easily be attached to the integrated 5 mm guide pin and is held in place by a magnet. So you only need one tool to work on bikes with quick releases or thru-axles. The removal tool is made of steel and is equipped with a plastic handle that is easy to grip and protects against slipping. The chain whip helps you to remove the cassette from the freehub body. It serves as a counter when you loosen the lockring. Thanks to its comfortable handle, it is also suitable for longer use. The tool fits 7- to 12-speed cassettes from various manufacturers. It consists of heat-treated steel and is therefore very durable. cassette remover has an integrated 5 mm guide pin and separate 12 mm sleeve for corresponding rear hubschain whip has a comfortable handle for long use, is heat-treated, has a laser logo 1 x 3min19sec cassette removal tool1 x 3min19sec chain whip1 x 12 mm guide pin

name: Cyclus Tools SN.10-W Snap.In Basic Tool
description: Depending on the manufacturer, Integrated headsets require different milling depths in the head tube. With this milling cutter, you can the desired depth directly on the tool. The adjustment range, which can be read on a scale, extends from 2.3 to 12 mm. With only one tool, you save money and space in your workshop. The milling cutter can also be used for conventional headsets. The milling cutter fits the Snap.In tool holder and is an extension of the proven tool system. The use of Cyclus Tools cutting oil extends the service life of the milling cutter. In addition, always ensure rotation in the mill direction - even when you're pulling out. To avoid overly stressing the tool, even pressure must be applied to the cutter with the aid of the taper guide, spring and the threaded sleeve. Always mill slowly and evenly. Remove any chrome and anodized layers before milling to avoid excessive wear on the cutters or " seizing" of the tool in the head tube. SN.50-W tool holder 7202810 1 x Cyclus Tools SN.10-W basic toolincl. adjusting screwincl. spring cone guide

name: Unior Bike Tools Bearing Puller Kit 689/2BI
description: Unior Bike Tools Bearing Puller Kit 689/2BI with six different extractor attachments The bearing puller kit 689/2BI from Unior Bike Tools is a comprehensive tool set that helps you to remove bearings, e.g. from the bottom bracket. It consists of an extractor with handle and sliding hammer as well as six different attachments for different internal bearing diameters. The assembled tool is pushed through the hole of the bearing to be extracted and adjusted to the bearing bore with the help of a screw. The extractor presses behind the bearing so that it can be easily pulled out after a few loosening blows with the hammer. The tool is made of high-quality tool steel and has a tensile force of 1 kg. set for disassembling bearings with six different extractor attachmentsextractor presses behind the bearing to be removed for easier removaltensile strength 1 kgmade of premium chrome vanadium steeldrop-forged, completely hardened and temperedchrome-platedergonomic two-component handle Screw the extractor with the appropriate size onto the spindle with the handlePush the tool through the hole of the bearing to be removedTurn screw on spindle to open body of the extractor and fit to bore of bearingLoosen the bearing with a few blows of the built-in sliding hammerBearing can then be quickly and easily removed from the shell 626629 Unior Bike Tools Bearing Puller Kit 689/2BI, consisting of: 1 x extractor spindle with handle and sliding hammer1 x arm for 6.5 - 8 mm bearing dimension1 x arm for 10 - 12 mm bearing dimension1 x arm for 12 - 15 mm bearing dimension1 x piece for 17 - 20 mm bearing dimension1 x arm for 22 - 28 mm bearing dimension1 x arm for 30 - 36 mm bearing dimension

name: ParkTool Measuring and Alignment Gauge DAG-3 for Derailleur Hangers
description: lightweight, precise, flexibly adjustable tool for aligning derailleur hangerslong, precision-machined aluminium body for accurate measurement and easy adjustment with plenty of leveragesliding, fold-away indicator allows 360-degree measurement even with obstacles such as seat stays, pannier racks, etc.low head is ideal for thru-axle derailleur hangers and Shimano Direct Mountreplaceable M10 threaded tiptotal length 420 mm (16.5" ) 1. Insert wheel into frame, rim must be correctly aligned. 2. Remove the rear derailleur from the derailleur hanger. 3. Screw the axle of the tool into the mounting hole of the rear derailleur. 4. Move the indicator so that the tip touches the outer edge of the rim. 5. Fold the indicator away towards the arm so that it is not in the way. 6. Turn the tool by 180°. 7. Turn the indicator towards the rim. If the tip is less than 4 mm from the outer edge of the rim, the derailleur hanger is horizontally aligned. If it is 4 mm or more from the rim or presses against the rim, the derailleur hanger is misaligned. In this case, turn the indicator towards the hub. Use the shaft of the tool as a lever to correctly align the derailleur hanger. Repeat testing and bending until the gap is less than 4 mm. 8. Then hold the indicator in the same position and rotate the tool back 90°. Turn the indicator so that it points towards the rim. Check and bend here as well. Turn the tool 180° and proceed in the same way. 9. With the derailleur hanger properly aligned, the tip of the indicator should just touch the outer edge of the rim at one position and have less than 4 mm of play at the other three positions. Check and align all four positions until this is achieved. The rim must always be rotated so that the measurements are taken at the valve hole so that figure eights do not affect the accuracy of the measurement. Always measure at the outer edge of the rim to minimise errors due to the slope of the rim flange. DAG-3 1 x ParkTool DAG-3 alignment tool for derailleur hangers
specs: {"Function": "frame assembly", "Tool Type": "gauge", "Compatibility": "16\" to 29+ wheels (ETRTO 317 to 630+)", "Size": "M10", "Material": "aluminium, steel"}

name: Shimano SM-PCE02 PC interface for Di2 / STEPS
description: Shimano SM-PCE02 PC Interface - Maintenance and setting hardware for Di2 and STEPS The Shimano PC interface SM-PCE02 is a connection and diagnostic device for professional and detailed maintenance of Di2 shifters as well as STEPS E-bike systems. It works with E-Tube Project Professional software for Microsoft Windows - the E-Tube Cyclist app is not supported. The unit is connected directly to a PC using the included micro USB to USB cable. On the other side, you connect it to any free e-tube connection on your bike via one of the two system cables, which are also included. It is also possible to connect individual components to SM-PCE02 without them being mounted on the bike. One of the system cables supplied is compatible with connectors of the (older) type EW-SD50, the other with connectors of the (newer) type EW-SD300. In contrast to the app, the Professional software with cable-supported connection offers you a large maintenance area. Here you can check the status of the drive unit and battery or the usage ratio for each gear setting for the front derailleur. You can also make direct adjustments to the gearing. You can also view the error log of the e-bike and select which Di2 or STEPS units you want to run error diagnostics. The result and much more information are part of the service report, which you can view as a PDF. Just as with the app, you can of course also use the SM-PCE02 hardware to update firmware for Di2 or STEPS parts, pair devices or adjust settings. In the case of electronic shifters and derailleurs, these are, for example, the button assignment on the STI, the shift mode or the multi-shift mode. For e-bikes, the riding characteristics, support patterns and support profiles can be configured or the display can be adjusted. Information on the return and disposal of batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Software: E-Tube Project Professional (free download at https://bike.shimano.com/en-EU/e-tube/project/forwindows.html Shimano Di2 System: Di2 with BT-DN300 batteryDi2 with BM-DN100 / BT-DN110 battery holder / rechargeable batteryDi2 with SM-BMR1 / SM-BMR2 / SM-BTR2 battery holder / battery Shimano E-Bike System (STEPS): EP801 / EP6E6000E8000 / E8080E7000EP800 / E6100 / E6180 / E5000 / E5080 Operating System: Window 8.1 (32/64 bit)Windows 10 (32/64 bit)Windows 11 (32/64 bit) for connecting STEPS and Di2 systems/components to a PCwide range of diagnostic and maintenance optionsdiverse setting optionsfirmware update ISMPCE02B3 1 x Shimano SM-PCE02 PC interface1 x Shimano Y79M00800 Micro USB/USB cable1 x Shimano Y7EA03100 connection cable (SD50 type)1 x Shimano Y79M9801T connection cable (SD300 type)

name: Topeak Essential Toolshop Toolset
description: Gear up for your next cycling adventure with the versatile multi-tool set Essential Toolshop from Topeak, designed to tackle a range of tasks on MTB, road, and city & touring bikes. This compact powerhouse combines essential tools in one handy package, including Torx, Phillips (crosshead), Slotted (flathead), and Allen wrench (hex key) bits, all secured in a durable hex drive 1/4" tool holder. Whether you're adjusting components, fixing a flat, or performing chain maintenance, this tool has you covered with its built-in screw tool, tire levers, and chain tool that effortlessly opens and closes links. The chain whip feature adds another layer of functionality, making cassette removal and installation a breeze. Lightweight and easy to carry, it's the perfect companion for cyclists who demand reliability and versatility on the go. No bike ride should start without this essential toolkit by your side, ensuring you're prepared for whatever the road or trail throws your way.

name: 3min19sec BTK-2 Bicycle Tool Box
description: The BTK-2 bicycle tool box by 3min19sec is your entry into working on your bike The 3min19sec BTK-2 bicycle tool box is a well thought out collection of the most important tools for the bike, which should not be missing in any hobby or professional workshop. This tool box contains everything you need to do the most common maintenance on your bike yourself: it includes things like a chain whip, lockring took, hex tools, Torx wrenches, chainring bolt wrench, chain tool, and tools to change out your drivetrain yourself. Crank puller and bottom bracket tool are included for replacing cartridge bearings. The key for external bearing cups fits all current Hollowtech II, GXP and Campagnolo bearings. Thanks to the opening in the key, bearings can be re-tightened without dismantling the crank. Suitable adapters for Shimano SM-BB9000 BB93 and SM-BBR60 are included. Even wheels can be re-tightened with the spoke wrench, or the tapered bearings can be readjusted. Of course, all tools for simple assembly work are also included, such as replacing fixtures or adjusting the rear derailleur. Suitable valve keys to replace valve cores on Auto-/AV-/Schrader and Sclaverand-/SV-/Presta valves are included. The solid tyre levers allow you to replace even stubborn tyres and the self-adhesive patches gets you back on your bike quickly after a flat tyre. BTK-2 is really a worry-free tool box for you and your bike workshop! generously equipped tool boxall necessary tools for the most common repairs on the bicyclefor the hobby or professional workshop Chain / cassette: chain toolchain whipcassette removal tool for quick release and thru-axle, also suitable for Center Lock brake rotors on quick release hubs Crank / bottom bracket: wrench for Hollowtech II crank boltsbottom bracket removal toolbottom bracket wrench, also suitable for Center - Lock brake rotors on thru-axle hubsShimano SM-BBR60 adapterShimano SM-BB9000 BB93 adaptercrank pullerchainring bolt wrench Tyre / wheel: tyre levers (pair)patch kitvalve key AV and SVspoke wrench for 3.2 mm (0.127" ) nipplesspoke wrench for 3.3 mm (0.130" ) nipplesspoke wrench for 3.4 mm (0.136" ) nipples Pedal / hub: Pedal WrenchCone Wrench 13 mmCone Wrench 14 mmCone Wrench 15 mmCone Wrench 16 mm Screwdrivers: Screwdriver with interchangeable blade: Flat 5 mm / PhillipsScrewdriver 3 mm Hex: 2 mm hex2.5 mm hex3 mm hex4 mm hex5 mm hex6 mm hex8 mm hex Torx: Torx T10Torx T15Torx T20Torx T25Torx T27Torx T30Torx T40Torx T45Torx T50 1 x 3min19sec BTK-2 tool box with tools

name: Wera Bicycle Set 3
description: Wera Bicycle Set 3 - for almost all bicycle applications The Wera Bicycle Set 3 is a universal, portable companion that stores a ratchet, bits, sockets and a bit hand holder in a very small space. The selected range allows you to carry out repairs and assembly work on bicycles yourself. An empty bit check is particularly practical, as it can be individually stocked with tools for when you are on the move. This reduces weight on cycling tours. The mini ratchet allows you to work in all hard-to-reach places. Their low installation height is particularly advantageous in very tight installation situations. The fine-tooth mechanism with 60 teeth enables a small return angle of only 6°. This affords you the ability to work with high precision. In addition, the ratchet is reversible and has a knurled wheel for fast tightening. The enclosed bits and sockets can be used in both manual and machine operation. This means that you are equipped with only one socket / bit selection for almost all purposes. The high-quality bit handle has a Kraftform Plus handle that offers a pleasant ergonomic feel. Two composite tyre levers are also included, which you can use to lift the tyre safely without damaging the rim. compact 41-piece screwdriving tool set for bicycle applications, also for mobile usepractical assortment for the independent execution of common assembly work and repairsrobust, surface-friendly, compact textile bag with low weight" Take it easy" tool finder: colour coding by sizeRapidaptor bit holder with quick-release sleeve: fast bit change without auxiliary tools, even with small bit sizestwo multi-use tyre levers 05004172001 The Wera Bicycle Set 3 includes: 1 x Wera 8001 A ring ratchet (1/4" x 87 mm)1 x Wera 813 bit holder (1/4" x 78 mm)1 x Wera 889/4/1 K Rapidaptor universal holder (1/4" x 50 mm)1 x Wera 870/1 tool shank (1/4" x 25 mm)7 x Wera 8790 HMA socket wrench inserts (5.5 / 6 / 7 / 8 / 10 / 13 / 15 x 23 mm)3 x Wera 851/1 TZ PH bits (PH 1 / PH 2 / PH 3 x 25 mm)7 x Wera 867/1 TZ Torx bits (TX 10 / TX 15 / TX 20 / TX 25 / TX 27 / TX 30 / TX 40 x 25 mm)3 x Wera 800/1 TZ bits (0.5 x 4 / 0.6 x 4.5 / 1 x 5.5 x 25 mm)7 x Wera 840/1 Z Hex-Plus bits (2 / 2.5 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 8 x 25 mm)5 x Wera 842/1 Z bits ( 2.5 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 x 25 mm)1 x Wera 9502 tyre lever with bit attachment1 x Wera 9503 tyre lever with valve extractor1 x Wera bit check, empty1 x hook-and-loop strips 120 x 50 mm1 x Wera tool pouch
